programme.desc: Nigella focuses on the kind of healthy food we all need to eat when we wish to purge ourselves of lifes impurities. Think salmon with greens and shiitake mushrooms and Vietnamese chicken and mint salad.

programme.title: News Breakfast
programme.desc: Start your day with the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the days top stories. Emma Rebellato and Olivia Caisley bring you news and interviews, joined by Luke Siddham Dundon, Johnson Raela and Claudia Long.

programme.title: News Breakfast - Extended
programme.desc: An extended News Breakfast over summer, as Emma Rebellato and Olivia Caisley bring you the mornings top stories and interviews, joined by Luke Siddham Dundon with news, Johnson Raela with sport and Claudia Long on weather.

programme.title: Nigellas Christmas Kitchen
programme.desc: Nigella invites a few friends for a pre-Christmas brunch. Featuring a triple cheese and onion strata, a glazed and toasted vanilla cake brioche and an antioxidant fruit salad, which could come in handy for the weeks ahead!

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: DI Neville Parkers mum is in town for Christmas, and a wealthy business owner is found dead at the bottom of a ravine. The team learn that the victims picture-perfect family arent all that they seem.

programme.title: ABC News at Noon
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Johanna Nicholson brings you todays top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter.

programme.title: The Piano UK: At Christmas (2023)
programme.desc: Claudia, Mika and Lang Lang are back with a festive songbook and celebrity surprises for the crowds at Kings Cross Station.

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: The team investigate the murder of a water taxi driver at the same time as Neville receives an anonymous letter warning them a murder is due to take place.

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Alan Davies is joined by comedy actor Chris Addison, broadcaster Sara Cox, and Bake Off co-presenter Sue Perkins. In his last edition as host, Stephen Fry awards points for the answers he considers most interesting.

programme.title: Nigella Bites
programme.desc: Nigella takes a trip down memory lane, recreating the tastes and flavours of her childhood from recipes belonging to her mother and grandmothers.

programme.title: Grand Designs New Zealand
programme.desc: Dale and Maria Gray dream of a large home on Waiheke Island, a place theyve always loved visiting but somewhere they never thought they could afford to build.

programme.title: Long Lost Family: What Happened Next
programme.desc: This time, a former England Rugby player whose lifelong dream has finally become reality; and a mother who found that coming back into the life of child can be a big challenge.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the experts pay a visit to the grounds of the Yorkshire Museum in York. Family treasures brought before the cameras include a spy camera disguised as a silver box.

programme.title: Hard Quiz Kids
programme.sub-title: Young Sheldon, Mr Olympia, Harry Styles and Cassowaries
programme.desc: To win Tom Gleesons Big Brass Mug, an eclectic collection of young experts are grilled on their knowledge of Young Sheldon, Mr Olympia, Harry Styles, and cassowaries!

programme.title: ABC News
programme.desc: News from where we live. ABC News Victoria brings you the days top stories, exclusive investigations and original reporting on the issues that matter to you. Presented by Tamara Oudyn, plus weather with Adam Morgan.

programme.title: The Yearly With Charlie Pickering
programme.desc: Charlie wraps up 2025 with Margaret Pomeranz, Rhys Nicholson, Tom Gleeson, Abbey Gelmi and more. And if you cant recall the year, dont worry; The Yearly remembers it, so you dont have to.

programme.title: The Piano: The Incredibly Talented Lucy
programme.desc: The extraordinary story of blind pianist Lucy as she is propelled into the limelight. How will Lucy and her dedicated piano teacher Daniel cope with her new-found fame?

programme.title: The Assembly
programme.desc: Renowned interviewer, Leigh Sales mentors Autistic journalism students in The Assembly, and in this episode, the students interview journalist Ray Martin, with heart-warming results.

programme.title: The Assembly
programme.desc: Hosted by veteran ABC journalist, Leigh Sales, this week The Assembly sees the Autistic journalism students interview Australian entertainment royalty, Julia Morris.

programme.title: Escaping Utopia

programme.desc: The team must prove Nevilles innocence after Professor Cartwright is murdered. DI Karen Flitcroft from the Department of Policing Standards takes over the investigation.

programme.desc: We catch up with John who returns to the UK to spend time with his siblings; Tracey, who, four years ago was looking for her long-lost brother; and Pauline, who desperately wanted to have her brother at her wedding.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce is in a festive mood as she opens this seasonal selection box from the Roadshow team. Plus Fiona reveals the history of gifting at Christmas and looks at the most valuable antique toys eagerly sought by collectors.

programme.title: Spicks and Specks

programme.title: Utopia
programme.desc: Tony is frozen out by the Minister when hes reluctant to announce a new project. The NBA comes under scrutiny by UNESCO over the Great Barrier Reefs status. Scott starts an NBA TikTok account.

programme.title: Utopia
programme.desc: Rhonda forces Tony to fast track a long-term rail project. Nat goes the wrong kind of viral for a problematic photo. Ash investigates a recurring charge on the company account, while adjusting to his new e-scooter.

programme.title: You Cant Ask That
programme.desc: These eight amputees all have remarkable stories to share about perception and embracing a new version of themselves, the challenges theyve faced, and what theyve gained through their limb loss.

programme.title: You Cant Ask That
programme.desc: There are over 2600 Australians listed as long-term missing persons. Is it better for someone you love to be missing or dead? Their answers might surprise you.

programme.title: Grand Designs New Zealand
programme.desc: With the trauma of a destructive firestorm vivid in their minds, Richard and Janet Brown resolve to rebuilding their Ohau dream home.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: In 1958, Richard Cue was adopted as a baby. For years, he has longed to find his birth mother. And the story of Tania searching for her Iranian father who she last heard from more than thirty years ago.

programme.title: rage
programme.desc: Australias longest-running music show is home to the biggest vault of music videos from a diverse range of artists, genres, and eras. They curate the best clips of all-time to entertain for hours.

programme.title: Parkinson in Australia
programme.sub-title: 1980: Johnny Farnham, Bishop Howell Witt, Dennis Lillee
programme.desc: Come on a journey back to 1980 when Michael Parkinson interviews guests Johnny Farnham, Bishop Howell Witt and Dennis Lillee.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.desc: Josh Byrne learns about native bees in the suburbs, Jane Edmanson heads to a historic hydrangea garden, Sophie Thomson visits a garden adapted with accessibility in mind, and Tino Carnevale plants a soup bed at The Patch.

programme.desc: Nigella shares a range of slow-cook recipes, perfect for those weekend dinner parties where the host wants to avoid being chained to the kitchen sink. Think 24-hour aromatic pork and sticky toffee pudding.

programme.title: rage
programme.desc: rage soundtracks Christmas with all your favourite festive music videos.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: The days top stories and the latest from ABC News on Christmas Day. Presented by Ruby Cornish.

programme.title: The Popes Christmas Mass
programme.desc: Pope Leo XIV delivers his first Papal Christmas Mass at the Vatican.

programme.title: Bullet Train
programme.desc: Ladybug, is an unlucky fixer determined to do his job peacefully after one too many gigs gone off the rails. Fate may have other plans, as Ladybugs latest mission puts him on a collision course with 10 deadly and diverse assassins, all with connected, yet conflicting objectives and tests his newfound philosophy in this non-stop thrill ride through modern-day Japan.

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: When an attempt to take down a drug cartel blows up in their faces, two undercover operatives are forced to go on the run together, though neither knows that the other is a federal agent. Suddenly, everyone on both sides of the law wants them dead, and their only hope is to trust each other.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: In search of his next big story, Eddie lands an exclusive interview with convicted murderer and death row inmate Cletus Kasady,

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The year is 1939, Indiana Jones and museum curator Marcus Brody venture to Italy in search of Dr Henry Jones, Indys father. The rescue mission turns into a race to find the Holy Grail before the Nazis. With Dr Joness diary as a vital key and the map with no names as a guide, Indiana once again finds himself in another death defying adventure of pure excitement.

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Having lost his memory and the one person he loved, Bourne is forced to hunt down his past in order to find a future. Travelling from Moscow, Paris and London to Tangier and New York City, he continues his quest to find the real Jason Bourne, all the while trying to out-manoeuvre the scores of cops, federal officers and Interpol agents who have him in their sights.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Kong
programme.desc: Legends collide as Godzilla and Kong, the two most powerful forces of nature, clash on the big screen in a spectacular battle for the ages. As a squadron embarks on a perilous mission into fantastic uncharted terrain, unearthing clues to the Titans very origins and mankinds survival, a conspiracy threatens to wipe the creatures, both good and bad, from the face of the earth forever.

programme.title: Roboshark
programme.desc: What starts off as a typical day on the streets of Seattle soon becomes a terrifying bloodbath, when a great white shark devours an alien space probe and ROBOSHARK is born.

programme.title: Alexander
programme.desc: This film re-creates the towering, true story of Alexander the Great, who, in the 4th Century BC, conquered Greece, Persia, Afghanistan and India - 90% of the "Known World." Against massive armies of chariots and elephants, he never lost a battle! Visionary, explorer, and dreamer - he was also a tender son, torn by his mothers burning love and ambition, and desperate for his fathers approval. His dream shaped the world we live in today.

programme.title: Wrath of Man
programme.desc: Mysterious and wild-eyed, a new security guard for a cash truck company surprises his co-workers when he unleashes precision skills during a heist. The crew is left wondering who he is and where he came from. Soon, the marksmans ultimate motive becomes clear as he takes dramatic and irrevocable steps to settle a score.

programme.title: Hard Kill
programme.desc: A billionaire CEO hires a team of mercenaries to protect a lethal piece of technology when his daughter is kidnapped.

programme.title: Machete
programme.desc: Left for dead after clashing with notorious Mexican drug kingpin Torrez, Machete has escaped to Texas, looking to disappear and forget his tragic past. What he finds is a web of corruption and deceit that leaves a bullet in a senator and Machete a wanted man. Machete sets out to clear his name and expose a deep conspiracy. But standing in his way are a ruthless businessman with an endless payroll of killers, a twisted border vigilante leading a small army, and a beautiful Immigration officer torn between enforcing the law and doing what is right.

programme.title: Ambulance
programme.desc: Over one day across the streets of LA, three lives will change forever. Desperate brothers hijack an ambulance after their heist goes awry, spiralling into the most insane escape.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
programme.desc: When the abandoned islands dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event.

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: Its the nitro-fuelled answer to the question: how fast do you like it? Now an ex-cop on the run, Brian OConnor hooks into outlaw street-racing. When the Feds strong-arm him back, OConnors no rules, win-or-die skills are unleashed against an international drug lord. With his velocity-addicted buddy riding shotgun, and a drop-dead-gorgeous undercover agent dialling up the heat, this film accelerates the action into a desperate race for survival, justice and mind-blowing, jaw-dropping speed.

programme.title: Bloodshot
programme.desc: Based on the Valiant Comics series, Bloodshot, an ex-killer for the mob and slain soldier, is re-animated with superpowers.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: The year is 1957, and Indiana Jones is back in a new globe-trotting adventure. Assisted by his former lover Marion Ravenwood, a greaser Mutt Williams, and fellow archaeologist Mac. From Roswell, New Mexico to the lost city of Atlantis, Indiana Jones battles agents of the Soviet Union led by Spalko for the Crystal Skull.

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: On the verge of having their conspiracy exposed, members of the governments intelligence community will stop at nothing to erase all evidence of their top secret programs - even the agents involved. Aaron Cross must use his genetically-engineered skills to survive the ultimate game of cat-and-mouse and finish what Jason Bourne started.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: Blamed for the terrorist bombing of the Kremlin, IMF operative Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) is disavowed along with the rest of the agency when the President initiates Ghost Protocol. Left without any resources or backup, Ethan must find a way to clear his agencys name and prevent another attack. To complicate matters further, Ethan is forced to embark on this mission with a team of fellow IMF fugitives whose personal motives he does not fully know.

programme.title: Toxic Shark
programme.desc: What was supposed to be days of relaxation turns deadly for singles when they discover they arent alone. While enjoying an array of social activities in and around the ocean, the guests have no idea they are being hunted by deadly sharks.

programme.title: Fast and Furious Presents: Hobbs and Shaw
programme.desc: Hobbs and Shaw, the trash-talking sworn enemies, must team up to take down a cyber-genetically enhanced anarchist with a bio weapon that threatens the fate of humanity.

programme.title: The Mummy (1999)
programme.desc: Adventurer Rick OConnell and Egyptologist Evelyn Carnahan discover the lost city of Hamunaptra, and struggle to save the world from unspeakable evil after they inadvertently stumble upon a mummys tomb in 1923, and the mummy is accidentally resurrected.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: A harrowing war drama where two Black Hawk helicopters are shot down over Mogadishu, trapping an elite team of American soldiers in a 15-hour firefight as they try to recover their fallen comrades.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: In this sly satire, a group of elites gather to hunt ordinary Americans for sport. But one of The Hunted fights back against The Hunters leader.

programme.title: Dead Again in Tombstone
programme.desc: After saving himself from an eternity in Hell, Guerrero continues to roam the Wild West collecting bounties on behalf of Lucifer.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: In search of his next big story, Eddie lands an exclusive interview with convicted murderer and death row inmate Cletus Kasady,

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Humans are at war with the Transformers, and Optimus Prime is gone. The key to saving the future lies buried in the secrets of the past and the hidden history of Transformers on Earth. Now, its up to the unlikely alliance of Cade Yeager, Bumblebee, an English lord and an Oxford professor to save the world.

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: The plan was flawless. The execution was perfect. Charlie Croker pulled off the crime of a lifetime. The one thing that, he didnt plan on was being double-crossed. Now he wants more than the jobs payoff, he wants payback.

programme.title: Snitch
programme.desc: In the fast-paced action thriller, a fathers teenage son is wrongly accused of a drug distribution crime and is looking at a mandatory minimum prison sentence of 10 years. Desperate and determined to rescue his son at all costs, he makes a deal with the US attorney to work as an undercover informant and infiltrate a drug cartel on a dangerous mission risking everything, including his family and his own life.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Former CIA assassin Jason Bourne resurfaces just as his former employers are implementing a new program aimed at hunting him down. Now fully recovered from his amnesia, Bourne teams up with Nicky Parsons to uncover the truth behind his fathers death, while simultaneously exacting revenge and evading the government forces hot on his trail.

programme.title: Free Fire
programme.desc: An arms deal goes spectacularly and explosively wrong. Justine has brokered a meeting in a deserted warehouse between two Irishmen and a gang led by Vernon and Ord who are selling them a stash of guns. But when shots are fired in the handover, a heart stopping game of survival ensues.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: A mysterious event from Earths past threatens to ignite a war so big that the Transformers alone will not be able to save the planet. Sam Witwicky and the Autobots must fight against the darkness to defend our world from the Decepticons all-consuming evil.

programme.title: Death Race 4: Beyond Anarchy
programme.desc: Danny Trejo returns as the ruthless bookie, Goldberg, in the wildest, bloodiest, Death Race ever. After a failed attack on inmate and legendary driver, Frankenstein, Black Ops specialist Connor Gibson (Zach McGowan) infiltrates a super-maximum federal prison with one goal - enter the immoral and illegal Death Race and take Frankenstein down. Connor enlists the help of Baltimore Bob (Danny Glover) and Lists (Fred Koehler), and unexpectedly falls in love with bartending beauty Jane (Christine Marzano). Connor will have to fight for more than his life in this brutal world of no guards, no rules, no track, and no fear.

programme.title: Dam Sharks
programme.desc: After a gruesome shark attack on a fish and game expert in the most unexpected place, an inland river, the local forest ranger, Kate, sets out on a mission to uncover what happened. What she discovers is something far more sinister than she could have ever imagined. A massive storm has washed several bloodthirsty bull sharks into the river and, to make matters worse, theyve begun building a dam out of human remains in order to trap their prey.

programme.title: Great White
programme.desc: A flight to a remote atoll turns into a nightmare for five passengers when their seaplane is destroyed and theyre trapped on a raft, 160km from shore, with sharks lurking beneath them.

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: Its the nitro-fuelled answer to the question: how fast do you like it? Now an ex-cop on the run, Brian OConnor hooks into outlaw street-racing. When the Feds strong-arm him back, OConnors no rules, win-or-die skills are unleashed against an international drug lord. With his velocity-addicted buddy riding shotgun, and a drop-dead-gorgeous undercover agent dialling up the heat, this film accelerates the action into a desperate race for survival, justice and mind-blowing, jaw-dropping speed.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: When convicted street racer Sean Boswell tries to start a new life on the other side of the world, his obsession with racing sets him on a collision course with the Japanese underworld. To survive, he will have to master drifting - a new style of racing where tricked-out cars slide through hairpin turns, defying gravity and death for the ultimate road rush.

programme.title: Morbius
programme.desc: Biochemist Dr Michael Morbius tries to cure himself of a rare blood disease, but he inadvertently infects himself with a form of vampirism instead.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (2014)
programme.desc: The city needs heroes. Darkness has settled over New York City as Shredder and his evil Foot Clan have an iron grip on everything from the police to the politicians. The future is grim until four unlikely outcast brothers rise from the sewers and discover their destiny as Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. The Turtles must work with fearless reporter April ONeil and her wise-cracking cameraman Vern Fenwick to save the city and unravel Shredders diabolical plan.

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: On the verge of having their conspiracy exposed, members of the governments intelligence community will stop at nothing to erase all evidence of their top secret programs - even the agents involved. Aaron Cross must use his genetically-engineered skills to survive the ultimate game of cat-and-mouse and finish what Jason Bourne started.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: Blamed for the terrorist bombing of the Kremlin, IMF operative Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) is disavowed along with the rest of the agency when the President initiates Ghost Protocol. Left without any resources or backup, Ethan must find a way to clear his agencys name and prevent another attack. To complicate matters further, Ethan is forced to embark on this mission with a team of fellow IMF fugitives whose personal motives he does not fully know.

programme.title: Toxic Shark
programme.desc: What was supposed to be days of relaxation turns deadly for singles when they discover they arent alone. While enjoying an array of social activities in and around the ocean, the guests have no idea they are being hunted by deadly sharks.

programme.title: Fast and Furious Presents: Hobbs and Shaw
programme.desc: Hobbs and Shaw, the trash-talking sworn enemies, must team up to take down a cyber-genetically enhanced anarchist with a bio weapon that threatens the fate of humanity.

programme.title: The Mummy (1999)
programme.desc: Adventurer Rick OConnell and Egyptologist Evelyn Carnahan discover the lost city of Hamunaptra, and struggle to save the world from unspeakable evil after they inadvertently stumble upon a mummys tomb in 1923, and the mummy is accidentally resurrected.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: A harrowing war drama where two Black Hawk helicopters are shot down over Mogadishu, trapping an elite team of American soldiers in a 15-hour firefight as they try to recover their fallen comrades.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: In this sly satire, a group of elites gather to hunt ordinary Americans for sport. But one of The Hunted fights back against The Hunters leader.

programme.title: Dead Again in Tombstone
programme.desc: After saving himself from an eternity in Hell, Guerrero continues to roam the Wild West collecting bounties on behalf of Lucifer.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: In search of his next big story, Eddie lands an exclusive interview with convicted murderer and death row inmate Cletus Kasady,

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Humans are at war with the Transformers, and Optimus Prime is gone. The key to saving the future lies buried in the secrets of the past and the hidden history of Transformers on Earth. Now, its up to the unlikely alliance of Cade Yeager, Bumblebee, an English lord and an Oxford professor to save the world.

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: The plan was flawless. The execution was perfect. Charlie Croker pulled off the crime of a lifetime. The one thing that, he didnt plan on was being double-crossed. Now he wants more than the jobs payoff, he wants payback.

programme.title: Snitch
programme.desc: In the fast-paced action thriller, a fathers teenage son is wrongly accused of a drug distribution crime and is looking at a mandatory minimum prison sentence of 10 years. Desperate and determined to rescue his son at all costs, he makes a deal with the US attorney to work as an undercover informant and infiltrate a drug cartel on a dangerous mission risking everything, including his family and his own life.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Former CIA assassin Jason Bourne resurfaces just as his former employers are implementing a new program aimed at hunting him down. Now fully recovered from his amnesia, Bourne teams up with Nicky Parsons to uncover the truth behind his fathers death, while simultaneously exacting revenge and evading the government forces hot on his trail.

programme.title: Free Fire
programme.desc: An arms deal goes spectacularly and explosively wrong. Justine has brokered a meeting in a deserted warehouse between two Irishmen and a gang led by Vernon and Ord who are selling them a stash of guns. But when shots are fired in the handover, a heart stopping game of survival ensues.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: A mysterious event from Earths past threatens to ignite a war so big that the Transformers alone will not be able to save the planet. Sam Witwicky and the Autobots must fight against the darkness to defend our world from the Decepticons all-consuming evil.

programme.title: Death Race 4: Beyond Anarchy
programme.desc: Danny Trejo returns as the ruthless bookie, Goldberg, in the wildest, bloodiest, Death Race ever. After a failed attack on inmate and legendary driver, Frankenstein, Black Ops specialist Connor Gibson (Zach McGowan) infiltrates a super-maximum federal prison with one goal - enter the immoral and illegal Death Race and take Frankenstein down. Connor enlists the help of Baltimore Bob (Danny Glover) and Lists (Fred Koehler), and unexpectedly falls in love with bartending beauty Jane (Christine Marzano). Connor will have to fight for more than his life in this brutal world of no guards, no rules, no track, and no fear.

programme.title: Dam Sharks
programme.desc: After a gruesome shark attack on a fish and game expert in the most unexpected place, an inland river, the local forest ranger, Kate, sets out on a mission to uncover what happened. What she discovers is something far more sinister than she could have ever imagined. A massive storm has washed several bloodthirsty bull sharks into the river and, to make matters worse, theyve begun building a dam out of human remains in order to trap their prey.

programme.title: Great White
programme.desc: A flight to a remote atoll turns into a nightmare for five passengers when their seaplane is destroyed and theyre trapped on a raft, 160km from shore, with sharks lurking beneath them.

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: Its the nitro-fuelled answer to the question: how fast do you like it? Now an ex-cop on the run, Brian OConnor hooks into outlaw street-racing. When the Feds strong-arm him back, OConnors no rules, win-or-die skills are unleashed against an international drug lord. With his velocity-addicted buddy riding shotgun, and a drop-dead-gorgeous undercover agent dialling up the heat, this film accelerates the action into a desperate race for survival, justice and mind-blowing, jaw-dropping speed.

programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. We break down todays biggest stories and speak to guests with skin in the game.

programme.desc: Delivering the market news, data and analysis you need to set your agenda.

programme.title: Bloomberg Open Interest

programme.title: Marlon Wayans: God Loves Me
programme.desc: Filmed at the Center Stage Theater in Atlanta, Wayans delivers a hilarious hour-long performance, unleashing his spot-on impressions and fearless physical comedy to address one of the most infamous recent events in pop culture the slap that took place at the 94th Academy Awards ceremony. With his inimitable blunt and boisterous style, Wayans skillfully weaves anecdotes from his own life with stories about his long-time friends, from divulging his teenage crush on Jada Pinkett Smith, getting humbled by Chris Rock in an early stand-up set, and examining the impact of Will Smiths long career. A daring tour-de-force, this special is a hysterical yet thoughtful exploration of friendship, family, mistakes, and redemption.

programme.title: The IT Crowd

programme.title: Dalziel and Pascoe
programme.desc: When a womans mummified remains emerge from the water during a cave rescue operation, Dalziel and Pascoe embark upon a treacherous murder inquiry which rocks their world to its core.

programme.title: The Banksy Job
programme.desc: A documentary exploring the infamous theft of street artist Banksys sculpture, The Drinker, and the ensuing battle with the art terrorist: AK47.

programme.title: Hurricane
programme.desc: The tale of the Polish pilot who alongside his comrades of the Polish Air Force joins the British Royal Air Force to fight during the Battle of Britain. Having seen Warsaw burn, Poland crumble and France capitulate, the Poles join the Brits to push back the rampant Nazi empire.

programme.title: Ali and Ava
programme.desc: Ali and Ava, both lonely for different reasons, meet and sparks fly. Over a lunar month a deep connection begins to grow, despite the legacy of Avas past relationship, and Alis emotional turmoil at the breakdown of his marriage.

programme.title: How to Talk to Girls at Parties
programme.desc: An alien touring the galaxy breaks away from her group and meets two young inhabitants of the most dangerous place in the universe: the London suburb of Croydon.

programme.title: A Little Chaos
programme.desc: This period drama tells the tale of two landscape artists who become romantically involved while constructing the grand gardens at King Louis XIVs palace at Versailles.

programme.title: Tommys Honour
programme.desc: Tom and Tommy Morris, father and son pioneers of professional golf, rely on skill, business acumen, and working-class street smarts to make Tommy one of the worlds first sports superstars.

programme.title: Last Days In The Desert
programme.desc: An imagined chapter from Jesus forty days of fasting and praying in the desert. On his way out of the wilderness, Jesus struggles with the Devil over the fate of a family in crisis.

programme.title: FairyTale: A True Story
programme.desc: Based on the true story of two little girls in 1917 who had the world believing in fairies. With her father reported missing in action during WWI, Frances goes to stay with her cousin Elise in the country. While playing in the woods, the girls discover some fairies and decide to take some pictures of the wee creatures. When the photographs are declared genuine, crowds of people, led by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle, descend on them to share the magic.

programme.title: Breathe
programme.desc: For his directorial debut, Andy Serkis brings to life the inspiring true love story between Robin and Diana Cavendish, an adventurous couple who refuse to give up in the face of a devastating disease. When Robin is struck down by polio at the age of 28, he is confined to a hospital bed and given only a few months to live. With the help of Dianas twin brothers and the ground-breaking ideas of inventor Teddy Hall, Robin and Diana dare to escape the hospital ward to seek out a full and passionate life together - raising their young son, traveling and devoting their lives to helping other polio patients.

programme.title: The Banksy Job
programme.desc: A documentary exploring the infamous theft of street artist Banksys sculpture, The Drinker, and the ensuing battle with the art terrorist: AK47.

programme.title: Creation
programme.desc: Charles Darwin struggles to find a balance between his ideas of evolution and his relationship with his devout wife.

programme.title: The Liability
programme.desc: UK. A weary assassin hires a gangsters cocky stepson as his driver to show him the ropes. But a stunning woman upsets the applecart after a hit in this witty caper.

programme.title: White Riot
programme.desc: Telling the story of a vital national protest movement: Rock Against Racism, formed in 1976 when a group of artists united to take on the National Front.

programme.title: Madame Bovary
programme.desc: Adapted from Flauberts classic novel, this film tells the tragic story of Emma, a young beauty who impulsively marries a small-town doctor to leave her fathers pig farm behind. But after being introduced to the glamorous world of high society, she soon becomes bored with her stodgy mate and seeks excitement and status outside the bonds of marriage.

programme.title: A Guide To Second Date Sex
programme.desc: Laura and Ryan have been totally destroyed by previous relationships. In the hope of getting it right, they go on a second date having no idea what theyre supposed to do.

programme.title: God Help The Girl
programme.desc: Life has never been easy for Eve, but this troubled young girl has a talent and songwriting becomes her way forward. Through her passion for music, shes led to Glasgows music scene.

programme.title: Death Defying Acts
programme.desc: It is 1926 and escape artist Harry Houdini is the most famous performer in the world. The only thing he is unable to escape is the death of his beloved mother. Obsessed with connecting with her in the afterlife, he offers $10,000 to anyone who can reveal her dying words to him - something only he knows. Enter the beautiful but deceptive Mary and what begins as a con evolves into a far more dangerous affair as Houdini is overwhelmed by Marys mysterious charm. As the stakes get higher, it soon becomes a question of who is out-conning who - when the biggest risk is falling in love.

programme.title: Farming
programme.desc: Based on his own incredible autobiographical story, writer director Adewale Akinnuoye Agbajes "Farming" follows a young Nigerian boy as he is drawn into the warper world of a racist skinhead gang in 1980s England. Enitan is a young boy "farmed out" by his parents to a white British family in the hope of giving him a better future. Caught between two worlds and belonging to neither, Enitans need for love and acceptance is exploited by the adults in his life, transforming a sweet boy into a teenage menace.

programme.title: Churchill
programme.desc: This film follows Britains iconic prime minister, Winston Churchill, in the days before the D-day landings in June 1944. As Allied forces stand on the south coast of Britain, poised to invade Nazi-occupied Europe, they await Churchills decision on whether the invasion will actually move ahead. Fearful of repeating his mistakes from WWI on the beaches of Gallipoli, exhausted by years of war, plagued by depression and obsessed with fulfilling historical greatness, Churchill is also faced with constant criticism from his political opponents, General Eisenhower and Field Marshal Montgomery.

programme.title: Anna and the Apocalypse
programme.desc: Twas the night before Christmas, when a zombie apocalypse threatened a sleepy town. Anna and her friends must fight, slash, and sing their way to survival.

programme.title: Mr. Holmes
programme.desc: A different twist on the worlds most famous detective. 1947, an ageing Sherlock Holmes returns from a journey to Japan, where, in search of a rare plant with powerful restorative qualities, he has witnessed the devastation of nuclear warfare. Grappling with the diminishing powers of his mind, Holmes comes to rely upon his housekeepers boy as he revisits the circumstances of the unsolved case that forced him into retirement, and searches for answers to the mysteries of life and love before its too late.

programme.title: The Duke
programme.desc: In 1961, Kempton Bunton, a 60-year-old taxi driver, steals Goyas portrait of the Duke of Wellington from the National Gallery in London. What happened next became the stuff of legend.

programme.title: The Dinosaur Project
programme.desc: In this special effects thriller, a film crew in the Congo discover a lost world filled with terrifying, giant creatures thought extinct for millions of years.

programme.title: Starter For 10
programme.desc: Brian Jackson is a wide-eyed working class kid whose exhaustive grasp of general knowledge leaves him wanting when it comes to women. On his way to achieving his long held ambition to appear on University Challenge, he falls in love with fellow student and team-mate Alice; has his conscience pricked by rights activist Rebecca; all while trying not to become the student keeno that his hometown mates think hell turn into.

programme.title: I Am Slave
programme.desc: A thriller set in Londons slave trade and centred on a womans fight for freedom.

programme.title: Tea with the Dames
programme.desc: Four old friends will reflect on their lives and careers, as they spend a weekend together at the retreat once shared by Joan Plowright and Laurence Olivier.

programme.title: Sorry We Missed You
programme.desc: A hard-up UK delivery driver and his wife struggling to raise a family hope that self-employment can solve their woes.

programme.title: On Chesil Beach
programme.desc: Based on Ian McEwans novel. In 1962 England, a young couple find their idyllic romance colliding with issues of sexual freedom and societal pressure, leading to an awkward and fateful wedding night.

programme.title: Vita and Virginia
programme.desc: Virginia Wolf meets fellow author Vita Sackville-West in London in the 1920s. Despite both of them being married, they embark on an affair that later inspires one of Virginias novels.

programme.title: The Best Offer
programme.desc: Virgil Oldman is a solitary, cultured man whose reluctance to engage with others, especially women, is matched only by the dogged obsessiveness with which he practices his profession of antiques dealer. Hes never been close to another human being, not even Robert, his only friend - a young, skilful restorer of mechanical devices from every era. The day he turns 63, Virgil receives a phone call from a young woman who asks him to handle the disposal of some family works of art. But when the time comes for his first site visit, the girl fails to appear, nor, for various reasons, is she present for the taking of the inventory or for the transportation and restoration of the pieces. More than once Virgil is tempted to bow out of what appears to be nothing but a bothersome mess, but on each occasion, the mysterious young woman, locked in her own obsessive world, convinces him to continue. And with this, the old antique dealers life begins to take an unexpected turn. It is Robert who shows him, step-by-step, how to win the heart of a young woman who is afraid of the world and, caught in the middle of this puzzling game of chess, Virgil soon finds himself enveloped by a passion that will transform his grey existence forever.

programme.title: The Limehouse Golem
programme.desc: Victorian London is gripped with fear as a serial killer, dubbed The Limehouse Golem, is on the loose and leaving cryptic messages written in his victims blood. With few leads and increasing public pressure, Scotland Yard assigns the case to Inspector Kildare - a seasoned detective with a troubled past. Faced with a list of suspects, Kildare must discover which one is the killer before the Golem strikes again.

programme.title: Age of Heroes
programme.desc: Sean Bean and Danny Dyer star in this action adventure which documents the true story of the elite 30 Commando unit, formed during World War II by the man who would later become novelist Ian Fleming, and their risky mission in Norway. Corporal Bob Rains (Danny Dyer), noted by top military brass for his potential, is drafted into the 30 Commando unit, put together by intelligence operative Lieutenant Commander Ian Fleming (James DArcy) to obtain vital German intelligence information. Rains and the other 30 Commando team members, led by Major Jones (Sean Bean) prepare for a dangerous mission to Norway, where the Germans have hidden their valuable radar technology, which, if captured by the Allies, will debilitate the enemys chances of winning the war. After parachuting into the snowy Norwegian countryside, the 30 Commandos must put their skills to the test, as they battle fierce German opposition, the unrelenting cold and a problem with their return transport, which sees them struggle.

programme.title: The Bookshop
programme.desc: Set in a small town in 1959 England, a woman decides, against polite but ruthless local opposition, to open a bookshop, a decision which becomes a political minefield.

programme.title: In Bruges
programme.desc: After a job goes wrong, hit men Ray and Ken are ordered by their crime boss to cool their heels in Bruges, Belgium. They dont make good tourists, however, and soon find themselves in the oddest of circumstances as they navigate the seemingly fairytale city.

programme.title: Into the White
programme.desc: During World War II, enemy fighter pilots find themselves face to face after shooting down one anothers planes over a desolate landscape. In order to survive, they must set aside the rules of war.

programme.title: Cheri
programme.desc: This is the sensual story of an extraordinary love affair between beautiful retired courtesan Lea and exquisitely handsome and cheeky Cheri. The spoilt son of her old colleague and rival, Madame Peloux, Lea sets out to educate the boy in the ways of love and they embark on a journey steeped in lust, jealousy and desire.

programme.title: Red Joan
programme.desc: English born Joan Stanley, a Soviet and communist party sympathizer, becomes employed as a British government civil servant, and gets recruited by the KGB in the mid 1930s. She successfully transfers nuclear bomb secrets to the Soviet Union (Russia), which enables them to keep up with the west in the development of atomic weapons, and remains undetected as a spy for over a half a century.

programme.title: Testament of Youth
programme.desc: A powerful story of love, war and remembrance, based on the First World War memoir by Vera Brittain, which has become the classic testimony of that war from a womans point of view. A searing journey from youthful hopes and dreams to the edge of despair and back again, its a film about young love, the futility of war and how to make sense of the darkest times.

programme.title: The Best Offer
programme.desc: Virgil Oldman is a solitary, cultured man whose reluctance to engage with others, especially women, is matched only by the dogged obsessiveness with which he practices his profession of antiques dealer. Hes never been close to another human being, not even Robert, his only friend - a young, skilful restorer of mechanical devices from every era. The day he turns 63, Virgil receives a phone call from a young woman who asks him to handle the disposal of some family works of art. But when the time comes for his first site visit, the girl fails to appear, nor, for various reasons, is she present for the taking of the inventory or for the transportation and restoration of the pieces. More than once Virgil is tempted to bow out of what appears to be nothing but a bothersome mess, but on each occasion, the mysterious young woman, locked in her own obsessive world, convinces him to continue. And with this, the old antique dealers life begins to take an unexpected turn. It is Robert who shows him, step-by-step, how to win the heart of a young woman who is afraid of the world and, caught in the middle of this puzzling game of chess, Virgil soon finds himself enveloped by a passion that will transform his grey existence forever.

programme.title: Mothering Sunday
programme.desc: In 1924, housemaid and foundling Jane Fairchild has the rare chance to spend quality time with her secret lover, but unforeseen events will change the course of Janes life forever.

programme.title: Breathe
programme.desc: For his directorial debut, Andy Serkis brings to life the inspiring true love story between Robin and Diana Cavendish, an adventurous couple who refuse to give up in the face of a devastating disease. When Robin is struck down by polio at the age of 28, he is confined to a hospital bed and given only a few months to live. With the help of Dianas twin brothers and the ground-breaking ideas of inventor Teddy Hall, Robin and Diana dare to escape the hospital ward to seek out a full and passionate life together - raising their young son, traveling and devoting their lives to helping other polio patients.

programme.title: Unforgotten
programme.desc: Cassie and Sunny visit a priest who remembers Jimmy fondly, but unfortunately Father Robert Greaves is unable to identify Jo-Jo.

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: Vera is on track to uncover an intriguing yet puzzling case when the body of a sickly young girl is discovered at the side of an isolated railway crossing.

programme.title: Foyles War
programme.desc: Foyle finds that the echoes of World War II resonate deep through the heart of Britain, as he investigates anti-Semitic violence and suspected home-grown Nazi war criminals, with ramifications that stretch around the world to Germany and Palestine.

programme.desc: When the body of a missing trawler man is pulled from the sea, DCI Vera Stanhope must delve into the lives of his family in a close-knit fishing community.

programme.title: Mr. Bigstuff
programme.desc: After discovering their dad is alive, Lee and Glen react differently but unite to track him down while Kirsty struggles to cope with the news.

programme.title: The Game
programme.desc: Ex-cop Huw Miller cant forget a stalker-killer case he never solved. When Patrick Harbottle moves into a house on his street, Miller suspects Harbottle is the killer who got away.

programme.title: Broadchurch
programme.desc: DS Ellie Miller and DI Alec Hardy are called in to investigate a serious sexual assault in the Dorset community.

programme.desc: The hunt is on for Edward, who has fled to England. Meanwhile, Julien and Genevieve plot an audacious move to try and turn Constantin and take down the Brigada.

programme.desc: Doc chases his stolen horse who is in possession of Billy. However, he and Billy become great friends but their friendship grows bitter when Docs girl Rio, falls for Billy.

programme.title: Cakum Pakum
programme.desc: Cakum Pakum (Translation to English is spick and span / tip-top / ship shape). This program aims to showcase the best elements out of the Macedonian community.

programme.desc: News, events and public affairs relevant to the Victorian Chinese community.

programme.title: Entre Todos
programme.desc: For Melbournes large Spanish speaking community, with music, interviews, and community announcements.

programme.title: Eastern Newsbeat

programme.title: Move It or Lose It
programme.desc: A daily exercise program that features different exercises in each program including tai chi, chair-based exercises, weights, stretching, low-impact aerobics as well as relaxation and breathing techniques.

programme.title: A New You

programme.title: Happy Days

programme.title: And Now for Something Completely Different
programme.desc: More than 40 skits, animated shorts and interludes are included in this big-screen incarnation of the popular British television program "Monty Pythons Flying Circus." The narrator (John Cleese) guides the audience through absurd segments about such diverse subjects as cannibal babies, killer cats and dead parrots. Although the skits were originally produced for television, the film contains alternate versions that were remade without a studio audience.

programme.title: Connecting Africa
programme.desc: We travel to Egypt to meet Sir Mohammed Mansour, an Egyptian billionaire whose enterprises span mobility, industry, sports, and culture; we visit Cairo and the Grand Egyptian Museum.

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: We celebrate the nations emerging athletic talent, from the Olympic 4 x 400 metres relay teams record-breaking performance to Ross Branchs trailblazing achievements in the Dakar Rally and young tennis sensation Malak Machengs rise. We follow the relay teams historic silver medal at the Paris 2024 Olympics, Branchs role in putting Botswana on the global motorsport map, and Malaks journey as the 2025 Junior Sportswoman of the Year. Through their stories, we highlight Botswanas growing sports culture and its next generation of champions.

programme.title: African Voices Changemakers
programme.desc: World-renowned abstract artist Julie Mehretu has garnered international recognition for her depictions of urban experience through larger-than-life artwork.

programme.title: Inside...
programme.sub-title: Uzbekistan: The Center of Islamic Civilization
programme.desc: The Center for Islamic Civilization in Tashkent stands at the intersection of culture, history, and faith. Its a place where Uzbekistans rich intellectual and artistic heritage meets the possibilities of the future. Through conversations with scholars, curators, and craftspeople, we see how an idea conceived nearly a decade ago has grown into a national center dedicated to rediscovering the spirit of the Islamic Golden Age. Inside its walls, ancient manuscripts are being preserved and digitized, thousands of artifacts have been returned home, and new technologies bring history vividly to life. Beyond the Center, in the workshops of the Abul Kasim Madrasah, master artisans, woodcarvers, miniature painters, and ceramicists continue traditions that have shaped the region for centuries. Together, these voices reveal a living continuation of creativity and knowledge, showing how the legacy of Islamic civilization is not only remembered, but renewed in the heart of modern Uzbekistan.

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: In southwestern Zimbabwe, art has been a language for millennia. Scattered across the towering hills are cave paintings dating back over 13,000 years. Today, in the rural villages of the Matobos, another vibrant tradition thrives; house painting. A seasonal tradition has now become an annual competition rewarding the winners of My Beautiful Home, which has not only helped preserve an ancestral tradition and improve local womens livelihoods, but has now inspired spin-outs in the world of modern art, interior design, and fashion.

programme.title: Walk of Art
programme.desc: We explore how art has influenced the cultural landscape of Qatar and how it can be an immersive experience for those who visit, live and work there. We meet designers and artists who reflect the countrys layers of creativity, cultural diversity and modern identity. They guide us through Dohas open-air gallery, taking us to the public artwork that inspires them the most and represents a milestone in Qatars artistic evolution. From Doha Mountains and Cesars Pouce to remembering Qatars pearl diving heritage and the first artistic landmark - the Museum of Islamic Art.

programme.title: Married... with Children
programme.desc: Not wanting to leave it up to their children, Al and Peg decide to choose their grave sites while they are still alive. Al wants to be buried next to his favourite cowboy actor, Fuzzy McGee, and his mule, while Peg insists they be laid to rest in an expensive Mausoleum. Realizing Al will never give up on his wish, Peg agrees to it, provided they get rid of the mule. Finally, when Al learns of the cost of their burial, Peg suggests they save money and get buried in the same grave.

programme.title: Married... with Children
programme.desc: When Al and Peg arrive at the bank to make a contribution to Buds college fund and see the balance in his account, they conclude the bank must have made an error and quickly withdraw the $25,000 for themselves. Unaware that its Buds scholarship money, Al and Peg go on a shopping spree. When Bud heads off to college and starts bouncing checks left and right, Al and Peg realize their mistake but are afraid to admit it. When Bud is arrested for passing bad checks, they blame the whole thing on Kelly and Bud is forced to live at home again. Feeling guilty, Al tries to make it up to Bud by joining him for a dorm panty raid.

programme.title: Arrested Development
programme.desc: At UC Irvine, things get steamy when George-Michael finds himself in a love triangle with his best friend Ray and his girlfriend Becky.

programme.title: Mad About You
programme.sub-title: Uncle Phil Goes Back To High School
programme.desc: Uncle Phil decides to return to finish high school after 63 years. Unfazed by being stuffed inside a locker by a bully on his first day, he soon announces hes trying out for the track team.

programme.title: Mad About You

programme.title: The Nanny
programme.desc: Maxwell convinces Fran to design the costumes for a charity benefit.

programme.title: The Nanny
programme.desc: Maxwells continued insults cause Fran to walk out.

programme.title: Married... with Children
programme.desc: Not wanting to leave it up to their children, Al and Peg decide to choose their grave sites while they are still alive. Al wants to be buried next to his favourite cowboy actor, Fuzzy McGee, and his mule, while Peg insists they be laid to rest in an expensive Mausoleum. Realizing Al will never give up on his wish, Peg agrees to it, provided they get rid of the mule. Finally, when Al learns of the cost of their burial, Peg suggests they save money and get buried in the same grave.

programme.title: Married... with Children
programme.desc: When Al and Peg arrive at the bank to make a contribution to Buds college fund and see the balance in his account, they conclude the bank must have made an error and quickly withdraw the $25,000 for themselves. Unaware that its Buds scholarship money, Al and Peg go on a shopping spree. When Bud heads off to college and starts bouncing checks left and right, Al and Peg realize their mistake but are afraid to admit it. When Bud is arrested for passing bad checks, they blame the whole thing on Kelly and Bud is forced to live at home again. Feeling guilty, Al tries to make it up to Bud by joining him for a dorm panty raid.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew volunteers at a senior center but faces backlash when Gus spreads false abuse claims, leading to protests against Winfred-Louder.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew wins a vacation with Kate, but Lewis reveals Drews feelings for Kate, causing tension when Oswald stows away on their flight to the Bahamas.

programme.desc: Fran lobbies for change only to discover her parents are getting divorced.

programme.title: The Nanny

programme.title: Arrested Development

programme.title: Arrested Development

programme.title: My Name is Earl
programme.desc: Earl thinks he and Billie have nothing in common until he learns she has a karma list of her own. He helps her make reparations to a supermarket grocery-bagger they both wronged in the past.

programme.title: My Name is Earl
programme.desc: Taking romantic advice from his friends, Earl focuses on his list, hoping that karma will reward his good deeds by making the real Billie more like the Billie in his coma fantasy world.

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: When Doug and Carrie find an old cheque in a wedding present, they need to invite Dougs annoying relatives to write them a new one. The Heffernans plan on going to New Orleans with the money.

programme.desc: Carries work has an annual golf trip, but Doug and Carrie used to always take Deacon and Kelly. Now that Deacon and Kelly have split up, Doug and Carrie have to try and find another couple to invite to the golf trip.

programme.title: Married... with Children
programme.desc: When Al realizes he must buy Christmas gifts for his family, he is forced to get a job as a mall Santa. Sitting at the bar complaining to his coworkers, Al falls asleep and awakens to find he has spent all of his hard earned cash buying drinks for everyone. Furious about being taken by the unscrupulous bartender, Al returns home to shower the family with gifts of a dart board, beer stems, a television set and a gold chain - all courtesy of Rays Bar.

programme.sub-title: It Doesnt Get Any Better Than This
programme.desc: Al takes off on a fishing trip alone, but when Marcy seeks revenge on Jefferson for excessively charging on her credit cards, Peg invites Marcy to join her on Als vacation. Meanwhile, Jefferson claims his credit card abuse is merely one of the rights of an attractive person, and Kelly agrees. She advises him that if he spends a lot of money, Marcy will appreciate how little he used to spend, so they throw an extravagant party. Peg and Marcy return home, having unwittingly left Al locked outside the cabin with a snow storm approaching, to find the party going on in full force.

programme.title: Married... with Children
programme.desc: Kelly tries to recapture her youth by buying herself a motorcycle. When Peg learns of the purchase, she recalls her own erotic motorcycle experiences and Kelly must fight her for time with the bike. Al saddles up for a spin but winds up getting injured in an accident when Kelly runs into him with the car. Persuaded by her fathers wreck, Kelly swears off the motorcycle forever, leaving Peg to fulfil her fantasies with whats left of the bike.

programme.desc: After hearing about the unexpected death of their parcel deliveryman, Jamie and Paul decide to make an effort to tell everybody whos important to them that they love them.

programme.title: The Nanny
programme.sub-title: Love Is A Many Blundered Thing
programme.desc: Convinced Maxwell is her secret admirer, Fran prepares an elaborate Valentines Day surprise.

programme.title: The Nanny
programme.desc: Frans old foot modelling agency reunion is approaching, which has Fran worried about the signs of ageing.

programme.title: Married... with Children
programme.sub-title: It Doesnt Get Any Better Than This
programme.desc: Al takes off on a fishing trip alone, but when Marcy seeks revenge on Jefferson for excessively charging on her credit cards, Peg invites Marcy to join her on Als vacation. Meanwhile, Jefferson claims his credit card abuse is merely one of the rights of an attractive person, and Kelly agrees. She advises him that if he spends a lot of money, Marcy will appreciate how little he used to spend, so they throw an extravagant party. Peg and Marcy return home, having unwittingly left Al locked outside the cabin with a snow storm approaching, to find the party going on in full force.

programme.title: Married... with Children
programme.desc: Kelly tries to recapture her youth by buying herself a motorcycle. When Peg learns of the purchase, she recalls her own erotic motorcycle experiences and Kelly must fight her for time with the bike. Al saddles up for a spin but winds up getting injured in an accident when Kelly runs into him with the car. Persuaded by her fathers wreck, Kelly swears off the motorcycle forever, leaving Peg to fulfil her fantasies with whats left of the bike.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Drew struggles with his toast at Mr. Louders birthday, trying to please both Nicki and his friends, which ends up backfiring.

programme.title: The Drew Carey Show
programme.desc: Kate organizes a salon to impress Mrs. Louder, but it leads to a heated argument when the topic of internet censorship arises.

programme.title: The Nanny
programme.desc: Fran loses both her memory and Elizabeth Taylors priceless pearl necklace in an accident.

programme.title: The Nanny
programme.desc: Frans date with a highly superstitious hockey star sours after he claims shes a jinx.

programme.title: Arrested Development
programme.desc: The family unites behind Lindsays campaign, but Michael senses that something is amiss. Maeby has an idea that George-Michael likes a little too much.

programme.title: Police Academy 2: Their First Assignment
programme.desc: Theyve graduated and theyre loose on the streets! Somehow, the members of this oddball squad of eccentrics have earned their badges. Now on their first assignment, they must use all the wits in their relatively limited capacity to tackle hoodlums and a local gang. But they must also overcome the rogue officers within their own precinct who are trying to thwart their bumbling efforts.

programme.title: Kicking and Screaming
programme.desc: Phil Weston is a mild-mannered suburban dad - whos suddenly transformed into a caffeine-fuelled sports maniac when he becomes the coach of his sons unruly soccer team. But when the championship pits Phils underdog team against the squad coached by his own domineering dad, its game on for the most uproarious mismatch of the season.

programme.title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
programme.desc: Forty-year-old Andy Stitzer has done quite a few things in his life. Hes got a cushy job stamping invoices at an electronics superstore, a nice apartment with a proud collection of action figures and comic books, good friends, a nice attitude. But theres just one little thing he hasnt quite gotten around to doing yet - something most people have done by his age. Done a lot. Andys never, ever, ever had sex - not even by accident. So is that such a big deal? Well, for Andys buds at the store, it sure is. Although they think hes a bit of an oddball, theres certainly a planet full of stranger (and homelier) guys whove at least had one go at having a go. They consider it their duty to help Andy out of his dire situation and go to great lengths to help him.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: When he is ruled to be property and not a person, a foul-mouthed teddy bear seeks the aid of a legendary civil rights attorney to gain the justice he deserves.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: Beca is that girl whod rather listen to whats coming out of her headphones than whats coming out of you. Arriving at her new college, she finds herself not right for any clique but somehow is muscled into one that she never would have picked on her own: alongside mean girls, sweet girls and weird girls whose only thing in common is how good they sound when they sing together, in the out-loud comedy Pitch Perfect. When Beca takes this acoustic singing group out of their world of traditional arrangements and perfect harmonies into all-new mash-ups, they fight to climb their way to the top of the cutthroat world of college a cappella. This could wind up either the coolest thing theyll ever do or the most insane, and it will probably be a little of both.

programme.title: Dolittle
programme.desc: After losing his wife seven years earlier, the eccentric Dr. John Dolittle, famed doctor and veterinarian of Queen Victorias England, hermits himself away behind the high walls of Dolittle Manor with only his menagerie of exotic animals for company. But when the young queen falls gravely ill, a reluctant Dolittle is forced to set sail on an epic adventure to a mythical island in search of a cure, regaining his wit and courage as he crosses old adversaries and discovers wondrous creatures.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
programme.desc: Robin of Loxley, is a handsome medieval knight who comes home early from the Crusades to defend England against a hostile takeover. The culprits with their eyes on the throne are the pampered and royally neurotic Prince John and his co-villain, the thoroughly rotten Sheriff of Rottingham. Aided by his band of merry men, Robin wrests power away from the Prince, brings humiliation upon the despicable Sheriff, and finds the keys - to the heart of the fair maid Marian as well as to her Everlast chastity belt.

programme.title: Kicking and Screaming

programme.title: A Million Ways to Die in the West
programme.desc: When Albert loses his girlfriend to his moustached nemesis, a mysterious and beautiful woman rides into town and turns his luck around. But when her notorious outlaw husband arrives seeking revenge, Albert must put his new-found courage to the test.

programme.title: Here Today
programme.desc: Veteran comedy writer Charlie Burnz forms an unlikely yet hilarious and touching friendship with New York lounge singer Emma Payge. Emma unexpectedly wins a lunch with the comedy legend, and their friendship gets off to an extremely rocky start (think seafood allergy, a hospital visit, and an epi pen). Before long, each finds in the other a sort of soul mate, forging a deep bond that kicks the generation gap aside and redefines the meaning of friendship, love, and trust.

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: NASCAR stock car racing sensation Ricky Bobby is a national hero because of his "win at all costs" approach. He and his loyal racing partner, childhood friend Cal Naughton Jr., are a fearless duo - "Shake" and "Bake" by their fans for their ability to finish so many races in the #1 and #2 positions, with Cal always in second place. When flamboyant French Formula One driver Jean Girard challenges "Shake" and "Bake" for the supremacy of NASCAR, Ricky Bobby must face his own demons and fight Girard for the right to be known as racings top driver.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: This film follows devoted lifeguard Mitch Buchannon as he butts heads with a brash new recruit. Together, they uncover a local criminal plot that threatens the future of the bay. For a generation of TV fans the world over, the name Baywatch conjures up images of sun, surf and statuesque lifeguards, running in slow-motion in form-fitting red swimsuits.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having finally gotten used to each others existence, Brad and Dusty must now deal with their intrusive fathers during the holidays.

programme.title: Little Nicky
programme.desc: When Satan reneges on his plans to retire, two of his three heirs leave Hell for New York City to gather enough souls to vote the Prince of Darkness out of office. But Satan sends his youngest and nicest son, Little Nicky, to bring his two treacherous brothers home.

programme.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
programme.desc: "Im Ron Burgundy, heres whats happening in your world, tonight." Ron Burgundy is a top-rated 1970s San Diego anchorman, who believes women have a place in the newsroom - as long as they stick to covering fashion shows or late-breaking cooking stories. So when Ron is told hell be working with a bright, young newswoman whos beautiful, ambitious and smart enough to be more than eye candy, its not just a clash of two TV people with really great hair - its war.

programme.title: American Pie: The Wedding
programme.desc: Stifler takes centre stage in the funniest and grossest sequel to the American Pie series. Jim and Michelles wedding plans are rushed through and nothing goes smoothly in this instalment that will have you rolling in the aisles This farcical conclusion to the breakthrough series has enough poo jokes, pre-wedding crimes against nature and goofiness to keep die-hard Pie-eaters coming back for more.

programme.title: Meet the Parents
programme.desc: Male nurse Greg Focker is poised to propose to his girlfriend Pam during a weekend stay at her parents home. But heres the catch he needs to ask her father first. Alas, the fur flies as Jack Byrnes, Pams cat-crazy, ex-CIA father takes an immediate dislike to her less-than-truthful beau. Gregs quest for approval gets seriously side-tracked as Murphys Law takes over and a hilarious string of mishaps turns him into a master of disaster and total pariah in the eyes of the entire family, all except for his shell-shocked girlfriend, who cant believe she still lovers her one-man wrecking crew.

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: Chip Douglas, a cable installer raised on television sitcoms, he wants life to look just like My Three Sons. And when he meets single guy Steven Kovacs, he sees his chance for some serious male bonding. But Chips idea of friendship - which includes physical assault, a game of Porno Password and a medieval joust - may be hazardous to Stevens health. In Chips own immortal words, "I can be your best friend or your worst enemy."

programme.title: The Hangover Part II
programme.desc: Phil, Stu and their mates travel to Thailand for Stus subdued pre-wedding brunch after the unforgettable bachelor party in Vegas. However, things dont go to plan.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: After the highs of winning the World Championships, the Bellas find themselves split apart and discovering there arent job prospects for making music with your mouth. But when they get the chance to reunite for an overseas USO tour, this group of awesome nerds will come together to make some music, and some questionable decisions, one last time.

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: Playboy bunny Shelley Darlington is tossed out of the Playboy Mansion with nowhere to go. Somehow fate delivers Shelley to the sorority girls of Zeta Alpha Zeta, a clueless bunch who stand to lose their house, unless they can learn what only Shelley can teach them. And Shelley learns that boys really like whats on the inside too.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: Well, there goes the neighbourhood - in a pine box. When hit man Jimmy "The Tulip" Tudeski moves into a comfy suburb, everyones suddenly in danger of pushing up daisies. And its not all Jimmys doing either. Jonathan Lynn directs and a talented ensemble cast packs heat in this manic comedy about life, love and plenty of ammo. Bruce Willis plays Jimmy, whose arrival sparks a chain reaction in which just about everybody wants to clip somebody else. Matthew Perry plays a hapless dentist who finds a way to get on the Tulips good and bad sides.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: After his dream of stardom on the hockey ice melts, Happy Gilmore discovers he has a gift that could bring him glory on the greens. Trouble is, with his hot head and hard-hitting drives, Happy doesnt just play golf, he destroys it. With the help of a retired golfer and hot publicist, can Happy perfect his game and tame his temper to win the tournament prize money?

programme.title: NCIS

programme.desc: Following the crash of a prisoner transport plane, the NCIS team must find the convicts that escaped. Meanwhile, Sam Hanna and Tennant are tasked with locating a high-profile Russian prisoner.

programme.desc: Follows Australias first pro tour cycling team and gives insight into the first five years of their journey.

programme.desc: The team face unlikely odds against rivals Melbourne Victory in a two match semi-final.

programme.title: United
programme.desc: The United underdogs face off against the current A-League Champions for the title.

programme.title: White Silk Road
programme.desc: WHITE SILK ROAD tells the story of three Australian snowboarders who travelled to Afghanistan to carry the sport across new frontiers. In one of the most dangerous parts of the world, they discovered incredible mountains, breathtaking landscapes, and heartwarming communities of hospitable people.

programme.title: Chills: The Triumph and Tragedy Of Martin
programme.desc: The story of lyrical genius, Martin Phillipps and his band, The Chills, is a cautionary tale, a triumph over tragedy, and a statement about the meaning of music in our lives.

programme.title: Carmine Street Guitars
programme.desc: One shop in the heart of New Yorks Greenwich Village remains resilient to encroaching gentrification, Carmine Street Guitars. Custom guitar maker Rick Kelly and his young apprentice Cindy Hulej build handcrafted instruments out of reclaimed wood from old hotels, bars, churches and other local buildings. Nothing looks or sounds like them, which is the reason they have been embraced by the likes of Bob Dylan, Lou Reed and Patti Smith. Featuring a cast of prominent musicians and artists, Eszter Balint, Christine Bougie (Bahamas), Nels Cline (Wilco), Kirk Douglas (The Roots), Eleanor Friedberger, Bill Frisell, Dallas Good (The Sadies), Travis Good (The Sadies), Dave Hill, Jaime Hince (The Kills), Stewart Hurwood, Jim Jarmusch (Squrl), Lenny Kaye (Patti Smith Band), Marc Ribot and Charlie Sexton (Bob Dylan Band).

programme.title: Lou Reeds Berlin
programme.desc: Lou Reeds 2006 live concert performance of his 1973 concept album, Berlin, filmed over five nights at St Anns Warehouse in Brooklyn, New York.

programme.title: The Dirty Three
programme.desc: Spawned from the intensely collaborative local Australian music scene in the 80s and early 90s, the Dirty Three pioneer the instrumental rock and roll music scene in Australia.

programme.title: Ben Lee: Catch My Disease
programme.desc: Claire Danes, Mike D, Winona Ryder, Zooey Deschanel and others feature in Amiel Courtin-Wilsons chronicle of pop star Ben Lees rise to fame.

programme.title: Elizabeth: A Portrait In Part(S)
programme.desc: This is a nostalgic, uplifting, and modern documentary about Queen Elizabeth II, the greatest British monarch of all time and longest-serving female head of state in history. For the last nine decades Queen Elizabeth II has been entrenched in our collective consciousness, instantly recognisable, yet elusively and perpetually unknowable. Until now.

programme.title: Shackleton: Greatest Story of Survival
programme.desc: Twenty-eight lost adventurers must fight for their lives after their only lifeline is destroyed in the most uninhabitable place on Earth: Antarctica.

programme.title: Almost Unsolved
programme.desc: Exploring murder cases where investigations stalled or went cold, often for decades.

programme.title: Almost Unsolved
programme.desc: Exploring murder cases where investigations stalled or went cold, often for decades.

programme.title: Top 10 Secrets and Mysteries
programme.desc: Investigating global examples of human sacrifice fuelled by religious and cultural beliefs, including ritualistic burnings and bloodlettings.

programme.title: Top 10 Secrets and Mysteries
programme.desc: Examining ten notable cases of information that is deemed unacceptable for public consumption, including missing Biblical gospels and a baffling manuscript.

programme.title: The Princess
programme.desc: THE PRINCESS tells the story of Princess Diana exclusively through contemporaneous archival footage creating a bold and immersive narrative of her life and death. Turning the camera back on ourselves, the film illuminates the profound impact she had and how the publics attitude to the monarchy was and still is, shaped by these events.

programme.title: Liam Gallagher: As It Was
programme.desc: Liam Gallagher: As It Was tells the honest and emotional story of how one of the most electrifying rock n roll frontmen went from the dizzying heights of his champagne supernova years in Oasis to living on the edge, ostracised and lost in the musical wilderness of booze, notoriety and bitter legal battles. Starting again alone, stripped bare and with nowhere to hide, Liam risks everything to make the greatest rocknroll comeback of all time. Directors Charlie Lightening and Gavin Fitzgerald invite us backstage for a no-holdsbarred look at the life of one of the most talked-about and charismatic artists of his generation.

programme.title: Oasis: Supersonic
programme.desc: This palpable, raw and moving film shines a light on one of the most genre- and generation-defining British bands that has ever existed.

programme.title: Becoming Led Zeppelin
programme.desc: Interviews, performances and never-before-seen footage provide insight into the origins of Led Zeppelin and their meteoric rise to musical stardom.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A Harvard professor implicated in a murder must unravel an ancient code to expose the greatest conspiracy in history.

programme.title: Cold Pursuit
programme.desc: Welcome to Kehoe, its -10 degrees and counting at this glitzy ski resort in the Rocky Mountains. The local police arent used to much action until the son of unassuming town snowplough driver, Nels Coxman, is murdered at the order of Viking, a flamboyant drug lord. Fuelled by rage and armed with heavy machinery, Nels sets out to dismantle the cartel one man at a time, but his understanding of murder comes mainly from what he read in a crime novel. As the bodies pile up, his actions ignite a turf war between Viking and his long-standing rival White Bull, a soulful Native-American mafia boss, that will quickly escalate and turn the small towns bright white slopes blood-red.

programme.title: Cat Person
programme.desc: When Margot, a college sophomore, goes on a date with the older Robert, she finds that IRL Robert doesnt live up to the Robert she has been flirting with over texts.

programme.title: Bee Gees: Broken Heart
programme.desc: An exploration of the history of the Bee Gees, featuring revealing interviews with oldest brother Barry Gibb, and archival interviews with the late twin brothers Robin and Maurice.

programme.title: Hailey Dean: A Prescription For Murder
programme.desc: A psychologist and former prosecutor aids a detective in investigating a rapidly growing string of murders at Atlanta Memorial Hospital.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: Hannibal The Cannibal Lecter comes out of hiding to draw FBI agent Clarice Starling into a new high-stakes battle that will test her strength, cunning, and loyalty.
