programme.title: Public Enemies
programme.desc: John Dillinger, a charismatic and elusive bank robber, is marked by the FBI as Americas first Public Enemy No.1 and Billie Frechette is the only woman capable of capturing his heart. Hunted relentlessly by top FBI agent Melvin Purvis, Dillinger engages in an escalating game of outrunning and outgunning the FBI, culminating in an explosive, legendary showdown.

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A newly separated teacher gives in to temptation when the handsome teenager next door attempts to seduce her. But trouble ensues when she tries to end the relationship.

programme.title: The Convert
programme.desc: A preachers violent past is drawn into question and his faith tested as he becomes caught up in a bloody war between Maori tribes after arriving at a British settlement in the 1830s.

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can
programme.desc: This is the extraordinary true story of a brilliant young master of deception and the FBI agent hot on his trail. This film follows Frank Abagnale Jr as he successfully passes himself off as a pilot, a lawyer and a doctor - all before his 21st birthday.

programme.title: Where The Crawdads Sing
programme.desc: This is the story of Kya, an abandoned girl who raised herself to adulthood in the dangerous marshlands of North Carolina. For years, rumors of the "Marsh Girl" haunted Barkley Cove, isolating the sharp and resilient Kya from her community. Drawn to two young men from town, Kya opens herself to a new and startling world; but when one of them is found dead, she is immediately cast by the community as the main suspect. As the case unfolds, the verdict as to what actually happened becomes increasingly unclear, threatening to reveal the many secrets that lay within the marsh.

programme.title: Jesse Stone: Stone Cold
programme.desc: A series of strange murders sends shivers through a quiet New England town. Its up to a hard-as-nails police chief Jesse Stone to find the psychopath behind the savage crimes.

For years, rumors of the "Marsh Girl" haunted Barkley Cove, isolating the sharp and resilient Kya from her community. Drawn to two young men from town, Kya opens herself to a new and startling world; but when one of them is found dead, she is immediately cast by the community as the main suspect. As the case unfolds, the verdict as to what actually happened becomes increasingly unclear, threatening to reveal the many secrets that lay within the marsh.

programme.title: Jesse Stone: Stone Cold
programme.desc: A series of strange murders sends shivers through a quiet New England town. Its up to a hard-as-nails police chief Jesse Stone to find the psychopath behind the savage crimes.

programme.title: Non-Stop
programme.desc: A suspense thriller played out at 40,000 feet in the air. During a transatlantic flight from New York City to London, US Air Marshal Bill Marks receives a series of cryptic text messages demanding that he instruct the airline to transfer $150 million into an off-shore account. Until he secures the money, a passenger on his flight will be killed every 20 minutes.

programme.title: Basic Instinct
programme.desc: Detective Nick Currans investigation of a rock stars brutal murder leads him to glacial beauty and best-selling author Catherine Tramell. Despite Nicks entanglement with police psychologist Dr Beth Garner and the ever-present Roxy, Catherines sultry and possessive girlfriend, the two begin a torrid affair. But when Nick discovers that Catherines fictional, murderous storylines have a habit of coming true, he begins to wonder if his attraction to Catherine might turn out to be a fatal one.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: As war rages in Europe, a Nazi-scalping squad of American soldiers, known to their enemy as The Basterds, is on a daring mission to take down the leaders of the Third Reich.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: Pete and Ellie must learn the ropes of instant parenthood when they bring in three foster children. Inspired by a true story, discover this must-see family comedy from the creators of Daddys Home.

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: Just released from prison, all Rudy Duncan wants is to start a new life with Ashley, the girl of his dreams, whom he met through pen pal letters in prison. But between them and happiness stands her crazy brother, Gabriel, and his motley crew of deadly criminals who think Rudy has some inside information about a casino where he once had a job, a casino Gabriel and his short-fused posse plan to take down. Now, just as Rudy is beginning his new life, hes caught in a high-velocity avalanche of temptations and surprises that could bury him, unless he can artfully dodge them.

programme.desc: A small-town police chief investigates the life of an unhappy teen after her corpse is found floating in a lake.

Tag and Scooch offer to help, but its too many chores to do on their own, so Tag builds a robot to help. But when Frank and Beans catch wind of the robot, they try to swipe it so that it will do their personal chores. programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his "big bad" year on the zodiac calendar - which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNais superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he "breaks up" with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: HydroCleaner XL
programme.desc: HydroCleanerXL - Clean High and Hard To Reach Places Safe, Fast and Easy, With The HydroCleaner XL. This Ultra-Long Water Brush Is A Portable, Handheld Tool That Extends, Soaps, Scrubs, Cleans, Squeegees, And Rinses, All In One.

programme.title: Lawn Barber
programme.desc: FREE DELIVERY + 4 BONUS DOUBLE-SIDED TRIMMING BLADES! Lawn Barber is the Super-Lightweight, Cordless, Battery Powered, Two-In-One Trimmer And Edger, That Makes Grooming Your Garden And Outdoor Spaces, Quick, Easy and Comfortable.

programme.title: Jet Hawk
programme.desc: Jet Hawk - The Powerful, Portable, Hand-Held Pressure Washer, That Goes Where Other Pressure Washers Cant! Connects To Garden Hoses Plus It Can Draw Clean Water From Any Source, Like A Bucket, Bath Or Pool.

programme.title: Copper Chef Titan Pan
programme.desc: Copper Chef Titan Pan - WITH $120 IN FREE GIFTS + ACCESSORIES - Its the Ultimate, Professional, All Purpose, Stainless Steel Pan Created by Copper Chef and Celebrity Chef Jet Tila. With Tri-Ply Design And Laser Etched Cooking Surface!

programme.title: 5 Minute CleverChef
programme.desc: The Fast, Fuss-Free Way To Cook Homemade Meals, Snacks and Desserts In Minutes. Dual-Sided Oval Cooking Plates Heat From Both Sides For Perfectly Cooked Results, No Flipping Needed. Perfect For Omelettes, Burgers, Pancakes and More.

programme.title: Horsepower Giddy Up
programme.desc: The ultimate cordless, powered BBQ grill cleaner that tackles burnt-on messes with ease - no scraping or scrubbing required. Hgh-torque motor spins a stainless-steel mesh roller at 350 RPM, lifting stuck-on food and grime.

programme.title: 5 Minute CleverChef
programme.desc: The Fast, Fuss-Free Way To Cook Homemade Meals, Snacks and Desserts In Minutes. Dual-Sided Oval Cooking Plates Heat From Both Sides For Perfectly Cooked Results, No Flipping Needed. Perfect For Omelettes, Burgers, Pancakes and More.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: A tale which follows the adventures of a wild and rambunctious mustang stallion as he journeys through the untamed American frontiers, encountering man for the first time, Spirit defies being broken, even as he develops a remarkable friendship with a young Lakota brave named Little Creek. The young stallion also finds love with a beautiful paint mare named Rain on his way to becoming one of the greatest unsung heroes of the Old West.

programme.title: Spirit Untamed
programme.desc: The next chapter in this beloved franchise begins as a young girl finds a connection to her mothers legacy as a trick rider and forms a bond with a wild mustang named Spirit.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains new-found, spider-like powers and ventures out to save the city from the machinations of a mysterious reptilian foe.

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr, whos intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down, when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison.

programme.title: Megamind
programme.desc: Megamind is the most brilliant super-villain the world has ever known, and the least successful. Over the years he has tried to conquer Metro City in every imaginable way. Each attempt, a colossal failure thanks to the caped superhero known as Metro Man, until the day Megamind actually defeats him in the throes of one of his botched evil plans. Suddenly, the fate of Metro City is threatened when a new villain arrives and chaos runs rampant, leaving everyone to wonder: can the worlds biggest mind actually save the day?

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: In the brand new adventure Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle, the tables are turned as four teenagers are sucked into the world of Jumanji. When four high-school kids discover an old video game console with a game theyve never heard of Jumanji they are immediately drawn into the games jungle setting, literally becoming the avatars they chose: gamer Spencer becomes a brawny adventurer; football jock Fridge loses (in his words) the top two feet of his body and becomes an Einstein; popular girl Bethany becomes a middle-aged male professor; and wallflower Martha becomes a badass warrior. What they discover is that you dont just play Jumanji you must survive it. To beat the game and return to the real world, theyll have to go on the most dangerous adventure of their lives, discover what Alan Parrish left 20 years ago, and change the way they think about themselves or theyll be stuck in the game forever.

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: When Troll Village is invaded by the Bergens, two mismatched trolls must try and tolerate each other as they set out on a journey to rescue their friends.

programme.title: Sing 2
programme.desc: Buster Moon and his friends must persuade reclusive rock star Clay Calloway to join them for the opening of a new show.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
programme.desc: Our friendly neighbourhood Super Hero decides to join his best friends Ned, MJ, and the rest of the gang on a European vacation. However, Peters plan to leave super heroics behind for a few weeks are quickly scrapped when he begrudgingly agrees to help Nick Fury uncover the mystery of several elemental creature attacks, creating havoc across the continent!

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: The inspirational story of a shy Yorkshire piglet who doesnt quite know his place in the world. But when Farmer Hoggett wins him at the county fair, Babe discovers that he can be anything he wants to be - even an award-winning sheepdog. With the help of a delightful assortment of barnyard friends, the heroic little pig is headed for the challenge of his life in this endearing and fun-filled tale the whole family will love.

programme.title: Major Payne
programme.desc: When peace breaks out in America, killing machine Major Benson Winifred Payne, United States Marine Corps Special Forces, is given his marching orders: to the unemployment line. Unable to cope with civilian life, Payne is thrust back into the military regiment as commander of the Madison Academy Junior ROTC.

programme.title: Mr. Peabody and Sherman
programme.desc: Mr Peabody, the most accomplished dog in the world, and his mischievous boy Sherman, use their time machine - the WABAC - to go on the most outrageous adventures known to man or dog. But when Sherman takes the WABAC out for a joyride to impress his friend Penny, they accidentally rip a hole in the universe, wreaking havoc on the most important events in world history. Before they forever alter the past, present and future, Mr. Peabody must come to their rescue, ultimately facing the most daunting challenge of any era: figuring out how to be a parent. Together, the time traveling trio will make their mark on history.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Clumsy and overweight panda, Po, dreams of becoming a kung fu master.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Peter Banning is a 40-year-old corporate takeover lawyer who has lost any memory of being Peter Pan. Peter and his family travel to London to visit Granny Wendy. Peter discovers a note from Captain Hook informing Peter that he has kidnapped his children. With the encouragement of Tinkerbell, Peter once again takes wing, and its off to Neverland to rescue his kids.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: George and Harold are fourth-grade BFFs who love dreaming up funny pranks. One day, they accidentally hypnotise their principal into believing hes a dimwitted hero named Captain Underpants. But when the new schoolteacher turns out to be a disgraced scientist bent on ridding the world of laughter, George, Harold and Captain Underpants must band together to stop his evil agenda.

programme.title: Madagascar 3: Europes Most Wanted
programme.desc: Alex the Lion, Marty the Zebra, Gloria the Hippo, and Melman the Giraffe are still fighting to get home to their beloved Big Apple and of course, King Julien, Maurice, and the Penguins are all along for the ride. Their journey takes them through Europe where they find the perfect cover: a travelling circus, which they reinvent Madagascar style.

programme.title: Balto
programme.desc: Part husky/part wolf, Balto doesnt know where he belongs. Hes an outcast in Alaska, except to his true friends - Boris, the Russian snow goose; polar bear cubs Muk and Luk; and the beautiful husky, Jenna. Even though hes different, all of Baltos friends recognise what he still cant see himself: his noble spirit. One day, a serious diphtheria epidemic spreads fast among the children of Nome. When a fierce blizzard closes off all routes of transport, theres no way to obtain lifesaving medicine unless a team of sled dogs can race six-hundred miles through the blinding Arctic storm and bring back anti-toxin. But when the dogs get lost in the frozen wilderness, only Balto can rescue the team and save the children.

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: In the final chapter of this popular animation franchise, Mike Myers voices Shrek, who is not scaring villagers away like he used to, but now agrees to autograph pitch forks. Longing for the days when he felt like a real ogre, Shrek is duped into signing a pact with the smooth-talking deal-maker, Rumpelstiltskin (Walt Dohrn). Shrek now finds himself in a twisted, alternate version of Far Far Away, where ogres are hunted, Rumpelstiltskin is king and Shrek and Fiona (Cameron Diaz) have never met. Shrek must undo all hes done in the hope of saving his friends, restoring his world and reclaiming his one true love.

programme.title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: It has been four years since the disaster at Jurassic Park and two groups are in a race against time that will determine the fate of the remote islands prehistoric inhabitants.

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: Seven-year-old Tim Templeton suddenly finds his share of parental love plummeting when his new baby brother arrives - wearing a suit and toting a briefcase - and makes it clear to everyone that hes in charge. But when Tim discovers that Boss Baby is on a secret mission, he reluctantly agrees to team up with his pint-sized sibling for an epic adventure that might just change the world!

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Travel back to the stone-age in this big-budget treatment of the worlds favourite prehistoric family! Fred Flintstone, a put-upon blue-collar worker struggling to squeak by, with the help of his best buddy Barney and his wife Wilma. After an aptitude test mix up, Fred Flintstone trades his job as Slate and Company Bronto-crane operator for a vice presidency. But theres trouble brewing in Bedrock: An evil executive and his sinister secretary are now plotting to use Fred as the fall guy in an embezzlement scheme!

programme.title: Dr. Seuss the Lorax
programme.desc: Dr. Seuss The Lorax is an adaptation of Dr. Seuss classic tale of a forest creature who shares the enduring power of hope. In the walled city of Thneed-Ville, where everything is artificial and even the air is a commodity, a boy named Ted hopes to win the heart of his dream girl, Audrey. When he learns of her wish to see a real tree, Ted seeks out the Once-ler, a ruined old businessman outside of town in a stark wasteland. Upon hearing of how the hermit gave into his greed for profits and devastated the land over the protests of the Lorax, Ted is inspired to undo the disaster. However, the greedy Mayor of Thneed-Ville, Aloysius OHare, has made his fortune exploiting the environmental collapse and is determined to stop the boy from undermining his business.

programme.title: Chicken Run
programme.desc: While the chickens on evil Mrs Tweedys farm dream of a better life, a clever hen named Ginger is hatching plans to fly the coop for good. The only problem is, chickens cant fly or can they? Every escape attempt goes fowl until Rocky, a smooth-talking All-American rooster, crash-lands into the coop. Its hardly poultry in motion when Rocky attempts to teach Ginger and her fine feathered friends to fly but, with teamwork, determination and a little bit of cluck, the fearless flock plots one last daring attempt in a spectacular bid for freedom! Featuring unforgettable characters, incredible animation and all-star voice talent, this instant classic from the academy Award-winning creators of Wallace and Gromit is eggs-traordinary fun for the whole family!

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Spider-Mans greatest battle begins when an evil corporation attempts world domination by deploying an army of super villains to crush Peter Parker.

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Recruited from youngsters into the global spy game, four penguins are called into action by a mysterious espionage organisation in order to save the world from a villainous octopus.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: A tale which follows the adventures of a wild and rambunctious mustang stallion as he journeys through the untamed American frontiers, encountering man for the first time, Spirit defies being broken, even as he develops a remarkable friendship with a young Lakota brave named Little Creek. The young stallion also finds love with a beautiful paint mare named Rain on his way to becoming one of the greatest unsung heroes of the Old West.

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy and Jeff Garlin put their parenting skills to the test in this hilarious caper about two sacked admen and newly stay-at-home dads who open their own day-care centre.

programme.title: Shaun the Sheep Movie
programme.desc: When Shaun decides to take the day off and have some fun, he gets a little more action than he bargained for. A mix-up with the Farmer, a caravan, and a very steep hill leads them all to the Big City, and its up to Shaun to return everyone safely home.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: A young Peter Parker/Spider-Man begins to navigate his new-found identity as the web-slinging superhero. Thrilled by his experience with the Avengers, Peter returns home where he lives with his Aunt May, under the watchful eye of his new mentor, Tony Stark. Peter tries to fall back into his normal daily routine - distracted by thoughts of proving himself to be more than just your friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man. But when the Vulture emerges as a new villain, everything that Peter holds most important will be threatened.

programme.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
programme.desc: While visiting the Earth at Night, a group of alien botanists is discovered and disturbed by an approaching human task force. Because of the more than hasty take-off, one of the visitors is left behind. The little alien finds himself all alone on a very strange planet. Fortunately, the extra-terrestrial soon finds a friend and emotional companion in 10-year-old Elliot, who discovered him looking for food in his familys garden shed. While E.T. slowly gets acquainted with Elliots brother Michael, his sister Gertie as well as with Earth customs, members of the task force work day and night to track down the whereabouts of Earths first visitor from Outer Space.

programme.title: The Sloth Lane
programme.desc: After a terrifying storm destroys their home, a speedy sloth named Laura and her kooky family move to the big city in their rusted old food truck hoping to make their business a success.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Ninja
programme.desc: An elite society of Japanese warriors has prophesised that one day a blonde-haired fair-skinned child will come to their village and lead them as a fighter of a remarkable skill and bravery. So when an American child who fell overboard on an ocean liner washes up on their shores, they adopt him as one of their own and patiently instruct him in the ways of a ninja. Trouble is, the child, whom they name Haru, grows up to be fat, clumsy, not especially bright, and startlingly inept as a warrior. Undaunted, Haru struggles on with his ninja training, and when Alison, a beautiful woman from America, requests a ninja fighter to return with her to the states and protect her from her criminal-minded boyfriend and his Yakuza associates, Haru eagerly accepts the assignment. Harus minders see trouble brewing, so they secretly send along a fellow ninja, Gobei, to watch his back, although this hardly prevents Haru from posing a deadly menace to inanimate objects everywhere.

programme.title: The Lost Tiger
programme.desc: Adopted by a wrestler kangaroo family, Teos life changes when visions guide him to his roots. He sets off on an epic journey to save his homeland from destruction.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: Spring has sprung, and Verne and his woodland friends awaken from their long winters nap to discover that a large, green hedge has cropped up right through the middle of their once-natural habitat. Enter RJ, an opportunistic raccoon who explains that the world beyond the hedge is the gateway to the good life where peculiar creatures called humans live to eat, rather than eat to live. "For humans," RJ proclaims, "enough is never enough."

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: Desperate to find their missing son, Paul and his wife Amanda trick eminent palaeontologist Dr Alan Grant into accompanying them to Isla Sorna. The small team embark on a dangerous task, searching through a deserted island inhabited by ferocious dinosaurs.

programme.title: Bee Movie
programme.desc: A bee is abuzz over a scandal: people are stealing honey to eat. With the help of a florist, he sues the human race for honey laundering.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: Set in the mythical world of burly Vikings and fire-breathing dragons, a Viking teenager takes in an injured dragon and sees an opportunity to set his tribe on a new course.

programme.title: Khumba
programme.desc: Rejected by his superstitious herd, a half-striped zebra embarks on a daring quest to earn his stripes but finds the courage and self-acceptance to save all the animals of the Great Karoo.

programme.title: The Pirates Who Dont Do Anything
programme.desc: Those vegie-eating boys are back. Three veggies serve as cabin boys at a pirate-themed dinner theatre, where they long to move from table service to the stage show, but their incompetence, laziness and cowardice get in the way. But when a princess drags them into the 17th century to rescue her brother, whos been kidnapped by a nefarious pirate with designs on her kingdom, they have to overcome their issues and become heroes.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit: Curse Of Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: Wallace and Gromits latest enterprise is Anti-Pesto, pest control with a heart. When called upon by the dotty Lady Tottington to solve her rabbit infestation, Wallace tangles with her Ladyships would-be suitor, rotten cad Victor Quartermaine. At first Wallace and Gromit seem to have things in hand. But Wallaces mind transference device malfunctions, and hes in danger of being bagged by Quartermaine. Wallace teeters perilously close to disaster and his four-legged pal, Gromit, faces almost insurmountable odds to save the day!

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets 2
programme.desc: Terrier Max is coping with some major life changes. His owner is now married and has a toddler, Liam. Max is so worried about protecting the boy that he develops a nervous tic. On a family trip to a farm, Max and mutt Duke encounter canine-intolerant cows, hostile foxes and a terrifying turkey, all of which only elevates Maxs anxiety. Luckily, Max gets some guidance from veteran farm dog Rooster, who pushes Max to ditch his neuroses, find his inner alpha and give Liam a little more freedom.

programme.title: Beethoven
programme.desc: Fall in love with the big-hearted, wet-nosed star of this outrageous comedy. With nefarious dognappers hot on his heels, an adorable puppy named Beethoven adopts the unsuspecting Newton family and promptly grows up into 185 pounds of romping, drooling, disaster-prone St Bernard. George is the none-too-thrilled father whose disdain for the cuddly canine turns to loyalty after Beethoven becomes the target of unspeakable animal experimentation. Now its up to George to save the day in this fetching adventure thats fun for the whole family.

programme.title: Tad The Lost Explorer
programme.desc: Due to a fortuitous mix-up, Tad, a dreamy construction worker, is mistaken for a famous archaeologist and sent on an expedition to Peru. With the help of Jeff, his faithful dog, an intrepid teacher, a mute parrot and a hustler, they will try to save the mythical Lost City of the Incas from an evil band of treasure hunters.

programme.title: The Prince of Egypt
programme.desc: This is the extraordinary tale of two brothers, one born of royal blood, one an orphan with a secret past. Growing up the best of friends, they share the strong bond of free-spirited youth and good-natured rivalry. But the truth will ultimately set them at odds, as one becomes the ruler of the most powerful empire on earth, the other the chosen leader of his people. Their final confrontation will forever change their lives - and the world.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: A tale which follows the adventures of a wild and rambunctious mustang stallion as he journeys through the untamed American frontiers, encountering man for the first time, Spirit defies being broken, even as he develops a remarkable friendship with a young Lakota brave named Little Creek. The young stallion also finds love with a beautiful paint mare named Rain on his way to becoming one of the greatest unsung heroes of the Old West.

However, the greedy Mayor of Thneed-Ville, Aloysius OHare, has made his fortune exploiting the environmental collapse and is determined to stop the boy from undermining his business.

programme.title: Chicken Run
programme.desc: While the chickens on evil Mrs Tweedys farm dream of a better life, a clever hen named Ginger is hatching plans to fly the coop for good. The only problem is, chickens cant fly or can they? Every escape attempt goes fowl until Rocky, a smooth-talking All-American rooster, crash-lands into the coop. Its hardly poultry in motion when Rocky attempts to teach Ginger and her fine feathered friends to fly but, with teamwork, determination and a little bit of cluck, the fearless flock plots one last daring attempt in a spectacular bid for freedom! Featuring unforgettable characters, incredible animation and all-star voice talent, this instant classic from the academy Award-winning creators of Wallace and Gromit is eggs-traordinary fun for the whole family!

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Spider-Mans greatest battle begins when an evil corporation attempts world domination by deploying an army of super villains to crush Peter Parker.

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Recruited from youngsters into the global spy game, four penguins are called into action by a mysterious espionage organisation in order to save the world from a villainous octopus.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: A tale which follows the adventures of a wild and rambunctious mustang stallion as he journeys through the untamed American frontiers, encountering man for the first time, Spirit defies being broken, even as he develops a remarkable friendship with a young Lakota brave named Little Creek. The young stallion also finds love with a beautiful paint mare named Rain on his way to becoming one of the greatest unsung heroes of the Old West.

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy and Jeff Garlin put their parenting skills to the test in this hilarious caper about two sacked admen and newly stay-at-home dads who open their own day-care centre.

programme.title: Shaun the Sheep Movie
programme.desc: When Shaun decides to take the day off and have some fun, he gets a little more action than he bargained for. A mix-up with the Farmer, a caravan, and a very steep hill leads them all to the Big City, and its up to Shaun to return everyone safely home.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: A young Peter Parker/Spider-Man begins to navigate his new-found identity as the web-slinging superhero. Thrilled by his experience with the Avengers, Peter returns home where he lives with his Aunt May, under the watchful eye of his new mentor, Tony Stark. Peter tries to fall back into his normal daily routine - distracted by thoughts of proving himself to be more than just your friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man. But when the Vulture emerges as a new villain, everything that Peter holds most important will be threatened.

programme.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
programme.desc: While visiting the Earth at Night, a group of alien botanists is discovered and disturbed by an approaching human task force. Because of the more than hasty take-off, one of the visitors is left behind. The little alien finds himself all alone on a very strange planet. Fortunately, the extra-terrestrial soon finds a friend and emotional companion in 10-year-old Elliot, who discovered him looking for food in his familys garden shed. While E.T. slowly gets acquainted with Elliots brother Michael, his sister Gertie as well as with Earth customs, members of the task force work day and night to track down the whereabouts of Earths first visitor from Outer Space.

programme.title: The Sloth Lane
programme.desc: After a terrifying storm destroys their home, a speedy sloth named Laura and her kooky family move to the big city in their rusted old food truck hoping to make their business a success.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Ninja
programme.desc: An elite society of Japanese warriors has prophesised that one day a blonde-haired fair-skinned child will come to their village and lead them as a fighter of a remarkable skill and bravery. So when an American child who fell overboard on an ocean liner washes up on their shores, they adopt him as one of their own and patiently instruct him in the ways of a ninja. Trouble is, the child, whom they name Haru, grows up to be fat, clumsy, not especially bright, and startlingly inept as a warrior. Undaunted, Haru struggles on with his ninja training, and when Alison, a beautiful woman from America, requests a ninja fighter to return with her to the states and protect her from her criminal-minded boyfriend and his Yakuza associates, Haru eagerly accepts the assignment. Harus minders see trouble brewing, so they secretly send along a fellow ninja, Gobei, to watch his back, although this hardly prevents Haru from posing a deadly menace to inanimate objects everywhere.

programme.title: The Lost Tiger
programme.desc: Adopted by a wrestler kangaroo family, Teos life changes when visions guide him to his roots. He sets off on an epic journey to save his homeland from destruction.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: Spring has sprung, and Verne and his woodland friends awaken from their long winters nap to discover that a large, green hedge has cropped up right through the middle of their once-natural habitat. Enter RJ, an opportunistic raccoon who explains that the world beyond the hedge is the gateway to the good life where peculiar creatures called humans live to eat, rather than eat to live. "For humans," RJ proclaims, "enough is never enough."

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: Desperate to find their missing son, Paul and his wife Amanda trick eminent palaeontologist Dr Alan Grant into accompanying them to Isla Sorna. The small team embark on a dangerous task, searching through a deserted island inhabited by ferocious dinosaurs.

programme.title: Bee Movie
programme.desc: A bee is abuzz over a scandal: people are stealing honey to eat. With the help of a florist, he sues the human race for honey laundering.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: Set in the mythical world of burly Vikings and fire-breathing dragons, a Viking teenager takes in an injured dragon and sees an opportunity to set his tribe on a new course.

programme.title: Khumba
programme.desc: Rejected by his superstitious herd, a half-striped zebra embarks on a daring quest to earn his stripes but finds the courage and self-acceptance to save all the animals of the Great Karoo.

programme.title: The Pirates Who Dont Do Anything
programme.desc: Those vegie-eating boys are back. Three veggies serve as cabin boys at a pirate-themed dinner theatre, where they long to move from table service to the stage show, but their incompetence, laziness and cowardice get in the way. But when a princess drags them into the 17th century to rescue her brother, whos been kidnapped by a nefarious pirate with designs on her kingdom, they have to overcome their issues and become heroes.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit: Curse Of Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: Wallace and Gromits latest enterprise is Anti-Pesto, pest control with a heart. When called upon by the dotty Lady Tottington to solve her rabbit infestation, Wallace tangles with her Ladyships would-be suitor, rotten cad Victor Quartermaine. At first Wallace and Gromit seem to have things in hand. But Wallaces mind transference device malfunctions, and hes in danger of being bagged by Quartermaine. Wallace teeters perilously close to disaster and his four-legged pal, Gromit, faces almost insurmountable odds to save the day!

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets 2
programme.desc: Terrier Max is coping with some major life changes. His owner is now married and has a toddler, Liam. Max is so worried about protecting the boy that he develops a nervous tic. On a family trip to a farm, Max and mutt Duke encounter canine-intolerant cows, hostile foxes and a terrifying turkey, all of which only elevates Maxs anxiety. Luckily, Max gets some guidance from veteran farm dog Rooster, who pushes Max to ditch his neuroses, find his inner alpha and give Liam a little more freedom.

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: As the big day grows nearer, George and Susan order their invitations. Susan lets him choose the cheap ones. George tries to think of a way out. Elaine suggests smoking and Kramer suggests a pre-nuptial agreement. Jerry, thinking of a single future with Kramer, nearly gets hit by a car but is saved by his female equivalent, Jeannie.

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: As George tries to put Susan behind him, Elaine is given control of J Petermans business.

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: George is suspected of killing his own fiancee, while Kramer falls for Jerrys new girlfriend.

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: Elaine meets three friends who are the exact opposite of Jerry, George and Kramer. Then, George uses Susans death to attract women.

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: Elaines strange dancing loses her employees respect. George cultivates a bad boy image, and Jerry becomes an underground legend after he makes a bootleg video tape of a new movie.

programme.desc: The last 250-kilometre race on the demanding street circuit determines the final automatic qualifiers for the next Finals round. The three drivers with the fewest points will be eliminated from the title chase.

programme.title: F1
programme.desc: The championship fight intensifies between rivals Oscar Piastri and Lando Norris. Max Verstappen looks to secure a crucial home win in his title defence.

programme.title: MotoGP
programme.desc: Points are on offer for the first time this weekend with the British Sprint Race.

programme.title: MotoGP
programme.desc: At Silverstone, Fabio Quartararo starts from pole position for the third consecutive race, and will be hoping this can be his first victory of 2025.

programme.title: Moto2
programme.desc: Another strong performance from Manuel Gonzalez means he remains atop the Moto2 standings heading to Silverstone.

programme.title: SailGP
programme.desc: The season moves onto Cadiz for the second last event as Australia look to hold onto top position heading towards the Grand Final.

programme.title: SailGP
programme.desc: The season moves onto Cadiz for the second last event as Australia look to hold onto top position heading towards the Grand Final.

programme.title: European PGA Tour
programme.desc: Final round coverage of the AfrAsia Bank Mauritius Open gets underway at La Reserve Golf Links.

programme.title: Ultimate Pool Mixed Pairs Cup
programme.desc: The 2025 Ultimate Pool Mixed Pairs Cup concludes at the Final.

programme.title: Pro Bull Riders Australia
programme.desc: Join some of the toughest sportsmen on the planet for the ride of your life as they take on the meanest bulls in the world in a bid to be crowned Australias best bull rider.

programme.title: F2
programme.desc: Championship leader Richard Verschoor will be looking to carry his momentum from Spielberg. However, the chasing pack is eager to close the gap on the Dutchman, who currently holds a 24-point lead.

programme.title: Porsche Supercup Series
programme.desc: The series returns to Zandvoort with a very close title fight. Championship contenders Robert de Haan and Flynt Schuring look to capitalise on their home track advantage.

programme.title: NASCAR Xfinity Series
programme.desc: Connor Zilisch aims for a fourth straight win, but defending Iowa victor Sam Mayer and veteran Justin Allgaier will challenge for victory on the short track.

programme.title: NASCAR Highlights
programme.desc: The NASCAR playoffs kick off at Darlington Raceway where Shane van Gisbergen begins his playoff campaign as a top rookie contender.

programme.title: NASCAR Highlights
programme.desc: Playoff drivers fight to stay above the cutoff line in the second race of the Round of 16. The pressure is on stars like Joey Logano and Shane van Gisbergen.

programme.title: F1 Academy
programme.desc: The seasons final round guarantees high-stakes as Doriane Pin and Maya Weug conclude their season-long fight for the title.

programme.title: Formula 1 Special
programme.desc: The 2025 F1 season delivered an instant classic, with Lando Norris securing his maiden World Championship after a thrilling, three-way battle with Max Verstappen and teammate Oscar Piastri that went down to the wire in Abu Dhabi.

programme.title: British Superbikes
programme.desc: Bradley Ray comes into Snetterton for the third round of the 2025 British Superbike Championship with a 12-point lead in the standings as the Yamaha rider aims to stay on top.

programme.title: NextGen Championship
programme.desc: Highlights of Round 1 of the 2025/26 Bridgestone GR86 Championship at Hampton Downs Motorsport Park.

programme.title: Supercars Sandown 500
programme.desc: This race is the first shot for drivers to secure a top four spot for the Grand Final. Broc Feeney leads but Chaz Mostert is a threat after his Gold Coast sweep. Defending champ Will Brown is fighting for survival.

programme.title: Supercars Sandown 500
programme.desc: Last chance to make the big dance where the championship field of seven drivers will be ruthlessly slashed to the final four heading to the Adelaide Grand Final.

programme.desc: Oscar Piastri looks to extend his lead, while Lando Norris looks to make up for lost points, and Ferrari seeks to rebound from recent struggles at their home race.

programme.desc: Fierce rivals Nikita Tszyu and Michael Zerafa come face to face ahead of their highly anticipated showdown on January 16.

programme.title: MotoGP
programme.desc: After taking out the sprint race, Marc Marquez can add another win in 2025 at the Aragon Grand Prix.

programme.title: Moto2
programme.desc: The British GP shook up the Moto2 title race as Aussie rider Senna Agius took a stunning first victory. With the top four in the Championship failing to reach the podium, the title fight is tighter than ever.

programme.desc: The Championship will be decided today. Can Spain retain its title or will rivals Australia, New Zealand and Emirates GBR take the crown.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dan and Laura hope for better units and better buyers. Rene tries to capitalise on warehouse sales and scoots away with a deal. Jarrod finally buys the locker he wants and treats himself after to a spa day; while Darrell reflects on what it means to buy lockers full of antiques.

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: In North Yorkshire, a tip off leads to a major drugs bust, and the arrest of an international drug runner travelling through the county with a massive haul of cannabis.

programme.title: Outback Truckers
programme.desc: Australia is a land of extremes and these truckers face those extremes on every job they do.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: For over a decade, the drivers have battled it all from ferocious storms to freezing temperatures to bitter rivalries. And, of course, theyve confronted the deadly ice crossings that have tested their ability to survive. But now, as this program is in its landmark 11th season, a sense of urgency descends on the drivers. The roads are opening late and closing early. Every load could be the last one to make it up the trails. At any time, the roads could be shut down and tens of thousands of tons in freight wont be delivered. Its a rush from day one and the mission is clear: pedal to the metal and never let up. The communities are counting on them now more than ever.

programme.title: Backroad Truckers
programme.desc: Dale teams up with his sister for an ATV mountainside recovery, but a risky tow down an icy road goes sideways leaving Dales sister in a precarious position. Dave labours to get propane tanks to a hard-to-find location and needs help from an old friend to get the tanks across a river and to their final destination. Craig is forced to delay a hotshot mission to rescue Molly. But the detour, a ripped-apart load, and mud threaten to derail the job. Big Donny eyes eastern expansion for his growing business.

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: In North Yorkshire, a tip off leads to a major drugs bust, and the arrest of an international drug runner travelling through the county with a massive haul of cannabis.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Take a look inside the doors of a family-run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family, grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colourful customers bring in, objects ranging from the obscure to the truly historic.

programme.desc: Sophie Willan splatters a human pigeon, Joanne McNally rocks a traffic cone, and Nick Mohammed gets trapped under a bed.

programme.title: MythBusters: Theres Your Problem!
programme.desc: The MythBusters dive into six water-related myths, finding out how far bullets can penetrate water; whether hitting the surface is really the same as hitting concrete; and if walking on water is possible using ninja technology. They also find out the best way to escape from a sinking car; if a shipwreck can be raised with ping pong balls; and if a sinking ship can suck you down with it.

programme.title: Hotel Paranormal
programme.desc: A new hotel owner, a child guest, and a woman at a seaside resort are confronted by vicious spirits with deadly intent.

programme.title: The Horne Section TV Show
programme.desc: Alex Horne steps out of Greg Davies shadow as he gets the chance to host his own late-night chat show with his loyal band. But will all go to plan in this mash-up of comedy, celebs, music and mayhem?

programme.desc: Ivy brings his son to Moreno Valley, where good things always happen, and leaves with yo-yos of an unexpected kind. Rene and Casey discover that their shoes are more "air" and less "Jordan." Kenny tries to level up his locker, while Lisa learns to look beyond the trash.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers get wind of some interesting units in Santa Clarita. Ivy and Isaiah chose quantity over quality and it pays off. Brandi gets fancy sneaking a unit from everyone else. And Kenny finds himself searching for his soul sister.

Dale transports a car for detailing but ends up making the job worse than it should have been.

programme.title: MythBusters: Theres Your Problem!
programme.desc: The MythBusters first light up three fire-related myths, finding out who wins in a battle of flamethrower versus ice crystal gun; if wine bottles can cause a truck fire; and if a cannon packed with sawdust could produce a raging fireball. Then they flip the switch to freeze to discover: can a boat be built from ice? Can a block of ice from an aircraft toilet become a deadly missile? And could a functioning cannon be made from ice?

programme.title: Hotel Paranormal
programme.desc: A hotels newest employee, two travellers, and a businessman are attacked by ancient and terrifying demonic entities.

programme.title: Car Crash TV
programme.desc: We have a good laugh at the expense of The Junction Jokers, and say hello to one of our old favourites as we invite you to play Hit Or Miss.

programme.title: Forged in Fire
programme.desc: Four master bladesmiths are challenged to re-create some of historys most iconic edged weapons. A panel of judges will test the weaponry and the final contestant to survive elimination will win.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: For two months out of every year, a group of exceptional men find their way to the Canadian tundra to undertake one of the most dangerous jobs on Earth. In the thick of winter, truckers in giant 18-wheelers carry vital equipment and supplies to miners hundreds of miles away. In blizzard conditions, these truckers travel over ice roads that often take them over frozen lakes. Each man is trained in self survival, from fixing his truck in sub-zero conditions in seconds to escaping from a truck if the ice cracks. On the other end of the journey are miners whose lives depend on the truckers making it to their base, year after year.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: For two months out of every year, a group of exceptional men find their way to the Canadian tundra to undertake one of the most dangerous jobs on earth. In the thick of winter, truckers in giant eighteen wheelers carry vital equipment and supplies to miners hundreds of miles away. In blizzard conditions, these truckers travel over ice roads that often take them over frozen lakes. Each man is trained in self survival, from fixing his truck in sub zero conditions in seconds to escaping from a truck if the ice cracks. On the other end of the journey are miners whose lives depend on the truckers making it to their base, year after year. The episodes will form a narrative arch - taking the viewer on a journey from when the experienced and novice truckers first sign up for the season, to the last truck making it back to base.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: For the past several decades, two months out of every year, a truly historic event occurs. Truckers in the worlds most dangerous tundras carry vital equipment to remote outposts located hundreds of miles north of civilisation and all the roads are temporarily created by frozen bodies of water. The mission is to transport thousands of loads before the road literally disappears into the sea. Like their trailblazing forefathers, these truckers continue to carry on the lone wolf entrepreneurial spirit that built America, taking huge risks in the hopes of receiving huge rewards. Continuing this groundbreaking series, our truckers will once again embark on a race against the elements, against time and against each other. The series will continue to examine this time honoured profession that dates back almost a century, often through generations of families.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: For over a decade, the drivers have battled it all from ferocious storms to freezing temperatures to bitter rivalries. And, of course, theyve confronted the deadly ice crossings that have tested their ability to survive. But now, as this program is in its landmark 11th season, a sense of urgency descends on the drivers. The roads are opening late and closing early. Every load could be the last one to make it up the trails. At any time, the roads could be shut down and tens of thousands of tons in freight wont be delivered. Its a rush from day one and the mission is clear: pedal to the metal and never let up. The communities are counting on them now more than ever.

programme.title: Backroad Truckers
programme.desc: Dale teams up with his sister for an ATV mountainside recovery, but a risky tow down an icy road goes sideways leaving Dales sister in a precarious position. Dave labours to get propane tanks to a hard-to-find location and needs help from an old friend to get the tanks across a river and to their final destination. Craig is forced to delay a hotshot mission to rescue Molly. But the detour, a ripped-apart load, and mud threaten to derail the job. Big Donny eyes eastern expansion for his growing business.

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: In North Yorkshire, a tip off leads to a major drugs bust, and the arrest of an international drug runner travelling through the county with a massive haul of cannabis.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Take a look inside the doors of a family-run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family, grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colourful customers bring in, objects ranging from the obscure to the truly historic.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Brandi and her buddy set the wayback machine and discover a roaring good time; Darrell makes the most of the little hes got; Kenny fills his piggy bank, while courting an unfamiliar pastime.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dan and Laura hope for better units and better buyers. Rene tries to capitalise on warehouse sales and scoots away with a deal. Jarrod finally buys the locker he wants and treats himself after to a spa day; while Darrell reflects on what it means to buy lockers full of antiques.

programme.desc: The much-loved trio of Wayne Brady, Colin Mochrie, and Ryan Stiles are back with host Aisha Tyler presenting the traditional mix of hilarious games, incredible songs, and surprising guests.

programme.desc: Sophie Willan splatters a human pigeon, Joanne McNally rocks a traffic cone, and Nick Mohammed gets trapped under a bed.

programme.title: MythBusters: Theres Your Problem!
programme.desc: The MythBusters dive into six water-related myths, finding out how far bullets can penetrate water; whether hitting the surface is really the same as hitting concrete; and if walking on water is possible using ninja technology. They also find out the best way to escape from a sinking car; if a shipwreck can be raised with ping pong balls; and if a sinking ship can suck you down with it.

programme.title: Hotel Paranormal
programme.desc: A new hotel owner, a child guest, and a woman at a seaside resort are confronted by vicious spirits with deadly intent.

programme.title: The Horne Section TV Show
programme.desc: Alex Horne steps out of Greg Davies shadow as he gets the chance to host his own late-night chat show with his loyal band. But will all go to plan in this mash-up of comedy, celebs, music and mayhem?

programme.desc: Ivy brings his son to Moreno Valley, where good things always happen, and leaves with yo-yos of an unexpected kind. Rene and Casey discover that their shoes are more "air" and less "Jordan." Kenny tries to level up his locker, while Lisa learns to look beyond the trash.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers get wind of some interesting units in Santa Clarita. Ivy and Isaiah chose quantity over quality and it pays off. Brandi gets fancy sneaking a unit from everyone else. And Kenny finds himself searching for his soul sister.

programme.desc: A teenage driver in a stolen car risks everything while suspected high behind the wheel. The team must make a move before the reckless young driver joins a busy motorway and causes further mayhem.

programme.title: Backroad Truckers
programme.desc: Big Donny and Junior get called out to recover a sunken pickup truck but their heavy tow trucks fall victim to the swampy peat bog and Junior needs to act fast to save the familys fleet. Dale transports a car for detailing but ends up making the job worse than it should have been.

Its a rush from day one and the mission is clear: pedal to the metal and never let up. The communities are counting on them now more than ever.

programme.title: Outback Truckers
programme.desc: Australia is a land of extremes and these truckers face those extremes on every job they do.

programme.title: Taskmaster: Champion of Champions 4
programme.desc: Greg Davies and his sidekick Alex Horne pit former Taskmaster series winners against each other in the ultimate test: whos the worthiest of them all?

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Olga Koch and Thaniya Moore, friends from the comedy circuit head to Bulgaria. Their journey take them across two epic mountain ranges.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: For over a decade, the drivers have battled it all from ferocious storms to freezing temperatures to bitter rivalries. And, of course, theyve confronted the deadly ice crossings that have tested their ability to survive. But now, as this program is in its landmark 11th season, a sense of urgency descends on the drivers. The roads are opening late and closing early. Every load could be the last one to make it up the trails. At any time, the roads could be shut down and tens of thousands of tons in freight wont be delivered. Its a rush from day one and the mission is clear: pedal to the metal and never let up. The communities are counting on them now more than ever.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Take a look inside the doors of a family-run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family, grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colourful customers bring in, objects ranging from the obscure to the truly historic.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Take a look inside the doors of a family-run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family, grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colourful customers bring in, objects ranging from the obscure to the truly historic.

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: A teenage driver in a stolen car risks everything while suspected high behind the wheel. The team must make a move before the reckless young driver joins a busy motorway and causes further mayhem.

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob Dyrdek and friends critique viral videos, categorizing them into "Hot Mess," "Worst Case Scenario," "Redneck Good Times," and "What Happened Last Night".

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway?
programme.desc: The much-loved trio of Wayne Brady, Colin Mochrie, and Ryan Stiles are back with host Aisha Tyler presenting the traditional mix of hilarious games, incredible songs, and surprising guests.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway?
programme.desc: The much-loved trio of Wayne Brady, Colin Mochrie, and Ryan Stiles are back with host Aisha Tyler presenting the traditional mix of hilarious games, incredible songs, and surprising guests.

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: As the epic battle to win Greg Davies beautiful bonce begins to intensify, Steve Pemberton delivers a timely message of peace.

programme.title: MythBusters: Theres Your Problem!
programme.desc: The MythBusters first light up three fire-related myths, finding out who wins in a battle of flamethrower versus ice crystal gun; if wine bottles can cause a truck fire; and if a cannon packed with sawdust could produce a raging fireball. Then they flip the switch to freeze to discover: can a boat be built from ice? Can a block of ice from an aircraft toilet become a deadly missile? And could a functioning cannon be made from ice?

programme.title: Hotel Paranormal
programme.desc: A hotels newest employee, two travellers, and a businessman are attacked by ancient and terrifying demonic entities.

programme.title: Car Crash TV
programme.desc: We have a good laugh at the expense of The Junction Jokers, and say hello to one of our old favourites as we invite you to play Hit Or Miss.

programme.title: Forged in Fire
programme.desc: Four master bladesmiths are challenged to re-create some of historys most iconic edged weapons. A panel of judges will test the weaponry and the final contestant to survive elimination will win.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: For two months out of every year, a group of exceptional men find their way to the Canadian tundra to undertake one of the most dangerous jobs on Earth. In the thick of winter, truckers in giant 18-wheelers carry vital equipment and supplies to miners hundreds of miles away. In blizzard conditions, these truckers travel over ice roads that often take them over frozen lakes. Each man is trained in self survival, from fixing his truck in sub-zero conditions in seconds to escaping from a truck if the ice cracks. On the other end of the journey are miners whose lives depend on the truckers making it to their base, year after year.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: For two months out of every year, a group of exceptional men find their way to the Canadian tundra to undertake one of the most dangerous jobs on earth. In the thick of winter, truckers in giant eighteen wheelers carry vital equipment and supplies to miners hundreds of miles away. In blizzard conditions, these truckers travel over ice roads that often take them over frozen lakes. Each man is trained in self survival, from fixing his truck in sub zero conditions in seconds to escaping from a truck if the ice cracks. On the other end of the journey are miners whose lives depend on the truckers making it to their base, year after year. The episodes will form a narrative arch - taking the viewer on a journey from when the experienced and novice truckers first sign up for the season, to the last truck making it back to base.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: For two months out of every year, a group of exceptional men find their way to the Canadian tundra to undertake one of the most dangerous jobs on earth. programme.title: Outback Truckers
programme.desc: They drive the biggest trucks on Earth along the toughest roads and loneliest highways in the world. They are Australias outback truckers, men and women in monster rigs, on marathon runs, through some of the most inhospitable terrain on the planet. Out here only one thing matters, getting there and back alive. In the wilds of north-western Australia veteran truckie Steve Grahame is in the middle of an epic journey, trying to deliver essential supplies to a remote community, but the weather and roads are conspiring against him. Also, ex-model turned truckie Deb Drew is into the fourth day of a 7000km trek from Melbourne to Darwin and back.

programme.title: Outback Truckers
programme.desc: This vast island continent is home to some of the hardest places to reach on Earth. But for the mega trucks that keep the country moving, getting there is just another day at the office. Longer than a jet liner and heavier than a tank, they can run 24/7, pulling anything from houses to hamburgers. Behind the wheel, some of the best and toughest drivers in the world, their motto: anything anytime anywhere. In the season premiere, Steve hauls $3million worth of equipment to an isolated community.

programme.title: Outback Truckers
programme.desc: This vast island continent is home to some of the hardest places to reach on Earth. But for the mega trucks that keep the country moving, getting there is just another day at the office. Longer than a jet liner and heavier than a tank, they can run 24/7, pulling anything from houses to hamburgers. Behind the wheel, some of the best and toughest drivers in the world, their motto: anything anytime anywhere. In this episode, Experienced dirt-road driver Dennis Dent goes head to head with a lifelong enemy, while Christian Reynolds takes on the wild back country on a vital mission to build a bridge.

programme.title: Outback Truckers
programme.desc: The outback is one of the worlds last wild frontiers. Its vast, untamed and home to some of the toughest to reach places on Earth. For the giant trucks who roam this epic, harsh country, theres only one way to get from A to B - the hard way. Whether its taking on scorching deserts, battling torrential rains that turn roads into rivers, or braving a continents worth of brutal bitumen and desolate dirt. This is a land that can destroy trucks and truckers in a heartbeat. But for the men and women who risk their rigs and their lives to face it, this punishing wilderness is a home from home. In Outback Truckers Season 3, we hit the road train again, for a whole new season of dirt, dramas and dangers, joining some of the toughest, most skilled truckers on the planet, as they haul their massive loads through hell on Earth. Without them, Australia would grind to a halt. Their mission: to get their freight in and their trucks out. In the season premiere, Turbos on a mission as he takes the biggest gamble of his career. Steve Grahame battles 2000kms of dirt, damage and dramas at the wheel of a monster load; Glen Waters faces disaster; And in Townsville, Queensland, long-distance trucker Peter gets ready for a cross-country haul in which he has to move a mixed freight through bush, farmland and desert to Darwin.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: For the past several decades, two months out of every year, a truly historic event occurs. Truckers in the worlds most dangerous tundras carry vital equipment to remote outposts located hundreds of miles north of civilisation and all the roads are temporarily created by frozen bodies of water. The mission is to transport thousands of loads before the road literally disappears into the sea. Like their trailblazing forefathers, these truckers continue to carry on the lone wolf entrepreneurial spirit that built America, taking huge risks in the hopes of receiving huge rewards. Continuing this groundbreaking series, our truckers will once again embark on a race against the elements, against time and against each other. The series will continue to examine this time honoured profession that dates back almost a century, often through generations of families.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: For two months out of every year, a group of exceptional men find their way to the Canadian tundra to undertake one of the most dangerous jobs on earth. programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
