programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: A home-schooled newcomer is introduced to the blackboard jungle, where she joins the social outcasts in a planned sabotage of the cool kids.

programme.title: Santas Boots
programme.desc: Forced to take a holiday from her job in Seattle, Holly returns to her hometown, where she reluctantly agrees to become Santas new elf at her dads local department store.

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: A story of a down-and-out con artist who trades lifestyles with a well-to-do investor. Two wealthy power players set the wheels turning with a crazy bet and the comedy gets richer by the minute.

programme.title: Eight Crazy Nights
programme.desc: A judge takes pity on drunken loser Davey and offers him a choice: jail time or community service as a basketball coach. Playing ball looks like a soft option, until Davey meets up with his old ref.

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: This surreal update of the Charles Dickens classic has a mean-spirited TV executive haunted into the Christmas spirit by three special time-travellers.

programme.title: Noel
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve in New York City, and with a little help from each other, five people will discover new meaning on Christmas Day.

programme.title: The Angel Tree
programme.desc: A writer reconnects with a childhood friend while seeking the identity of the person who grants Christmas wishes placed upon an angel tree.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having finally gotten used to each others existence, Brad and Dusty must now deal with their intrusive fathers during the holidays.

programme.title: Last Christmas
programme.desc: Featuring the music of George Michael, this film follows a hapless Londoner who works in a Christmas shop and becomes involved with a man who could be the answer to her problems.

programme.title: Call Me Claus
programme.desc: Facing mandatory retirement after 200 years, Santa Claus (Nigel Hawthorne) asks a television producer (Whoopi Goldberg) to replace him.

programme.title: Buster and Chaunceys Silent Night
programme.desc: Two 19th-century Austrian mice evade a voracious cat, aid a kidnapped orphan, foil thieves and help create a holiday classic.

programme.title: The Swan Princess Christmas
programme.desc: Princess Odette, Prince Derek and their trusted woodland friends reunite in this all-new adventure for their first Christmas celebration together! As the kingdom prepares for a festive holiday, the villainous Rothbart plots to destroy Christmas. Will the castle friends be able to stop Rothbart and save the day?

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: On Christmas night at the North Pole, Santas youngest son looks to use his fathers high-tech operation for an urgent mission.

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: Ethan, Isaac and Chris have been friends since childhood, and for a decade, their yearly Christmas Eve reunion has been an annual night of debauchery and hilarity. Now that theyre entering adulthood, the tradition is coming to an end, and to make it as memorable as possible, they set out to find the Nutcracka Ball - the Holy Grail of Christmas parties.

programme.title: Christmas Eve in Millers Point
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, a family gathers for what may be their last holiday in their ancestral home. As tensions rise, a teen sneaks out with friends to take over the wintry suburb for herself.

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: This surreal update of the Charles Dickens classic has a mean-spirited TV executive haunted into the Christmas spirit by three special time-travellers.

programme.title: Christmas with the Kranks
programme.desc: Fed up with the commercial aspects of Christmas, particularly all the money spent and alone for the holiday for the first time in decades, as their daughter has just joined the Peace Corps, grumpy Luther Krank and his sweet wife, Nora, decide to skip Christmas this year and forgo the gifts, the tree, the decorations, the cards, the parties and to spend the dollars saved on a 10-day Caribbean cruise.

programme.title: Angry Angel
programme.desc: Allison Pyke is a young angel whos trying to get her ticket into heaven. Complications arise when two important men in her life unexpectedly show up to form a love triangle.

programme.title: A Boy Called Christmas
programme.desc: In this origin story of Father Christmas, an ordinary boy (with a loyal pet mouse and a reindeer at his side) sets out on an extraordinary adventure to find his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of Elfhelm.

programme.title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
programme.desc: Hes mean and green and he hates the yo-ho-hoing. The Grinch conspires to steal Christmas from Whoville, making off with the presents, decorations, trees and every other joyful thing.

programme.title: On Strike for Christmas
programme.desc: After years of being the perfect mum, Joy Robertson says enough is enough and decides to go on strike for Christmas.

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: When an evil spirit known as Pitch lays down the gauntlet to take over the world, the immortal Guardians must join forces for the first time to protect the hopes, beliefs, and imagination of children all over the world.

programme.title: You Light Up My Christmas
programme.desc: Emma returns to her hometown for Christmas. She discovers the lights have gone dim in the once festive town, prompting her to reconnect with an old flame to set their hearts and the town ablaze with light again.

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: A drunkard who hates kids and his sidekick pose as Santa and his elf to rob department stores at Christmas.

programme.title: Santa Jaws
programme.desc: Trying to survive the family Christmas, Cody makes a wish to be alone, which ends up backfiring when a shark manifests and kills his entire family.

programme.title: Dear Christmas
programme.desc: A podcast host develops an unexpected romance with a local firefighter during the holidays.

programme.title: The Star
programme.desc: A small but brave donkey and his animal friends become the unsung heroes of the first Christmas.

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: Nobody is ready for the mayhem and surprises that ensue when six of the worst youngsters disrupt the towns yearly Christmas performance.

programme.title: Always and Forever Christmas
programme.desc: When a marketing executive learns that shes inherited her grandfathers year-round Christmas store, she makes a trip back home to support the store during its final Christmas season before she sells it.

programme.title: Crown for Christmas
programme.desc: When a recently-fired maid accepts a job as a nanny for a wealthy family, she discovers the father is about to be crowned a king.

programme.title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
programme.desc: Hes mean and green and he hates the yo-ho-hoing. The Grinch conspires to steal Christmas from Whoville, making off with the presents, decorations, trees and every other joyful thing.

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: When an evil spirit known as Pitch lays down the gauntlet to take over the world, the immortal Guardians must join forces for the first time to protect the hopes, beliefs, and imagination of children all over the world.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: For their eighth fully animated feature, Illumination and Universal Pictures present "The Grinch," based on Dr. Seuss beloved holiday classic. The Grinch tells the story of a cynical grump who goes on a mission to steal Christmas, only to have his heart changed by a young girls generous holiday spirit. Funny, heartwarming and visually stunning, its a universal story about the spirit of Christmas and the indomitable power of optimism.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: On Christmas night at the North Pole, Santas youngest son looks to use his fathers high-tech operation for an urgent mission.

programme.title: Last Christmas
programme.desc: Featuring the music of George Michael, this film follows a hapless Londoner who works in a Christmas shop and becomes involved with a man who could be the answer to her problems.

programme.title: Its Christmas, Eve
programme.desc: A school superintendent meets a single father who works as the head of the schools bankrupt music department. As she rediscovers her passion for music, she works to save the dreams of the kids who love music.

programme.title: One Christmas Eve
programme.desc: A recently divorced mother attempts to create a perfect Christmas for her childrens first time without dad, but a series of comic mishaps threaten her best-laid plans.

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: This surreal update of the Charles Dickens classic has a mean-spirited TV executive haunted into the Christmas spirit by three special time-travellers.

programme.title: Christmas with the Kranks
programme.desc: Fed up with the commercial aspects of Christmas, particularly all the money spent and alone for the holiday for the first time in decades, as their daughter has just joined the Peace Corps, grumpy Luther Krank and his sweet wife, Nora, decide to skip Christmas this year and forgo the gifts, the tree, the decorations, the cards, the parties and to spend the dollars saved on a 10-day Caribbean cruise.

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: Ethan, Isaac and Chris have been friends since childhood, and for a decade, their yearly Christmas Eve reunion has been an annual night of debauchery and hilarity. Now that theyre entering adulthood, the tradition is coming to an end, and to make it as memorable as possible, they set out to find the Nutcracka Ball - the Holy Grail of Christmas parties.

programme.title: Christmas Eve in Millers Point
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, a family gathers for what may be their last holiday in their ancestral home. As tensions rise, a teen sneaks out with friends to take over the wintry suburb for herself.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: For their eighth fully animated feature, Illumination and Universal Pictures present "The Grinch," based on Dr. Seuss beloved holiday classic. The Grinch tells the story of a cynical grump who goes on a mission to steal Christmas, only to have his heart changed by a young girls generous holiday spirit. Funny, heartwarming and visually stunning, its a universal story about the spirit of Christmas and the indomitable power of optimism.

programme.title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
programme.desc: Hes mean and green and he hates the yo-ho-hoing. The Grinch conspires to steal Christmas from Whoville, making off with the presents, decorations, trees and every other joyful thing.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: On Christmas night at the North Pole, Santas youngest son looks to use his fathers high-tech operation for an urgent mission.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (2014)
programme.desc: The city needs heroes. Darkness has settled over New York City as Shredder and his evil Foot Clan have an iron grip on everything from the police to the politicians. The future is grim until four unlikely outcast brothers rise from the sewers and discover their destiny as Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. The Turtles must work with fearless reporter April ONeil and her wise-cracking cameraman Vern Fenwick to save the city and unravel Shredders diabolical plan.

programme.title: Bullet Train
programme.desc: Ladybug, is an unlucky fixer determined to do his job peacefully after one too many gigs gone off the rails. Fate may have other plans, as Ladybugs latest mission puts him on a collision course with 10 deadly and diverse assassins, all with connected, yet conflicting objectives and tests his newfound philosophy in this non-stop thrill ride through modern-day Japan.

programme.title: Watchmen: Chapter I
programme.desc: In an alternate world, the murder of a government sponsored superhero draws his outlawed colleagues out of retirement, into a mystery that threatens their lives and the world itself.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets 2
programme.desc: Terrier Max is coping with some major life changes. His owner is now married and has a toddler, Liam. Max is so worried about protecting the boy that he develops a nervous tic. On a family trip to a farm, Max and mutt Duke encounter canine-intolerant cows, hostile foxes and a terrifying turkey, all of which only elevates Maxs anxiety. Luckily, Max gets some guidance from veteran farm dog Rooster, who pushes Max to ditch his neuroses, find his inner alpha and give Liam a little more freedom.

programme.title: Fast and Furious Presents: Hobbs and Shaw
programme.desc: Hobbs and Shaw, the trash-talking sworn enemies, must team up to take down a cyber-genetically enhanced anarchist with a bio weapon that threatens the fate of humanity.

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Having lost his memory and the one person he loved, Bourne is forced to hunt down his past in order to find a future. Travelling from Moscow, Paris and London to Tangier and New York City, he continues his quest to find the real Jason Bourne, all the while trying to out-manoeuvre the scores of cops, federal officers and Interpol agents who have him in their sights.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Kong
programme.desc: Legends collide as Godzilla and Kong, the two most powerful forces of nature, clash on the big screen in a spectacular battle for the ages. As a squadron embarks on a perilous mission into fantastic uncharted terrain, unearthing clues to the Titans very origins and mankinds survival, a conspiracy threatens to wipe the creatures, both good and bad, from the face of the earth forever.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A Harvard professor implicated in a murder must unravel an ancient code to expose the greatest conspiracy in history.

programme.title: Cold Pursuit
programme.desc: Welcome to Kehoe, its -10 degrees and counting at this glitzy ski resort in the Rocky Mountains. The local police arent used to much action until the son of unassuming town snowplough driver, Nels Coxman, is murdered at the order of Viking, a flamboyant drug lord. Fuelled by rage and armed with heavy machinery, Nels sets out to dismantle the cartel one man at a time, but his understanding of murder comes mainly from what he read in a crime novel. As the bodies pile up, his actions ignite a turf war between Viking and his long-standing rival White Bull, a soulful Native-American mafia boss, that will quickly escalate and turn the small towns bright white slopes blood-red.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A young land clerk is summoned to a vampires castle, while his wife falls under the spell of a dark force in her dreams, leading to a perilous journey into the unknown.

programme.title: Uncharted
programme.desc: Street-smart Nathan Drake is recruited by seasoned treasure hunter Victor Sully Sullivan to recover a fortune amassed by Ferdinand Magellan, and lost 500 years ago.

programme.title: Julie and Julia
programme.desc: A culinary legend Julia Child provides a frustrated office worker with a new recipe for life - the true stories of how Childs life and cookbook inspired fledgling writer Julie Powell to whip up 524 recipes in 365 days and introduce a new generation to the magic of French cooking. A delicious comedy about joy, obsession and butter. Bon appetit!

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Peter Banning is a 40-year-old corporate takeover lawyer who has lost any memory of being Peter Pan. Peter and his family travel to London to visit Granny Wendy. Peter discovers a note from Captain Hook informing Peter that he has kidnapped his children. With the encouragement of Tinkerbell, Peter once again takes wing, and its off to Neverland to rescue his kids.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time... In Hollywood
programme.desc: The highly anticipated 9th film from Quentin Tarantino. In 1969 Los Angeles, during the Charles Manson murders, a TV actor and his stunt double, embark on an odyssey to make a name for themselves in the film industry.

programme.title: The Convert
programme.desc: A preachers violent past is drawn into question and his faith tested as he becomes caught up in a bloody war between Maori tribes after arriving at a British settlement in the 1830s.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: Haunted by his failure to protect JFK in Dallas, a Secret Service agent is taunted by a psychopath stalking the current president.

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: On the verge of having their conspiracy exposed, members of the governments intelligence community will stop at nothing to erase all evidence of their top secret programs - even the agents involved. Aaron Cross must use his genetically-engineered skills to survive the ultimate game of cat-and-mouse and finish what Jason Bourne started.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: Blamed for the terrorist bombing of the Kremlin, IMF operative Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) is disavowed along with the rest of the agency when the President initiates Ghost Protocol. Left without any resources or backup, Ethan must find a way to clear his agencys name and prevent another attack. To complicate matters further, Ethan is forced to embark on this mission with a team of fellow IMF fugitives whose personal motives he does not fully know.

programme.title: Dr. Seuss the Lorax
programme.desc: Dr. Seuss The Lorax is an adaptation of Dr. Seuss classic tale of a forest creature who shares the enduring power of hope. In the walled city of Thneed-Ville, where everything is artificial and even the air is a commodity, a boy named Ted hopes to win the heart of his dream girl, Audrey. When he learns of her wish to see a real tree, Ted seeks out the Once-ler, a ruined old businessman outside of town in a stark wasteland. Upon hearing of how the hermit gave into his greed for profits and devastated the land over the protests of the Lorax, Ted is inspired to undo the disaster. However, the greedy Mayor of Thneed-Ville, Aloysius OHare, has made his fortune exploiting the environmental collapse and is determined to stop the boy from undermining his business.

programme.title: Fast and Furious Presents: Hobbs and Shaw
programme.desc: Hobbs and Shaw, the trash-talking sworn enemies, must team up to take down a cyber-genetically enhanced anarchist with a bio weapon that threatens the fate of humanity.

programme.title: The Mummy (1999)
programme.desc: Adventurer Rick OConnell and Egyptologist Evelyn Carnahan discover the lost city of Hamunaptra, and struggle to save the world from unspeakable evil after they inadvertently stumble upon a mummys tomb in 1923, and the mummy is accidentally resurrected.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: A harrowing war drama where two Black Hawk helicopters are shot down over Mogadishu, trapping an elite team of American soldiers in a 15-hour firefight as they try to recover their fallen comrades.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Kravens complex relationship with his ruthless father starts him down a path of vengeance, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

programme.title: Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Whats a couple of stay-at-home ghosts to do when their beloved home is taken over by trendy yuppies? They call on Beetlejuice, the afterlifes freelance bio-exorcist to scare off the family - and everyone gets more than she, he or it bargains for!

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: In search of his next big story, Eddie lands an exclusive interview with convicted murderer and death row inmate Cletus Kasady,

programme.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
programme.desc: While visiting the Earth at Night, a group of alien botanists is discovered and disturbed by an approaching human task force. Because of the more than hasty take-off, one of the visitors is left behind. The little alien finds himself all alone on a very strange planet. Fortunately, the extra-terrestrial soon finds a friend and emotional companion in 10-year-old Elliot, who discovered him looking for food in his familys garden shed. While E.T. slowly gets acquainted with Elliots brother Michael, his sister Gertie as well as with Earth customs, members of the task force work day and night to track down the whereabouts of Earths first visitor from Outer Space.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: In the brand new adventure Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle, the tables are turned as four teenagers are sucked into the world of Jumanji. When four high-school kids discover an old video game console with a game theyve never heard of Jumanji they are immediately drawn into the games jungle setting, literally becoming the avatars they chose: gamer Spencer becomes a brawny adventurer; football jock Fridge loses (in his words) the top two feet of his body and becomes an Einstein; popular girl Bethany becomes a middle-aged male professor; and wallflower Martha becomes a badass warrior. What they discover is that you dont just play Jumanji you must survive it. To beat the game and return to the real world, theyll have to go on the most dangerous adventure of their lives, discover what Alan Parrish left 20 years ago, and change the way they think about themselves or theyll be stuck in the game forever.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: Pete and Ellie must learn the ropes of instant parenthood when they bring in three foster children. Inspired by a true story, discover this must-see family comedy from the creators of Daddys Home.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Former CIA assassin Jason Bourne resurfaces just as his former employers are implementing a new program aimed at hunting him down. Now fully recovered from his amnesia, Bourne teams up with Nicky Parsons to uncover the truth behind his fathers death, while simultaneously exacting revenge and evading the government forces hot on his trail.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: Kevin has evidenced 23 personalities to his trusted psychiatrist, Dr Fletcher, but there remains one still submerged who is set to materialise and dominate all the others. Compelled to abduct three teenage girls, led by the wilful, observant Casey, Kevin reaches a war for survival among all of those contained within him, as well as everyone around him, as the walls between his compartments shatter apart.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: A mysterious event from Earths past threatens to ignite a war so big that the Transformers alone will not be able to save the planet. Sam Witwicky and the Autobots must fight against the darkness to defend our world from the Decepticons all-consuming evil.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Anastasia and Christian have settled into a life together, but lingering demons from Christians past threaten to disrupt their happily ever after.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: As war rages in Europe, a Nazi-scalping squad of American soldiers, known to their enemy as The Basterds, is on a daring mission to take down the leaders of the Third Reich.

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: Its the nitro-fuelled answer to the question: how fast do you like it? Now an ex-cop on the run, Brian OConnor hooks into outlaw street-racing. When the Feds strong-arm him back, OConnors no rules, win-or-die skills are unleashed against an international drug lord. With his velocity-addicted buddy riding shotgun, and a drop-dead-gorgeous undercover agent dialling up the heat, this film accelerates the action into a desperate race for survival, justice and mind-blowing, jaw-dropping speed.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: When convicted street racer Sean Boswell tries to start a new life on the other side of the world, his obsession with racing sets him on a collision course with the Japanese underworld. To survive, he will have to master drifting - a new style of racing where tricked-out cars slide through hairpin turns, defying gravity and death for the ultimate road rush.

programme.title: Suits
programme.desc: When Mikes class action hits a snag, it might cost him more than the case. Harvey, Louis and Rachel consider getting their hands dirty. Donna and Benjamin seek an investor.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Jamie faces backlash from fellow officers when he partners with Erin and Anthony to investigate an underground bar the NYPD and FDNY use to hide their criminal indiscretions.

programme.title: Gather By Manuka Honey
programme.desc: Partnering with local growers and Indigenous communities, we create potent, sustainable Manuka honey. Our Honey Forests support biodiversity and livelihoods, ensuring premium honey quality while protecting bee habitats.

programme.title: CruiseAway
programme.desc: Join Derek and Jo as they explore the world on board some of the most innovative and exciting cruise ships at sea.

programme.title: LIFE Church - Online
programme.desc: LIFE, a multi-campus church with locations in Auckland, New Zealand and Melbourne, Australia. Join Senior Pastors Paul and Maree de Jong along with the LIFE Team for their Sunday service experience, pre-recorded from their Central Campus in Auckland, New Zealand.

programme.title: Soul Sessions
programme.desc: Hosted by Sara Jane Elika Soul Sessions is an exploration into the New Zealand gospel music scene with a focus on Pacific musicians and artists. The award-winning artists are a mix of new and established faces, who share the vision of expressing their faith through music.

programme.title: Joyce Meyer: Enjoying Everyday Life
programme.desc: How many people enjoy their regular, everyday life? Today, Joyce shares the keys to enjoying your life, every single day.

programme.title: Joel Osteen
programme.desc: Direct from Houston, Texas, USA, join Joel and Victoria Osteen and the team from Lakewood Church for this program of powerful music and empowering preaching. Experience from the weekend church service of Lakewood Church, the largest and fastest growing church in America that is inspiring millions of people around the world!

programme.title: Songs of Praise
programme.desc: Join us for a musical celebration of life and faith as Songs of Praise travels throughout Britain and the world presenting soul stirring hymns and touching stories of inspiration.

programme.title: I Heard the Bells
programme.desc: The inspiring story behind the writing of the beloved Christmas carol and its author, Henry Wadsworth Longfellow. Known as Americas Poet, Henry Wadsworth Longfellow leads an idyllic life...until the day his world is shattered by tragedy. With a nation divided by Civil War and his family torn apart, Henry puts down his pen, silenced by grief. But its the sound of Christmas morning that reignites the poets lost voice as he discovers the resounding hope of rekindled faith.

programme.title: Joy to the World
programme.desc: Enjoy the sights, sounds and splendour of Christmas. Featuring the highly acclaimed Sunshine Coast Oriana Choir and the multi-award-winning Brisbane Excelsior Band, Joy to the World will showcase beloved and favourite carols, beautiful and moving seasonal songs and the most joyful Christmas music. Filmed in December 2017 at the Oriana Christmas - Joy to the World concert.

programme.title: Kids Beach Club
programme.desc: Join the Beach Club Kids as they navigate life, explore character lessons, and have a blast playing memorable games while discovering God through the pages of His Word, the Bible.

programme.title: Torchlighters: Heroes of the Faith
programme.desc: This is an action-packed sotry behind "The Salvation Army" and its founder, William Booth. The pub owners and their hired thugs are ready for William and his ragtag followers when they come to chase this preacher out of town once and for all. But William and his "Salvation Army" are not so easily dissuaded! Armed only with Bibles, musical instruments and their unflinching faith in God, they march in to face their most dangerous opponents so far. Who will win the spiritual battle for the hurting souls of this forgotten corner of London?

programme.title: Ancestors: Old Testament
programme.desc: Discover how similar we are to our faith ancestors from the Old Testament. These animations reveal more about Bible heroes, villains, and everyday folks that God selected to do extraordinary things.

programme.title: The Catholic Guy
programme.desc: Bruce Downes is The Catholic Guy. Bruce and his team will move, inspire and challenge you to live your life to the absolute fullest. No matter your age, situation or background, be prepared to laugh, learn and listen to what God is trying to say to you. Bruce travels Australia speaking regularly about his experiences in life and in the Church in a way that is both relatable and easy to understand. Bruces message of power, impact, freedom and purpose is for anyone and everyone - for no matter where you are around the world today, God is never far from you.

programme.title: The Incredible Journey
programme.sub-title: Checkpoint Charlie and The Price of Freedom
programme.desc: Gary Kent is the speaker for The Incredible Journey. He is an archaeologist who has excavated numerous sites throughout Israel and Jordan. He holds a BA in Theology, MA in Ancient History and Archaeology, and M in Divinity. As an internationally-acclaimed speaker and TV presenter, he has spoken and produced numerous documentaries on subjects including the Bible, Bible prophecy, world events, historical places and natural health. His passion is to share the good news of Jesus soon return.

programme.title: Christmas Comes Home
programme.desc: When Abbey returns to her grandmothers old house for the first time in years, she finds more than peeling paint and dusty memories - she discovers a chance to rekindle the Christmas spirit she thought shed lost. With the unexpected help of her childhood crush, now a devoted single dad, and his six-year-old son, Abbey begins restoring the home that shaped her childhood. As they repair creaky floorboards and untangle strings of lights, they also recreate her grandmothers beloved handmade ornaments for the towns annual Christmas fair. Along the way, Abbey is reminded of the magic of tradition, the power of community, and the possibility of new beginnings - especially at Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas on Call
programme.desc: In the lead-up to Christmas, emergency room doctor Hannah Michaels juggles her demanding job and a budding romance with EMT Wes Sullivan in Philadelphia. They spend time together as Wes helps her become more acquainted with the sights, sounds and tastes of Philadelphia, its clear that theyre starting to fall for each other. As the local First Responders balance duty with holiday celebrations, they come together to face challenges, support each other and find moments of joy.

programme.title: New Horizons
programme.sub-title: Set Free to Follow God Pt20
programme.desc: The stories told in the book of Exodus are among the most foundational in the whole of the Bible. Gods rescue of his people from slavery is a model for every act of salvation and these events are continually reinterpreted to make sense of Gods actions. However, Gods interest is not merely in rescuing an oppressed group of people, but to bring them into a life-giving relationship that is part of his biggest plan to renew the whole world.

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.sub-title: Benefits Of Praying In Tongues Pt 2 of 3
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches dynamic messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God. His desire is to help believers understand grace and how greatly blessed, highly favoured and deeply loved they are by their heavenly Father.

programme.title: Bible Discovery TV
programme.desc: Hosted by the Hembree family, this is a daily devotional show where Rod, Janice, Ryan and Corie walk you through the Word in a way that will forever change how you read, learn and experience the Bible.

programme.title: Elevation Experience
programme.desc: The Elevation Experience with Pastor Steven Furtick features inspirational messages from Pastor Steven as well as original worship music from Elevation Church in Charlotte, North Carolina.

programme.title: Joyce Meyer: Enjoying Everyday Life
programme.desc: How many people enjoy their regular, everyday life? Today, Joyce shares the keys to enjoying your life, every single day.

programme.title: Bottled With Love
programme.desc: Abbey, a driven executive from Boston, makes a bold move in a rare moment of vulnerability, pouring her heart into an anonymous letter about her longing for love. Sealing it in a bottle, she tosses it into Boston Harbour, never expecting it to be found. Months later, the bottle washes ashore and is discovered by Nick, the son of the CEO of Everett Valley Farms - the very company where Abbey is about to close the biggest deal of her career. When Nick returns home to help with his fathers business, he decides to reach out to the mystery woman using the email address in the letter. Unaware of each others true identities, Abbey and Nick form a growing connection online. However, in person, they find themselves clashing as theyre forced to work together on a major project. As their relationship deepens, both online and offline, theyre faced with the challenge of reconciling their professional differences with their blossoming romance.

programme.title: Celebrations with Lacey Chabert
programme.desc: 17-year old Makyla founded non-profit Baila Conmigo to offer free dance programs to children in need. Lacey and her team are ready to recognise this inspiring leader by throwing her a graduation party.

programme.title: Celebrations with Lacey Chabert
programme.desc: Liv created the Underdog Community Project to aid the overlooked unhoused community and their pets. Lacey Chabert and team come together to celebrate and honour Livs selfless dedication and big heart in a big way.

programme.title: Celebrations with Lacey Chabert
programme.desc: Partially deaf himself, high school senior Jonah volunteers at No Limits a nonprofit teaching deaf children skills. Now, Lacey and her team are ready to throw this teen role model a true Hollywood red carpet gala.

programme.title: Celebrations with Lacey Chabert
programme.desc: Teacher Adrien Murphy is the founder of after school program Kindness Club, where she inspires kids to give back to the community. Lacey shows Adrien that kindness comes back to you with a surprise Glamp-out to remember.

programme.title: Compassion Stories
programme.desc: Follow powerful stories highlighting the transformative work of the Compassion Child Sponsorship Program in Africa, South America, India and Asia. Gain insight and inspiration through the honest eyes of those directly affected in this compelling series, Compassion Stories. Hear about the journey of individuals and families as they search for hope in their different circumstances of poverty and desperation.

programme.title: Billy Graham Classics
programme.desc: Billy Graham tells the Christmas Story (1977).

programme.title: GGC Life TV
programme.desc: Glorious Gospel Church has been meeting the needs of the community since 1990. With a vision for a church that is real, relatable, enjoyable, life-changing and uplifting, they are committed to providing church services that will enable you to experience church this way. Linked by mutual vision and values, which are based firmly in the Bible and what the Bible teaches, GGCs mandate is to express the Good News of Jesus Christ in a relatable and practical way.

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.sub-title: Benefits Of Praying In Tongues Pt 2 of 3
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches dynamic messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God. His desire is to help believers understand grace and how greatly blessed, highly favoured and deeply loved they are by their heavenly Father.

programme.title: Lessons From The Bible
programme.desc: Join Pastor Doug, Dusty, Amelia and all the characters as they learn about the Bible and how it applies to daily life. Games, songs, and some silly puppets will inspire kids.

programme.title: Connect
programme.desc: A school theatre group aspires to stage every book of the Bible. The kids have questions and an ever-expanding cast of surprising and often bizarre visitors is on hand to help them navigate their journey through the scriptures.

programme.title: Jentezen Franklin
programme.desc: New York Times bestselling author, Pastor Jentezen Franklin, brings practical meaning to spiritual truths found in Gods Word. Kingdom Connection is the teaching ministry of Free Chapel, a multi-campus church with a global ministry. Hear inspiration for change, healing, peace and joy through his affective communication connecting you to God, the church, and the world!

programme.title: The Christian View
programme.desc: The Christian View is a fast-paced, high-energy half-hour TV talk show with a panel of sharp, well-educated, quick-witted women and men - and the occasional guest co-host - discussing todays hot topics and headlines from a Biblical perspective.

programme.title: At the Table
programme.desc: Real women, real conversations, real issues. Its where youll find information on family, health and spirituality, but most of all, a community doing motherhood together.

programme.title: Bible Discovery TV
programme.desc: Hosted by the Hembree family, this is a daily devotional show where Rod, Janice, Ryan and Corie walk you through the Word in a way that will forever change how you read, learn and experience the Bible.

programme.title: Answers with Bayless Conley
programme.desc: If youre like many people, you might wonder if peace is really possible in the world today. In Jesus, Prince of Peace, Pastor Bayless shares how peace is not found in the absence of problems but in the presence of Jesus Himself. Youll learn that Jesus gives a different kind of peace than the world gives-a peace thats not a counterfeit or a substitute, but true, abiding peace that can only come from God. If your life feels chaotic or uncertain, dont miss this message. Let the Prince of Peace step into your situation and give you His peace-a peace that passes understanding.

programme.title: Katherine Ruonala Ministries
programme.desc: We are going to be like those who dreamed. We are in a window and a season of divine acceleration. Right now is harvest time so make hay while the sun shines.

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: A daily program with news, interviews, lifestyle features and true-life stories from a Christian perspective. Including powerful and dramatic testimonies of God touching peoples lives. Where does the name The 700 Club come from? When the show started to air more than 50 years ago, founder and host Pat Robertson needed to have just 700 Partners to donate $5 a month to make the programme possible. Those original 700 supporters couldnt have imagined they would start a TV show that is now seen every day in over 200 countries, impacting the nations with the Gospel of Jesus Christ.

programme.title: Joyce Meyer: Enjoying Everyday Life
programme.sub-title: Less Is More This Christmas - Part 1
programme.desc: Overwhelmed by holiday to-dos? Today, Joyce, Ginger, Erin and Holly Wagner share faith-filled tips-boundaries, gifts, rest, gratitude-so you enjoy Gods presence over presents.

programme.title: In Touch
programme.sub-title: Christmas: The Wisdom of God/Understanding Who Jesus Is
programme.desc: The In Touch program reaches the world with the Gospel with messages that tackle such issues as parenting, finances, personal crises, emotions, and relationships. Dr. Stanley fervently believes the Bible to be the inerrant Word of God, a belief strongly reflected in his teaching. Dr Charles Stanley is the author of more than 50 books.

programme.title: Christmas Comes Home
programme.desc: When Abbey returns to her grandmothers old house for the first time in years, she finds more than peeling paint and dusty memories - she discovers a chance to rekindle the Christmas spirit she thought shed lost. With the unexpected help of her childhood crush, now a devoted single dad, and his six-year-old son, Abbey begins restoring the home that shaped her childhood. As they repair creaky floorboards and untangle strings of lights, they also recreate her grandmothers beloved handmade ornaments for the towns annual Christmas fair. Along the way, Abbey is reminded of the magic of tradition, the power of community, and the possibility of new beginnings - especially at Christmas.

programme.title: Merry Christmas?
programme.desc: For many, Christmas is a time of excitement and joy as loving families share in the festive traditions of the season. But for others, the Christmas holidays are only a reminder of what is missing in life. Merry Christmas? tells the stories of three such people. Sherry was abused as a child and sank into a life of prostitution, crime, and drug use. For her, Christmas was always the time when she hit rock bottom. As a young girl, Mirasel was orphaned after a natural disaster struck her native Philippines. She spent years without the love and support of a family. Vinny, an aspiring rock musician was on the road to fame and fortune until his wife died tragically and he was diagnosed with multiple sclerosis, events that shattered him and derailed his hopes and dreams. Yet, through the struggles and pain these three individuals have found the grace to cope with their losses and move ahead in faith. Pastor Mark Jeske of the Time of Grace television program hosts this Christmas special and brings perspective to these stories as he unveils how the Christmas story speaks to hurting people.

programme.title: Dream: Live with Purpose, Learn to Dream
programme.sub-title: Writing for Jesus with Bryan and Katie Torwalt
programme.desc: Dream is a documentary series featuring the stories of diverse people from around the globe, who found purpose when they embraced their God-given dream.

programme.title: Holy Moly
programme.desc: This program turns the Bible into a living, breathing colouring book that will delight children of all ages. The series focuses on the Biblical characters actions and emotions.

programme.title: The Blello Show
programme.desc: Join Kyle, Lyds, Extra Bear, and Stu as they share with you some cool vids, catchy catch phrases crazy challenges, things you can do in three minutes, and other random stuff to make your life awesome.

programme.title: Elevation Experience
programme.desc: The Elevation Experience with Pastor Steven Furtick features inspirational messages from Pastor Steven as well as original worship music from Elevation Church in Charlotte, North Carolina.

programme.title: Bible Land Passages
programme.sub-title: The Power of Jesus in Galilee
programme.desc: Bible Land Passages is designed help others better understand and appreciate the Bible. Read about places like Beersheba, Jericho, Jerusalem, Caesarea, and cities surrounding the Sea of Galilee, and discover that those places exist just as the Bible describes. Explore the lands of the Bible and uncover a window into the ancient past. Sift through the archaeological data, travel down the pathways of the Bible lands and traverse through the passages of its ancient cities, trade routes, and caves and understand and appreciate the challenges of life faced by Christian forbearers, and learn how God used the historical and geographic setting of the Bible lands to refine and develop their faith. Those same real places and same real settings - when examined in the modern era - can likewise become a passage for developing greater faith and devotion for God.

programme.title: Sweet Navidad
programme.desc: Pastry chef Carmen dreams of opening her own bakery. Paired with another chef for a grand event, they eventually come together to create a truly inspired menu in time for Christmas.

programme.title: Following Yonder Star
programme.desc: Abby was once Americas favourite TV mum, but after a public scandal upends her life, she retreats to a luxury Vermont resort to escape the spotlight over Christmas. Her plans quickly unravel when a booking mishap leaves her without a room, and all nearby accommodations are full thanks to a rare celestial event: a star said to mirror the Star of Bethlehem, visible only on Christmas Eve. Salvation comes in the form of a charming local BandB, run by Nick, a widowed high school astronomy teacher juggling innkeeping and directing the towns beloved Christmas pageant. Moved by his story and the weight he quietly carries, Abby offers to lend a hand around the inn and with the pageant. As she immerses herself in the small-town festivities and forms a growing bond with Nick, Abby rediscovers the joy of community, the warmth of genuine connection, and a glimmer of hope she thought shed lost. Sometimes, the brightest stars shine when - and where - you least expect them.

programme.title: The Incredible Journey
programme.desc: Gary Kent is the speaker for The Incredible Journey. He is an archaeologist who has excavated numerous sites throughout Israel and Jordan. He holds a BA in Theology, MA in Ancient History and Archaeology, and M in Divinity. As an internationally-acclaimed speaker and TV presenter, he has spoken and produced numerous documentaries on subjects including the Bible, Bible prophecy, world events, historical places and natural health. His passion is to share the good news of Jesus soon return.

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.sub-title: Benefits Of Praying In Tongues Pt 3 of 3
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches dynamic messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God. His desire is to help believers understand grace and how greatly blessed, highly favoured and deeply loved they are by their heavenly Father.

programme.title: Joel Osteen
programme.desc: Direct from Houston, Texas, USA, join Joel and Victoria Osteen and the team from Lakewood Church for this program of powerful music and empowering preaching. Experience from the weekend church service of Lakewood Church, the largest and fastest growing church in America that is inspiring millions of people around the world!

programme.title: The Way of the Master
programme.desc: Is baptism required for salvation? What about death bed confessions?

programme.title: Joyce Meyer: Enjoying Everyday Life
programme.sub-title: Less Is More This Christmas - Part 1
programme.desc: Overwhelmed by holiday to-dos? Today, Joyce, Ginger, Erin and Holly Wagner share faith-filled tips-boundaries, gifts, rest, gratitude-so you enjoy Gods presence over presents.

programme.title: Celebrations with Lacey Chabert
programme.desc: Carmela prepares to lead her first solo mission with Mending Kids, providing medical care to sick children worldwide. Lacey sends her off with a surprise fiesta that brings her back to her Peruvian roots.

programme.title: Celebrations with Lacey Chabert
programme.desc: Sheri founded Happy Hats to bring joy back to sick children while they receive treatment. Lacey plans an elegant Tea Party to show how Happy Hats make a difference.

programme.title: Celebrations with Lacey Chabert
programme.desc: Dr Ifunanya Nweke founded Jazz Hands for Autism to empower neurodivergent creatives. Lacey plans to throw Ifu an incredible Christmas party to thank her for supporting the community.

programme.title: Power for Living
programme.desc: Powerful words from Evangelist and Pastor Bill Newman.

programme.title: In Touch
programme.sub-title: Christmas: The Wisdom of God/Understanding Who Jesus Is
programme.desc: The In Touch program reaches the world with the Gospel with messages that tackle such issues as parenting, finances, personal crises, emotions, and relationships. Dr. Stanley fervently believes the Bible to be the inerrant Word of God, a belief strongly reflected in his teaching. Dr Charles Stanley is the author of more than 50 books.

programme.title: David Pawson
programme.desc: Why was the Bible written? David Pawson explores scripture and discovers some hidden gems. David Pawson has a BSc in Agriculture and an MA in Theology from Cambridge. He was a Chaplain in the RAF for three years and went on to become Pastor of two Baptist Churches (Gold Hill in Buckinghamshire and the Millmead Centre in Guildford) where he maintained a strong Bible teaching ministry. Released for a wider ministry in 1979, he has since spoken in numerous towns and cities in the British Isles and also extensively overseas. He is the author of a number of books including Truth To Tell, Leadership is Male and The Normal Christian Birth.

programme.title: Love and Glamping
programme.desc: Katie works for a lifestyle magazine for modern women - but shes stuck writing mindless articles about shampoo and nail polish. When the opportunity for a high profile travel story presents itself, she jumps at the opportunity. Katie is far from sporty but sets out to face her fears as she crafts an article about a week at a high end glamping resort. Having discovered Will Taylor, an environment conservationist and rugged adventurer who works at the resort, there might be a couple of extra unexpected surprises for Katie on this assignment.

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.sub-title: Benefits Of Praying In Tongues Pt 3 of 3
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches dynamic messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God. His desire is to help believers understand grace and how greatly blessed, highly favoured and deeply loved they are by their heavenly Father.

programme.title: Go Frills
programme.desc: Go Frills is a live action childrens program, with original songs and interactive themes, that are informative, wholesome and above all a lot of fun! Join the Frills family aboard their funky fun tour bus as they have exciting adventures, meet new people and present their awesome live rock show.

programme.title: Night Owls and Early Birds
programme.sub-title: Followers of Jesus Plan for the Future
programme.desc: Join Hoot, Savannah, Screech, Charlie, and Steve as they take a deeper dive into the truths found in Gods Word.

programme.title: The Garden
programme.desc: Lenny Lion and Lucy Lamb are the caretakers for a magical garden where anything can grow. They work for The Boss (God) who gives them a new assignment to complete in every episode. Lenny is always happy and ready to take on the tasks the Boss gives him. However, much like Peter in the gospels, Lenny doesnt always think before he acts and usually needs help getting out of sticky situations. But hes teachable and willing to admit when hes wrong. His two best qualities are that he loves Jesus and is a true friend to Lucy. Lucy is sweet, smart and lamb-tastic! Shes kind-hearted, loving, and aims to support everyone she meets. Inside that happy demeanor is a strong-willed, adventurous, task-oriented gal who will take on any task handed to her. But, she still has a lot to learn when it comes to being an example for others. Her two best qualities are that she takes very good care of Lenny and points everyone to Jesus.

programme.title: Impact for Life
programme.desc: An inspirational program with principles for living, and life stories from everyday New Zealanders. Collated with a fresh and dynamic edge, Pastors Peter and Bev Mortlock share principles both from the platform, and on location. Impact for Life equips people to mature and grow into Christ-likeness while maximising their potential.

programme.title: Three Chairs
programme.desc: Three Chairs is a talk show with a difference that celebrates the art of good conversation. This exciting new production from NZs Shine TV features a range of special guests. Our hosts grapple with topics including dating, phone addiction, parenting, and gender equality. Find out more about them when they answer some strange and personal questions interspersed with lots of laughs. Three Chairs will make you think and smile - all at the same time!

programme.title: Living The Dream
programme.desc: In the episode, Tori and Jason, renovate Dixie Sunflower from a junky house that is falling apart to a spacious and comfortable design.

programme.title: The Good Road
programme.desc: A journey through the unique ecosystems of Puerto Rico highlight the important role government agencies, university initiatives and local communities play in conservation and the fight against climate change. And, we explore the mangrove fields of La Paguera on kayaks with Rene Esteves of University of Puerto Ricos Sea Grant. We see first-hand the delicate balance of conservation and community.

programme.title: Be Great. Do Good
programme.sub-title: The Power of Good: Ian Warren
programme.desc: Thinking that you need to be great, before you start to do good is a misguided mindset. Rather, when people engage in doing good as an integral business mindset, again and again it leads to successful business, including better financial outcomes. Peter talks with Ian Warren from Stellen Engineering about how his willingness to start small and stay in rhythm with acts for good have helped drive success within his business. Helping to create a team that loves to work in the business because of the impact for good that it has. Peter and the team explore how doing good provides benefits both personally for business leaders as well as for the businesses they lead.

programme.title: Jentezen Franklin
programme.desc: New York Times bestselling author, Pastor Jentezen Franklin, brings practical meaning to spiritual truths found in Gods Word. Kingdom Connection is the teaching ministry of Free Chapel, a multi-campus church with a global ministry. Hear inspiration for change, healing, peace and joy through his affective communication connecting you to God, the church, and the world!

programme.title: David Jeremiah
programme.desc: Complete the journey to Bethlehem and rejoice in the Saviours birth with the final part of Why the Nativity?

programme.title: PowerPoint with Jack Graham
programme.desc: PowerPoint Ministries started as a vision of Dr Jack Graham and his wife, Deb, 20 years ago. They believed that the power of God was evident in their growing church and that His Gospel message should be spread beyond the walls of that church to the world at large. They put their faith into action and purchased airtime on the Trinity Broadcasting Network. PowerPoint Ministries was then officially launched in April 1994. Over the past 19 years, PowerPoint Ministries has grown to an expansive network of local, national, and international television and radio broadcasts. In fact, PowerPoint can be seen or heard by a potential audience of millions of television viewers and radio listeners across the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, South Africa, Iran, Russia, Israel and more. The Ministry has a vision to glorify God by introducing Jesus Christ as Lord to as many people as possible and to develop them in Christian living using the most effective means to impact the world, making an eternal difference in this generation.

programme.title: Joyce Meyer: Enjoying Everyday Life
programme.sub-title: Less Is More This Christmas - Part 2
programme.desc: Busy calendar, tight budget, tricky family? Today, Joyce and friends offer doable "less is more" practices-more sleep, more worship, more gratitude-to rediscover peace and delight.

programme.title: Hour of Power
programme.desc: Since 1970 the Hour of Power has been reaching viewers from around the world. Originally founded by Dr Robert H Schuller, the program became the most-watched religious program in the world, reaching 17 million viewers. Now under the leadership of Bobby Schuller, Dr Schullers grandson. The congregation worships at Shepherds Grove Church in Garden Grove, CA. The program aims to provide spiritual principles and practices that can help people, as they become happy students of Jesus and live a life of meaning. To learn more about who they are in Christ through the process of formation, to belong to his family of believers and become a part of the community and to heal as they are loved and then love and help heal others through mission. Jesus Christ ushered in the Kingdom of God into our world through His death and resurrection. He invites everyone to be a part of this amazing movement by trusting and following Him. There is no fuller, richer life than the one that is lived in Christ.

programme.title: Bible Land Passages
programme.desc: Bible Land Passages is designed help others better understand and appreciate the Bible. Read about places like Beersheba, Jericho, Jerusalem, Caesarea, and cities surrounding the Sea of Galilee, and discover that those places exist just as the Bible describes. Explore the lands of the Bible and uncover a window into the ancient past. Sift through the archaeological data, travel down the pathways of the Bible lands and traverse through the passages of its ancient cities, trade routes, and caves and understand and appreciate the challenges of life faced by Christian forbearers, and learn how God used the historical and geographic setting of the Bible lands to refine and develop their faith. Those same real places and same real settings - when examined in the modern era - can likewise become a passage for developing greater faith and devotion for God.

programme.title: Towards Belief
programme.desc: Towards Belief follows Australian pastor and host, Karl Faase as he travels to the UK, USA and Australia to interview more than thirty leading authors, speakers and apologists as they seek to defuse the top belief blockers to the Christian faith.

programme.title: Everyone: Amsterdam 23
programme.desc: This 3 day conference held in the Netherlands in 2023 was packed with many great speakers around the world. All with one heart and mission to reach EVERYONE worldwide with Christ. We bring you this conference to encourage your faith and equip you to reach others in your community with the gospel. Speakers include Billy Wilson, Rick Warren, Bill Johnson, Christine Caine, Nicky Gumbel and many more.

programme.title: Whats Cooking with Young and Free
programme.desc: Join Young and Free in the kitchen as they serve up a feast of music videos and a side of laughs.

programme.title: OK TV
programme.desc: Hosts Brendon and Cathie have have poured their 30 years of experience with kids in schools and in ministry and the great goals of the local church into a energetpic show that will engage the next generation.

programme.title: Connect
programme.desc: A school theatre group aspires to stage every book of the Bible. The kids have questions and an ever-expanding cast of surprising and often bizarre visitors is on hand to help them navigate their journey through the scriptures.

programme.title: TV One Life
programme.desc: TV One Life is the kind of show that will keep you watching. Its a commercial spoof one minute, a reality segment the next and heartfelt ministry after that. Between the humour, music and unfiltered ministry, the message is clear, "God can change your life"! Fasten your seatbelts for this roller coaster ride of a show!

programme.title: Hour of Power
programme.desc: Celebrate Christmas with Hour of Power Christmas Candlelight Service, featuring Choir, Orchestra, Voices of Hope Childrens Choir, and a special message from Pastor Bobby Schuller.

programme.title: Three Wiser Men and a Boy
programme.desc: Three brothers get the surprise of their lives when they are forced to work together to care for a baby during the festive season. As they slowly get the hang of things, they find themselves on unexpected journeys of self-discovery and begin to rebuild their relationships as brothers, as well as the damaged romantic and professional relationships in their respective lives...all while rediscovering their love of Christmas.

programme.title: Three Wiser Men and a Boy
programme.desc: Its five years later and Christmas is once again just around the corner. In a crazy turn of events, possibly brought on accidentally by the brothers themselves, the director of Lukes son Thomas school holiday musical steps down. Luke, desperate to make his sons stage dreams come true, enlists the help of his brothers Taylor and Stephan. The trio also find themselves meeting their mothers new boyfriend and the brothers grapple with their own feelings about this relationship. In true Brenner brother fashion, they are all in for a Christmas they will never forget.

programme.title: The Ride: A Christmas Eve Parable
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve in the suburbs of Chicago and a bored, disengaged taxi driver reluctantly accepts one more pickup. The customer asks to be taken to a local bridge and the cabbie soon begins to suspect that his passenger is planning to commit suicide. In an uncharacteristic attempt to help, the cab-driver makes excuses to prolong the ride while he attempts to connect with and help his distraught fare. As the night progresses, grace invades the hearts of both the complacent and the desolate. Directed by Dallas Jenkins (What If...) and winner of the TAFF 2013 Best Film Award, The Ride has brought church audiences to their feet and impacted thousands.

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.sub-title: Make Room For Christ Pt 1 of 3

programme.title: Overcomer
programme.desc: Life changes overnight for Coach John Harrison when his high school basketball team and state championship dreams are crushed under the weight of unexpected news. When the largest manufacturing plant shuts down and hundreds of families leave their town, John questions how he and his family will face an uncertain future. After reluctantly agreeing to coach cross-country, John and his wife, Amy, meet an aspiring athlete whos pushing her limits on a journey toward discovery. Inspired by the words and prayers of a new-found friend, John becomes the least likely coach helping the least likely runner attempt the impossible in the biggest race of the year.

programme.title: Prone to Wander
programme.desc: Seven months after a family tragedy, Anastasia Dearborn withdraws to the Appalachian Trail to salvage her identity but gets more than she bargains for after encountering three fellow hikers.

programme.title: A Moment in History
programme.desc: Join host Seth Udinski as he explores the most pivotal moments in history and the Bible, providing insight into the events that have shaped our world.

programme.title: The Fatherless Epidemic
programme.desc: A short documentary addressing one of the most pressing issue in Western society - The Fatherless Epidemic. While everyone attempts to solve societal ills by treating symptoms, the church is being called to fight the issue at its roots. The solution to curing the epidemic is not to outsource it to the government, but to mobilise the church and begin to wage war against the enemy that is decimating our homes.

programme.title: Impact for Life

programme.title: Whirl
programme.desc: Whirl is a Bible-based cartoon series about the loveable, sometimes overly-enthusiastic kids of First Second Church. In each episode, the kids tackle a different theme that is central to Christian values. Everything from generosity and forgiveness to doubt and the trinity are explored over the course of the series. And while the issues dealt with in each episode are relatable, the solutions this kooky cast often find are a bit... unconventional. Whether the kids of First Second Church are searching for a hidden sanctum of the churchs altar guild, or trying to outsmart robots bent on world domination, these characters will keep the whole family laughing and learning.

programme.title: Spark Story Bible Adventures
programme.desc: Spark Story Bible Adventures bring the stories of the Bible to life with colourful animation and with Squiggles, an expressive little caterpillar whose reactions put children right in the middle of the story. Spark Bible stories are designed to help kids grow in faith as they explore, discover, and wonder about Gods Word.

programme.title: Superbook
programme.desc: The familiar and the futuristic interact with ancient people, places and events to create a sense of wonder, anticipation, empowerment, and personal breakthrough as the children witness Gods interaction with man. Superbook is always an exciting journey, full of discovery - with a transformational outcome. Superbook teaches children timeless moral truths and life lessons through the captivating, Bible-based adventures of two time-traveling children and their robot friend. Play fun Superbook games here: https://us-en.superbook.cbn.com/games.

programme.title: Veggie Tales: The Star of Christmas
programme.desc: This action-packed adventure teaches that its the true story of Gods love that shows us how to love one another - at Christmas time and throughout the year!

programme.title: The Great Pottery Throw Down
programme.desc: Ten home potters from around the country head to Stoke-on-Trent, the home of pottery, in their quest to become Top Potter. Over 35 days and 18 mammoth challenges, the potters must make earthenware kitchen bowls, decorative raku vases, delicate but functional chandeliers and super-sized garden sculptures. Whose work will stand up to scrutiny and whose will come out of the kiln in pieces? Judging their craft skills and creativity are two leading lights in the world of pottery: ceramic artist Kate Malone, and master potter Keith Brymer Jones. Hosting the action, and holding the potters mucky hands along the way, is Sara Cox. Across six action-packed episodes, we discover the art and science of turning lumps of clay into beautiful objects. With its rich heritage, intriguing technical language and magical transformations, this program brings the messy and marvellous world of pottery to life.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Having already sold their London home, the pressure is on Nicki Chapman to find the days couple their perfect property in wonderful Wiltshire. Nicki pays a visit to one of the countys local radio stations.

programme.title: 24 Hours in Emergency
programme.desc: Three-year-old Louie is airlifted to St Georges after being run over by a car while playing outside his house. Doctors are concerned that his neck seems to be stuck in one position, which could indicate damage to his neck and spine. Fourteen-year-old Josh arrives in resus having injured his ankle while riding a BMX with his dad on the front. Meanwhile, 41-year-old Sam arrives in resus after losing control of her car and crashing into a tree. Doctors are concerned about possible spinal and internal injuries.

programme.title: 24 Hours in Emergency
programme.desc: Three-year-old Louie is airlifted to St Georges after being run over by a car while playing outside his house. Fourteen-year-old Josh arrives in resus having injured his ankle while riding a BMX with his dad on the front. programme.title: Bargain Hunt

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Mark Hill and Roo Irvine set their sights on the rarities sitting in Scotlands antique shops. While one decides to invest in some early 20th-century finds, the other goes for a specific Japanese design.

programme.title: Nurses On The Ward
programme.desc: Following the nurses of Queen Alexandra Hospital in Portsmouth as they work across multiple areas of the hospital treating both male and female patients from a range of age groups.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jules Hudson is rural property hunting in Norfolk with a couple of retired accountants who want to invest their 550,000-pounds budget in a character home that gives them countryside and community on their doorstep.

programme.title: The Great Pottery Throw Down
programme.desc: Ten home potters from around the country head to Stoke-on-Trent, the home of pottery, in their quest to become Top Potter. Over 35 days and 18 mammoth challenges, the potters must make earthenware kitchen bowls, decorative raku vases, delicate but functional chandeliers and super-sized garden sculptures. Whose work will stand up to scrutiny and whose will come out of the kiln in pieces? Judging their craft skills and creativity are two leading lights in the world of pottery: ceramic artist Kate Malone, and master potter Keith Brymer Jones. Hosting the action, and holding the potters mucky hands along the way, is Sara Cox. Across six action-packed episodes, we discover the art and science of turning lumps of clay into beautiful objects. With its rich heritage, intriguing technical language and magical transformations, this program brings the messy and marvellous world of pottery to life.

programme.title: Selling Houses Australia
programme.desc: Selling a home is never easy, selling your parents home is harder still. Jane Johns mother, Bernadette, passed away unexpectedly and Jane was left in possession of her house, the house she grew up in. Set on a massive 42 acres of land this retro 70s style Spanish home was turning buyers away. Jane and her family desperately need to sell this house as the maintenance of this property alone is an additional cost they cant afford. Can the Selling Houses Team help Jane transform this house and bring it back into the 21st century?

programme.desc: Ten home potters from around the country head to Stoke-on-Trent, the home of pottery, in their quest to become Top Potter. Over 35 days and 18 mammoth challenges, the potters must make earthenware kitchen bowls, decorative raku vases, delicate but functional chandeliers and super-sized garden sculptures. Whose work will stand up to scrutiny and whose will come out of the kiln in pieces? Judging their craft skills and creativity are two leading lights in the world of pottery: ceramic artist Kate Malone, and master potter Keith Brymer Jones. Hosting the action, and holding the potters mucky hands along the way, is Sara Cox. Across six action-packed episodes, we discover the art and science of turning lumps of clay into beautiful objects. With its rich heritage, intriguing technical language and magical transformations, this program brings the messy and marvellous world of pottery to life.

programme.title: Selling Houses Australia
programme.desc: Single mother Charmaine entered the workforce after raising her children and decided to invest in property for her retirement plan. After months on the market and witnessing similar properties in the area sell, Charmaine needs help to sell and secure her future nest egg. While this property does have charm, its in desperate need of a cosmetic lift to make it stand out amongst the new builds around it. This devoted mother needs the Selling Houses Australia team to help her transform her property so she can secure a sale and make some headway on her retirement plan.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Space for holiday lets or glamping is the priority for a couple today who are chasing a complete change of lifestyle in Wales. Steve Brown kickstarts their journey with homes with business potential.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: This series travels the country, bringing together in each location, specialists in antiques and fine arts to have them appraise items brought in by local residents.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: The Bargain Hunt team pay a visit to the Mona Showground in Anglesey. Anita Manning presents, and lending a hand to the teams are Danny Sebastian and Nick Hall. Both teams race around the fair hoping to pick up three bargains which will hopefully make them a profit at auction. Anita also finds out how the village of Portmeirion became the birthplace of some famous pottery.

programme.title: Rick Steins Seafood Odyssey
programme.desc: Rick Stein travels to some of the worlds main centres of seafood excellence, picking up recipe ideas, sampling new ingredients and gleaning new techniques for preparing and cooking fish.

programme.title: Rick Steins Cornwall
programme.desc: Rick goes fishing for his favourite oysters, makes a delicious fish soup and discovers the all-but-forgotten story of Cornwalls ancient capital, Lostwithiel.

programme.title: Food Safari Earth
programme.desc: Protein rich beans have always been the heavy lifters of the vegetable world. Maeve discovers the secrets of a classic falafel with founder of a Middle Eastern food empire Faysal El-Abd and tastes a falafel roll made with fresh herbs, pickles and tarator sauce. Chef and culinary teacher Daisy Rajan shares her delicious recipe for Keralan green beans with coconut. Maeve discovers how soy beans are transformed into silky tofu, and enjoys a recipe for a deliciously textured Indonesian Gado Gado with home cook Mariana Purnama. Attila Yilmaz shares his recipe for a magnificent spiced red lentil Turkish street food known as Mercimek Kofte. To finish, theres a Portuguese tart using white beans known as Queijadas de Feijao from pastry chef Joao Cadete.

programme.title: Food Safari Earth
programme.desc: Maeve spends time in Andrew McConnells treasured vegetable and herb garden, from which he creates a many textured roast beetroot salad with clever additions including pickled rhubarb and nasturtium vinegar. Maeve visits a carefully tended Lebanese home garden where the wild thyme known as zaatar is grown, dried and used to make a magnificent spice mix which is spread on home-baked flat bread. Delightful young Persian chef Sanam Janghorban creates a spectacular flavoursome fresh herb omelette Kuku Sabzi to celebrate the Nowruz or Persian New Year. Talented Bangladeshi-born chef Tapos Singha showcases the whole spice blend known as Panch Phoron in a Bengali Vegetarian dish called Shukto made with the subcontinents favourite vegetables, drumsticks and bottle gourd. Finally, Maeve is rewarded with a luscious Sri Lankan Love Cake, fragrant with spices baked by Debbie Solomon, daughter of Australian food legend, Charmaine Solomon.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsays Ultimate Home Cooking
programme.desc: Gordons guide to home cooking continues as he shows us how to serve up great food that really packs a big and bold punch. His eldest daughter Megan helps cook crispy roast duck with black bean sauce and a stunning spiced banana tart tatin.

programme.title: Food Safari Earth
programme.desc: Tomato Day is the most special of day on the Italian Food Calendar and Maeve joins three generations of the Baggio Family in suburban Melbourne as they preserve the goodness of summer with a home-made passata. Italian food legend, Guy Grossi celebrates the seductive power of the vegetables known as nightshades (eggplant, tomatoes) with a delicious Garganelli Alla Norma. Maeve explores the versatility of the multi-talented eggplant - Iconic chef Tetsuya Wakuda invites us into his art-filled test kitchen to see how his ode to eggplant is created using simple techniques and a range of his favourite ingredients to create braised eggplant with saltbush. Acclaimed young chef Victor Liong transforms eggplant into chips with a wicked spicy chilli sauce. Summer is celebrated with an abundance of fresh fruit made into traditional Sicilian gelato by third generation gelato-maker Marco Enea of the Melbourne gelataria Il Melograno who whips up fragrant fresh strawberry gelato.

programme.title: Food Safari Earth
programme.desc: In this beautiful episode, Maeve visits pioneering saffron growers in Tasmania in search of the worlds most expensive spice, and joins the harvest of the little mauve crocus flower and the careful drying and preserving of saffron. Dynamic Italian-born chef Alessandro Pavoni a master of saffron risotto, shares his secrets. Maeve heads to Darwin to meet Top End food legend, Jimmy Shu who magically unlocks the rich blue hues of the tropical Butterfly Pea flower for a Nonya dumpling. Florets are celebrated and we explore a quick easy cauliflower favourite in the Lebanese world called Arnabeet Mekleh from inspiring home cook Jinan Afiouny.

programme.title: Food Safari Earth
programme.desc: Maeve explores the amazing versatility of cuisines to take simple ingredients and create incredibly delicious results using the technique of stuffing vegetables, from the Mexican favourite chiles rellenos, the mild fresh poblano chilli stuffed with a melting cheese, fried and added to a delicious tomato based sauce, a favourite recipe from Mexican food guru, chef Rafael Nazario. Maeve explores the intricate and complex world of classic Chinese dumplings with Shanghai-born chef Chris Yan who shares his recipe for their best-selling silverbeet and spinach dumplings.

programme.title: Food Safari Earth
programme.desc: Maeve explores Australias enduring love for Asian flavours with a visit to the respected master of Thai cuisine, David Thompson who shares his recipe for the most delicious, all-vegetarian pad see ew, using vegetables and silky rice noodles, cooked in minutes in a smoking wok. Then, its the fresh crispness and astringent power of unripe, or green fruit as chef O Tama Carey demonstrates her Sri Lankan family recipe for Green Mango Curry. Colombian-born chef, Oscar Espinosa showcases the power of the power of the plantain, transforming them into crunchy chips, served with a guacamole. Maeve discovers the process for extracting real coconut cream with Fijian-Australian chef, Louis Tikaram before delving into a world of tropical sweets including a pandan custard and a Goan treat of coconut and jaggery, known as patoleos.

programme.title: Food Safari Earth
programme.desc: Tomato Day is the most special of day on the Italian Food Calendar and Maeve joins three generations of the Baggio Family in suburban Melbourne as they preserve the goodness of summer with a home-made passata. Italian food legend, Guy Grossi celebrates the seductive power of the vegetables known as nightshades (eggplant, tomatoes) with a delicious Garganelli Alla Norma. Maeve explores the versatility of the multi-talented eggplant - Iconic chef Tetsuya Wakuda invites us into his art-filled test kitchen to see how his ode to eggplant is created using simple techniques and a range of his favourite ingredients to create braised eggplant with saltbush. Acclaimed young chef Victor Liong transforms eggplant into chips with a wicked spicy chilli sauce. Summer is celebrated with an abundance of fresh fruit made into traditional Sicilian gelato by third generation gelato-maker Marco Enea of the Melbourne gelataria Il Melograno who whips up fragrant fresh strawberry gelato.

programme.title: Food Safari Earth
programme.desc: In this beautiful episode, Maeve visits pioneering saffron growers in Tasmania in search of the worlds most expensive spice, and joins the harvest of the little mauve crocus flower and the careful drying and preserving of saffron. Dynamic Italian-born chef Alessandro Pavoni a master of saffron risotto, shares his secrets. Maeve heads to Darwin to meet Top End food legend, Jimmy Shu who magically unlocks the rich blue hues of the tropical Butterfly Pea flower for a Nonya dumpling. Florets are celebrated and we explore a quick easy cauliflower favourite in the Lebanese world called Arnabeet Mekleh from inspiring home cook Jinan Afiouny.
