programme.title: Food Safari Earth
programme.desc: Maeve explores the amazing versatility of cuisines to take simple ingredients and create incredibly delicious results using the technique of stuffing vegetables, from the Mexican favourite chiles rellenos, the mild fresh poblano chilli stuffed with a melting cheese, fried and added to a delicious tomato based sauce, a favourite recipe from Mexican food guru, chef Rafael Nazario. Maeve explores the intricate and complex world of classic Chinese dumplings with Shanghai-born chef Chris Yan who shares his recipe for their best-selling silverbeet and spinach dumplings.

programme.title: Food Safari Earth
programme.desc: Maeve explores Australias enduring love for Asian flavours with a visit to the respected master of Thai cuisine, David Thompson who shares his recipe for the most delicious, all-vegetarian pad see ew, using vegetables and silky rice noodles, cooked in minutes in a smoking wok. Then, its the fresh crispness and astringent power of unripe, or green fruit as chef O Tama Carey demonstrates her Sri Lankan family recipe for Green Mango Curry. Colombian-born chef, Oscar Espinosa showcases the power of the power of the plantain, transforming them into crunchy chips, served with a guacamole. Maeve discovers the process for extracting real coconut cream with Fijian-Australian chef, Louis Tikaram before delving into a world of tropical sweets including a pandan custard and a Goan treat of coconut and jaggery, known as patoleos.

programme.title: My Floating Home
programme.desc: Alan and Val McCoy are both putting their life savings on the line to make their dream of living on water come true.They have been together for 11 years but now having retired, they have decided that owning their own floating home will be a unique way to be able to visit and be near their families who all live along the canal system, across the Midlands and the north west of England. So theyve cashed in their savings, sold and downsized their home and are entrusting a boat builders in Liverpool to build them their dream narrowboat floating home; but having never lived on water before its going to be quite the lifestyle adjustment - theyll have to go back to the classroom and literally learn the ropes and then do a dummy test drive to check theyre safe on the water. Although novices they do have set ideas in place - they want a 43 inch TV with the very latest technology, a high tech security system with all mod cons and above all its got to be purple. But choosing the right shade of purple isnt as straightforward as it might look!

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia
programme.desc: What do you do if youre a perfectionist, revel in precision and minimalism, and have a deep fascination for all things Japanese? Well, if youre ex-advertising guru-turned-Japanese bar and restaurant owner Steve Minon, you track down iconic Kobe-based architect Yo Shimada to realise your dream of a Japanese-inspired Queenslander. Steve has an extremely steep block of land in the Brisbane suburb of Hamilton that will take an engineering feat of epic proportions to bring Yo Shimadas groundbreaking east-meets-west vision to life. Especially because conditions in flood-prone Queensland are vastly different from Kobe, something that becomes all too clear when the build is battered in cyclonic weather that washes much of the steep block away. With such precise and intricate design details, including the galvanised steel framework constructed by robotics, this stripped-back home takes its cues from the refinement of Japanese culture: simple, raw materials and exposed junctions that reveal the intricacies of the construction. It ticks all of Steves boxes: one bedroom, simple, elegant and pared back. But when his partner, musician Jonny, moves in with his grand piano, will this modest but beautiful house for one become a house that also works for two?

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia
programme.desc: Retired chef Phillip Murphy lives in a quirky cluster of disconnected buildings in the picturesque town of Stanley in Tasmania. His bedroom and bathroom are in an old woodshed. His kitchen and lookout are in an 1870s heritage-listed windmill a few metres away. For six years, Phillip has rattled between the two, but hes had enough. Now hes engaged his friend and architect, Greg Prentice, to design a house that will link the three small historic structures (including a decrepit rocket-shaped outhouse) into a contemporary, cohesive whole. The new building will be a direct contrast to the old, using modern materials, lots of glass and a cantilevered lounge oriented towards the spectacular view. As the property is directly below a volcanic plug called The Nut, the exterior will be clad in dark stained ply, reflecting the colours of the location.

programme.title: My Dream Home
programme.desc: Nathan and Natalia recently moved for his work, and though theyre determined to give their new city a chance, theyre getting turfed from their rental and Natalias feeling homesick. The property brothers step in, promising to make a fixer-upper feel just like home. Drew takes charge of the househunt and a decisive move proves critical at the negotiating table. Later, its up to Jonathan to transform a single-storey property into a family-friendly oasis, but unexpected problems soon threaten the bottom line.

programme.title: Love It or List It Vancouver
programme.desc: Jillian has to create a sanctuary in a mountainside home to make up for Karens killer commute, while Todd is stretched to the limit trying to find a home closer to the city, with space for a pilates studio for Ian.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Lee helps Mark and Karen find a home in Torrevieja for their 150,000-pound budget. With five properties lined up, will any entice them to buy?

programme.desc: Illness forced a man into early retirement and made his wife the sole breadwinner, but a lottery win has them moving out of their tiny apartment. They need Laurences help as they search for a perfect home.

programme.title: Work on the Wild Side

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife
programme.desc: The mercury drops, but things keep heating up for Hope. An elusive creature is caught on tape.

programme.title: Work on the Wild Side

programme.title: Work on the Wild Side

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: The Buckmans are a modern-day family facing the age-old dilemma of trying to raise children the right way. At the centre of the storm is Gil, who manages to keep his unique sense of humour while attempting to maintain a successful career and be a loving husband and parent, all at the same time. As Gil and the rest of the Buckmans discover, being the perfect parent often means just letting children be themselves.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: An ambitious genetic experiment takes the wrong turn when two twins - who look nothing alike - are born and then separated. Years later, the unlikely siblings meet: Julius, a highly educated but sheltered giant with a big heart, and Vincent, a pint-sized hustler with an insatiable lust for women and money. With girlfriends in tow and a hitman on their tail, the new-found brothers set off on a wild, cross-country misadventure to find their mother - but end up finding out more about themselves.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Dr Sherman Klump, a kind, calorically challenged genetics professor who longs to shed his 400-pound frame in order to win the heart of the beautiful Carla Purty. So, with one swig of his experimental fat-reducing serum, Sherman becomes Buddy Love, a fast-talking, pumped up, plumped-down Don Juan. Can Sherman stop his buff alter ego before its too late, or will Buddy have the last laugh?

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie
programme.desc: The Brady Bunch live in the LA suburbs, a community beset by economic adversity, a crime rate spiralling out of control and the challenges of the information superhighway. In the middle of it all, the Bradys live a chaotically idyllic existence with their kids, where 70s values reign. But problems arise to upset this perfect world. Carol and Mike face a considerable dilemma when confronted with an overdue property tax bill.

programme.title: K-9
programme.desc: An unorthodox narcotics cop teams with an independently minded police dog in this hilarious action-comedy. Headstrong Dooley is one step away from nailing a prominent socialite in a $50 million cocaine bust. Hes branded as too crazy to partner with, and no one will work with him except Jerry Lee, a superbly trained German shepherd police dog with the best nose in the drug-busting business. The unconventional pairing pleases neither partner, but after a series of shootouts, stakeouts, brawls and romantic misadventures, they develop a grudging respect for each other. Its a heart-warming, fast-footed adventure about an unlikely and unbeatable police team that will have you rooting for mans best friend.

programme.title: Foul Play
programme.desc: This bizarre, Hitchcockian comedy sees a kooky divorcee and a bumbling Federal agent take on a posse of Hollywood weirdos planning to assassinate the Pope.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part III
programme.desc: A bad guy from the original Karate Kid plots revenge on young Daniel and his mentor Miyagi after they defeat his karate school and ruin his business.

programme.title: Houseboat
programme.desc: A widowed man and his three children fall for an Italian woman who joins their floating home as housekeeper. He wins both their love and hers too.

programme.title: Barbarella
programme.desc: In the far future, in a time of way-out, psychedelic spaceships and free love, space agent Barbarella is assigned to stop the evil Durand-Durand and save humanity.

programme.title: Dantes Peak
programme.desc: An action-packed story about the incomparable power of nature and mankinds unending will to survive. When unusual seismic activity is detected in the charming little Pacific Northwest town of Dantes Peak, US. Geological Survey volcanologist Harry Dalton is called in to investigate. Certain that a long-dormant volcano is set to erupt and the townspeople are in danger, he convinces Mayor Rachel Wando to take action. Now the race is on to evacuate the town before its too late, in this gripping adventure thats filled with adrenaline-fueled action and spectacular special effects.

programme.title: Coming to America
programme.desc: Join an African Prince on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World, its time for him to find a princess... and the mission leads him and his most loyal friends to Queens, New York. In disguise as an impoverished immigrant, the pampered prince quickly finds himself a new job, new friends, new digs, new enemies and lots of trouble.

programme.title: The Devils Own
programme.desc: Rory warms to the family but cannot forget his mission, which is to buy missiles that could change the balance of power between the Irish rebels and the British forces. OMeara is devastated when his own family and home are threatened as Rorys plan brings the conflict into this otherwise happy home.

programme.title: Gattaca
programme.desc: A man is labelled an In-Valid because he was conceived not in the lab, but in love, in a future where designer people, forged in test tubes, rule society.

programme.title: Bulletproof
programme.desc: A hilarious saga of a cop, a crook and a beautiful friendship gone sour. Once inseparable pals, Archie Moses and Rock Keats find themselves on opposite sides of the law, each feeling betrayed by the other. In fact, the only person who hates them more than they hate each other is ruthless drug kingpin Frank Colton, who wants to put them both six feet under! Now, through a strange twist of fate, Moses and Keats are on the run - together. With a little luck, the bungling boys just might get out of this one alive ... if they dont kill each other first!

programme.title: Houseboat
programme.desc: A widowed man and his three children fall for an Italian woman who joins their floating home as housekeeper. He wins both their love and hers too.

programme.title: Up In Smoke
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, two free-spirited pot-heads decide to join forces in their endles search for substances to snort, smoke, or drop. This is the first film in the Cheech and Chong series.

programme.title: Coming to America

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: When Saturday detention started, they were the Jock, the Princess, the Brain, the Criminal, and the Basket Case, but by that afternoon they had become closer than any of them could have imagined.

programme.title: Bulletproof
programme.desc: A hilarious saga of a cop, a crook and a beautiful friendship gone sour. Now, through a strange twist of fate, Moses and Keats are on the run - together. With a little luck, the bungling boys just might get out of this one alive ... if they dont kill each other first!

programme.title: Waynes World
programme.desc: From Waynes basement, Wayne and Garth broadcast a talk-show called "Waynes World" on local public access television. The show comes to the attention of a sleazy network executive who wants to produce a big-budget version of "Waynes World"-and he also wants Waynes girlfriend, a rock singer named Cassandra. Wayne and Garth have to battle the executive not only to save their show, but also Cassandra.

programme.title: Ferris Buellers Day Off
programme.desc: Larger than life, and blessed with a magical sense of serendipity, Ferris Bueller is a model for all those who take themselves too seriously. One spring day, toward the end of his senior year, Ferris (Matthew Broderick) gives in to an overwhelming urge to cut school and head for downtown Chicago with his girl (Mia Sara) and his best friend (Alan Ruck), to see the sights, experience a day of freedom and show that with a little ingenuity, a bit of courage and a red Ferrari, life at 17 can be a joy. Featuring Charlie Sheen and Jennifer Grey, its of the most iconic films of the 80s, and one of writer/director John Hughes best.

programme.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
programme.desc: Incompetent detective Frank Drebin has to foil an attempt to assassinate the Queen as he woos Priscilla Presley.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A tough Detroit cop is treading on toes in posh Beverly Hills whilst trying to track down a killer who murdered his good friend. Foleys not-quite-by-the-book way of doing things doesnt go down well with the local authorities or the bad guys. Detectives Rosewood and Taggart are ordered to follow Foley and ensure he doesnt get in any trouble, but its Foley who shows them a thing or two about sneaky detective work.

programme.title: Tango and Cash
programme.desc: Two narcotics detectives cant stand each other. When a crime lord frames them for murder, they have to buddy up to clear their names and put him away.

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: An undercover cop is posing as a kindergarten teacher in order to catch a dangerous criminal. Once he wrangles his young charges, as well as the affections of a beautiful teacher, he prepares for a final showdown with his intended prey in this totally enjoyable action-comedy.

programme.title: Footloose (1984)
programme.desc: Teenager Ren moves from Chicago with his family to a small town in the west, and hes in for a real case of culture shock. Led by the Reverend Shaw Moore, the people of Bomont want to out Ren as a troublemaker. The reverends daughter Ariel doesnt quite see Ren in that light and they begin a clandestine relationship. Ren decides that this town needs a shake up: it needs to dance.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: A trio of university parapsychologists lose their research grant and decide to open their own business, Ghostbusters, and almost at once are summoned to investigate the strange happenings in a Central Park West apartment. What they discover is that all Manhattan is being besieged by otherworldly demons.

programme.title: Nat King Cole: Afraid of the Dark
programme.desc: At a time when black Americans were still suffering segregation and prejudice, Nat King Cole broke through the race barrier, becoming the only black television star in the US, with a weekly prime time show acknowledging his unique natural talent. Through extensive archives and his private journals, together with exclusive interviews with his widow, Maria Cole, and other family members, the true story is told of the man whose charm and genius for performance made him a role model and a pinnacle of American cultural society. Fellow artists George Benson, Harry Belafonte, Johnny Mathis and Tony Bennett, among many others, provide the anecdotes of this pioneering artist who crossed the colour barrier, appealing to white and black audiences in equal measure.

programme.title: Love and Rage: Munroe Bergdorf
programme.desc: The inspirational true story of Munroe Bergdorf - author, model, and leading transgender activist.

programme.title: Winter Spring Summer Or Fall
programme.desc: Remi and Barnes, two very different teenagers, meet by chance in the winter of their senior year, then spend four days together over the course of a year that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Reagan
programme.desc: From the glitter of Hollywood to the world stage, Ronald Reagan overcomes the odds to become the 40th president of the United States.

programme.title: Two Tickets to Greece
programme.desc: France. When childhood friends Magalie and Blandine cross paths after many years, they decide to finally take their dream vacation to Greece.

programme.title: If
programme.desc: A young girl who goes through a difficult experience begins to see everyones imaginary friends who have been left behind as their real-life friends have grown up.

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick
programme.desc: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navys top aviators, Pete "Maverick" Mitchell is where he belongs, pushing the envelope as a courageous test pilot and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him. When he finds himself training a detachment of Top Gun graduates for a specialised mission the likes of which no living pilot has ever seen, Maverick encounters Lt. Bradley Bradshaw, call sign: "Rooster", the son of Mavericks late friend and Radar Intercept Officer Lt. Nick Bradshaw, aka "Goose". Facing an uncertain future and confronting the ghosts of his past, Maverick is drawn into a confrontation with his own deepest fears, culminating in a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those who will be chosen to fly it.

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: After his home is conquered by the tyrannical emperors who now lead Rome, Lucius is forced to enter the Colosseum and must look to his past to find strength to return the glory of Rome to its people.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Marvin, a Milwaukee real estate agent, gets a crimson envelope from a former partner-in-crime. Thrust into a world of hitmen and betrayal, he must face his dark past and a vengeful crime lord brother.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: After a chance encounter, headstrong Kathy is drawn to Benny, member of Midwestern motorcycle club the Vandals. As the club transforms into a dangerous underworld of violence, Benny must choose between Kathy and his loyalty to the club.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A young land clerk is summoned to a vampires castle, while his wife falls under the spell of a dark force in her dreams, leading to a perilous journey into the unknown.

programme.title: Anora
programme.desc: Anora, a Brooklyn sex worker, marries an oligarchs son. But when the news reaches Russia, his parents rush to New York to have the marriage annulled, threatening her fairytale.

programme.title: High Ground
programme.desc: When a mysterious prisoner lands in his jail, a border town sheriff faces the wrath of a brutal cartel.

programme.title: Greatest Days
programme.desc: We follow five best friends who have the night of their lives seeing their favourite boy band in concert. Twenty-five years later their lives have changed in many different ways as they reunite for one more epic show by their beloved band, to relight their friendship and discover that maybe their greatest days are ahead of them.

programme.title: Sidelined: The QB and Me
programme.desc: A headstrong dancer and a cocky quarterback fight against their feelings for each other as their post-grad future threatens to keep them apart.

programme.title: The Making of Gladiator II
programme.desc: A special look at the making of Gladiator II, featuring unprecedented access encompassing all aspects of production, from the grand scope of the set to characters, combat, costumes, scoring and more.

programme.title: The Last Journey
programme.desc: Sweden. Renowned Swedish TV duo Filip and Fredrik embark on a trip to France, aiming to rekindle the zest for life of Filips father.

programme.title: Thelma
programme.desc: When 93-year-old Thelma Post gets duped by a phone scammer pretending to be her grandson, she sets out on a treacherous quest across the city to reclaim what was taken from her.

programme.title: Christmas Eve in Millers Point
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, a family gathers for what may be their last holiday in their ancestral home. As tensions rise, a teen sneaks out with friends to take over the wintry suburb for herself.

programme.title: Summer Camp
programme.desc: Follows Nora, Ginny, and Mary, three childhood best friends who used to spend every summer at a sleep away camp together. After years, when the opportunity to get back together for a summer camp reunion presents itself, they all seize it.

programme.title: Mack and Rita
programme.desc: Mack is tired of doing all the things she has to do to keep up with her friends and become successful in her 30s. Her deepest wish is to be an older woman so she can just chill out and wear a good chunky sweater. But when shes struck by lightning in a sound bath regression pod at Coachella and becomes Rita, a 65-year-old woman, Mack learns that the reality of being an older age isnt quite what she imagined.

programme.title: Shoshana
programme.desc: Two British police officers Thomas Wilkin and Geoffrey Morton in their hunt for charismatic poet and Zionist freedom fighter Avraham Stern, who was plotting to evict British authorities.

programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: A classmate introduces teenage Owen to a mysterious late-night TV show - a vision of a supernatural world beneath their own. Owens view of reality begins to crack.

programme.title: Sumotherhood
programme.desc: Two wannabe gangsters hold up a local bank, but when things dont go according to plan, a misunderstanding leads them into business with one of East Londons most notorious gangs.

programme.title: Heart Eyes
programme.desc: A masked maniac with glowing red eyes returns each Valentines Day to kill couples. An ad exec and her romantic colleague become targets and vow to stop the terror.

programme.title: Spit
programme.desc: An ex-con returns to Australia after 20 years, and gets detained. He faces old enemies, makes new friends in detention, and teaches his version of Australian mateship while staying one step ahead.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Kravens complex relationship with his ruthless father starts him down a path of vengeance, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

programme.title: Greedy People
programme.desc: Residents of a small island town navigate a murder and the discovery of a million dollars, a series of increasingly bad decisions upend the once peaceful community.

programme.title: Sidelined 2: Intercepted
programme.desc: As college tests their relationship, freshman quarterback Drayton and promising dancer Dallas navigate love and distance while searching for who theyre meant to be. As the pressures of ambition, recovery, and growing independence mount, the couple struggles to hold on.

programme.title: Funny Birds
programme.desc: Thrown together under tragic circumstances, three generations of women from the same family are forced to learn to live together on a small rural chicken farm in New Jersey.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: After jumping back into the dating pool, single mother Bridget Jones finds herself caught between a younger man and her sons science teacher.

programme.title: The Phoenician Scheme
programme.desc: Wealthy tycoon Zsa-zsa Korda names his nun daughter sole heir. As he starts a new venture, they face threats from scheming rivals, terrorists, and assassins.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails face Shadow, a powerful new foe. Outmatched, they form an unexpected alliance to stop him and protect the planet.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.desc: Ask any detective, they will tell you that if they dont have a lead, a suspect or an arrest within 48 hours, their chances of solving the case are cut in half. When an innocent father is brutally stabbed, Tulsa Detective Justin Ritter delves into the dark and dangerous world of methamphetamine addiction in order to stop a killer on the edge.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter
programme.desc: Two young mothers are found gunned down in their car, parked behind a crowded dive bar, and its up to Lt. Joe Kenda to determine which one was the intended target and which one was collateral damage. But the case takes a bizarre turn when he learns of another young woman who was murdered just four days earlier, under eerily similar circumstances. In search for a connecting thread between all three victims, Kenda interviews an informant who warns of a rumoured hit list, written by the criminal underworlds most deadly players, which may be behind all three homicides.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter
programme.desc: Officers are out patrolling Southeast Colorado Springs on a cool summer night when they hear a single gunshot ring out. Seconds later, theyre standing over the dead body of a young man they know well, a regular police informant named Jimmie Stevenson. But finding Jimmies killer will be no small task - Jimmies loose lips made him a potential target for a laundry list of killers. Lt. Joe Kenda must sort out the hardcore from the wannabes, and convince a reluctant eyewitness to do the right thing. Only then can he tell if Jimmie was killed while fighting crime, or committing it.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter
programme.desc: When a pregnant mother and her two young sons are brutally slain on a quiet weekday afternoon, the city of Colorado Springs is left reeling, and public pressure mounts for the CSPD to catch the cold-blooded monster who did it. After navigating a number of false leads and implementing an exhaustive city-wide manhunt, Kenda learns that the key to finding his killer lies just down the hall from the crime scene itself. With a prime suspect in his sights, Kenda begins to tighten the noose. But what happens next will shock the seasoned detective to his core.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.desc: In Louisville, after a minor injury, a woman makes a routine call to 911. The call becomes anything but routine when gunshots ring out in the background. When the smoke clears, the caller finds her boyfriend shot and killed. With information from the girlfriend, lead detective Leigh Maroni must now track down the man last seen with the victim and determine whether he is a witness or the potential killer. In Miami, Det Rolando Garcia investigates the shooting death of a local homeless man, known for looking after his fellow transient friends. As the case begins to unravel and witnesses give up information, Garcia learns that the victims commendable behaviour may have instigated his death.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter
programme.desc: Lt Joe Kenda and his Colorado Springs crime-fighting team have solved an unprecedented 387 homicide investigations, resulting in a 92 percent solve rate. Each episode of the program will use Kendas first-person narrative along with dramatic re-creations to retell the stories of Kendas most disturbing and challenging murder cases. The program takes viewers behind the scenes with one of the worlds best homicide detectives to learn how murders are solved. In this episode, a confrontation between enemies turns deadly, and Kendas best hope for answers lies with a grainy, dubbed-over surveillance tape. Later, an elderly man is fighting for his life after a slip-and-fall that may have been something more sinister.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter
programme.desc: First responders fighting a house fire discover the bullet-riddled corpse of housewife Elsie Jennes in the basement. Lt Joe Kenda has no leads until Elsies son, William, turns up in a police station over 50 miles away, equipped with a suitcase, a pet golden retriever, and a bizarre story to tell. The child claims that his father is a secret agent on the run from murderous assassins. Kenda begins to unravel the web of conspiracy and mystery only to discover a reality even more shocking than fiction.

programme.title: Cops Reloaded
programme.desc: Officers intervene when a husband attacks his wife. A man is suspected of hiding drugs in his mouth. A security guard is threatened with a knife. Two men are caught smoking marijuana in a parked car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A DUI suspect reminds an officer of one famous dude. A naked man shocks a stranger on her porch. A daughters tantrum shakes the whole apartment when mum takes away Facebook.

programme.title: Australian Crime Stories
programme.desc: An examination into the three main suspects in the disappearance of Juanita Nielsen, one of Australias most infamous murder mysteries, to figure out who killed Juanita.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.desc: Follow along as detectives in cities across America work tirelessly to generate leads within the first 48 hours of a crime.

programme.title: Bloodline Detectives
programme.desc: In 1987 Arizona, student Cathy Sposito is murdered on a trail. Decades later, genetic genealogy points to Brian Bennett, though he died in 1994.

programme.desc: Examining some of the most dangerous and prolific murderers in the UK and worldwide.

programme.desc: ACS uncovers a bizarre case: two wives die suspiciously, and their husband, Thomas Keir, claims bad luck. Detective Peter Seymour investigates, leading to shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Australian Crime Stories: Investigators
programme.desc: In 1996, 19-year-old Kim Meredith is murdered in Albury. Detectives Hayes and Kennedy identified Graham Mailes, and after years of legal battles, he is brought to justice, seven years after the crime.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.desc: Miami detective Fabio Sanchez and the homicide team investigate the murder of a man stabbed in the street. After piecing together the victims last moments, they realise they may have a vigilante on their hands. In Dekalb County, Georgia, shots are fired in broad daylight on a residential street, leaving one teenage boy dead and another critically injured. Lead detective Bruce Brueggeman is shocked to discover that the shooters mother may have been with him when he pulled the trigger. But forcing the family to give up the suspect is not going to be easy.

programme.title: Australian Crime Stories: Investigators
programme.desc: The true story of Keith Banks, a decorated Queensland officer, who went undercover in the 1980s drug scene, blurring lines between cop and criminal, amid corruption and personal tolls.

programme.title: Australian Crime Stories: Investigators
programme.desc: Traces the decades-long hunt for an elusive bank robber, culminating in his capture through a 50-year-old fingerprint and fraud conviction.

programme.title: Australian Crime Stories: Investigators
programme.desc: In 1991, a womans body is found in Sydney with no identification. Detective Mick Plotecki uses key evidence to uncover her identity and bring her killer to justice.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.desc: In Louisville, a community is outraged when a married couple is gunned down at home in front of their two young children. Det Kevin Trees and the homicide team hit the streets hoping the communitys strong reaction to the killing will trump the neighbourhoods long-standing code of silence. Armed with expert interrogation techniques and a polygraph, Trees navigates his way through false leads and deceptive witnesses. As he works his way toward a suspect, the investigation takes a shocking turn.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter
programme.desc: Lieutenant Joe Kenda and his Colorado Springs crime-fighting team have solved an unprecedented 387 homicide investigations, resulting in a 92 percent solve rate. Each episode will use Kendas first-person narrative along with dramatic re-creations to retell the stories of Kendas most disturbing and challenging murder cases. This program takes viewers behind the scenes with one of the worlds best homicide detectives to learn how murders are solved. In this episode, a cabin on the slopes of Pikes Peak catches fire, and a young sheriffs deputy is posted to guard the scene overnight. When hes found dead in his patrol car the next morning, his fellow lawmen must set aside their grief and hunt down his killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter
programme.desc: Maggie Fetty, a 16-year-old runaway, is found strangled to death and dumped on the side of a desolate mountain road. An anonymous tipster implicates Fettys best friend - who in turn points her finger at a mental patient with multiple personalities. The suspects begin to rack up, each with a differing version of events, and Lieutenant Joe Kenda finds himself at the centre of a web of lies. Kenda must turn the suspects against each other to piece together the cruel truth.

programme.title: Cops Reloaded
programme.desc: Officers break up a fight outside of a nightclub. A dispute between brothers is investigated. A car accident is investigated that may be the result of drunk driving. Deputies find marijuana in a car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A speedy suspect makes officers chase him through a creek. A teenage Good Samaritan gets in the middle of a bizarre domestic dispute. After a woman destroys her home, she begs police to arrest her.

An anonymous tipster implicates Fettys best friend - who in turn points her finger at a mental patient with multiple personalities. The suspects begin to rack up, each with a differing version of events, and Lieutenant Joe Kenda finds himself at the centre of a web of lies. Kenda must turn the suspects against each other to piece together the cruel truth.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Australia
programme.desc: A concerned shop worker in the town of Albury, along with diligent detective work and a huge stroke of luck led to the capture of a sexual predator whose crimes remained hidden for two decades.

programme.title: Holly Jolly Homicides
programme.desc: Merry meets mystery in this holiday themed true-crime series recounting true-life homicide investigations that occur during the holiday season.

programme.title: The First 48
programme.desc: When dismembered body parts are found floating in Miamis Biscayne Bay, Det Orlando Silva and the Miami homicide team work around the clock to solve one of the most brutal murders South Florida has ever seen.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter
programme.desc: Lieutenant Joe Kenda and his Colorado Springs crime-fighting team have solved an unprecedented 387 homicide investigations, resulting in a 92 percent solve rate. Each episode will use Kendas first-person narrative along with dramatic re-creations to retell the stories of Kendas most disturbing and challenging murder cases. This program takes viewers behind the scenes with one of the worlds best homicide detectives to learn how murders are solved. In this episode, a 15-year old girl is reported missing, and Kenda must investigate the mysterious circumstances surrounding her disappearance. Later, a family man is shot dead on his neighbours doorstep.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter
programme.desc: Off-duty soldier and father of two Layne Schmidtke is brutally beaten to death by a mob of angry teenagers on his way home from a bar. Joe Kenda must meticulously reconstruct the chaotic scene through a conflicting assortment of witness testimonies, but his hopes rest on forensic evidence taken at the scene. As the mystery unfolds, a group of high-school girls bravely step forward to reveal a shocking motive and an unlikely suspect as the murderous ringleader.

programme.title: Cops Reloaded
programme.desc: Officers give chase after a vehicle is stolen. A woman is investigated for terroristic threats. Three juveniles throw rocks from an overpass. A deaf man is accused of assaulting children.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A mans new roommate becomes more than he bargained for. Officers stop a sober but weird suspect. The consequences of punching a scooter are discovered.

programme.desc: The prime suspect had a criminal record, and his drivers license was found at the scene of a brutal, double homicide. That physical evidence seemed damning, but it wasnt the only evidence. DNA extracted from a discarded spoon would point investigators in a different direction.

programme.title: Diana: The Ultimate Truth
programme.desc: More than two decades on, the circumstances around Princess Dianas death continue to create international headlines. A global icon, arguably the most famous woman in the world, killed aged just 36, in a car crash in a Paris underpass. Despite a verdict of unlawful killing and two police investigations into the devastating crash, many questions around what happened, and who is responsible, remain.

programme.title: Fashion at War: Crafting the Nazi Brand
programme.desc: An in-depth exploration of the role fashion plays in branding and iconography, by examining the evolution of the Hugo Boss brand from its origins as a uniform manufacturer for the Nazi Party.

programme.title: Great American Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo rides the railroads of America, armed with Appletons General Guide to the United States. He strikes west across Manitoba into the province of Saskatchewan.

programme.title: D-Day Lost Films
programme.desc: This special event features the most critical military operation of World War II. This program presents this iconic battle using newly discovered colour footage, much of which has never been seen. For the first time, viewers can see the largest amphibious assault in history - 5000 Allied ships landing over 160,000 soldiers across a 80km stretch of Normandy beaches. This film is presented through the personal accounts of soldiers on both sides, focusing on three specific units: the American 1st Division at Omaha Beach, the American 507th Paratroopers, and the German 352nd Division. This program will tell the story in the first person, in the words of those who lived it, with actor voices reading from soldier diaries, oral histories, and immediate post-combat interviews - from famous leaders like Eisenhower, Rommel, Omar Bradley, and Adolph Hitler, to the unknown boots-on-the-ground soldiers, both American and German, who fought and died in one of historys bloodiest battles.

programme.title: Windsor Castle Fire: The Untold Story
programme.desc: This dramatic documentary reveals the amazing personal stories behind the disastrous Windsor Castle fire that ignited 30 years ago.

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: Newmarket is the birthplace of horse racing, and Tony Robinson and the team are in town in search of the earliest archaeological traces of the sport of kings.

programme.title: Most Scenic Counties: Norfolk and Suffolk
programme.desc: High above Great Yarmouths golden mile, Doug and Mark inspect a 91-year-old wooden roller coaster.

programme.title: Castles From Above
programme.desc: Come on a fascinating aerial journey across Europe and discover some of the most spectacular and renowned castles these countries have to offer.

programme.title: Coast Australia
programme.desc: This is the story of how Melbourne evolved from an infant town to a mature city of the world. From a ballooning population due to the gold rush, through to a modern busy port, Port Phillip Bay is now a truly world leading port, with many exciting and amazing adolescent tales as this city grew up. Neil visits the sight of the birth of the RAAF, where some magnificent men operated some truly amazing flying machines. Port Phillip Bay has a big-little problem, sea urchins are devouring the marine life in the bay, Emma discovers how science and fine dining are coming together to find a solution; and Tim reveals how a Scotsman in Geelong brought ice to the world.

programme.title: Aussie Inventions That Changed the World
programme.desc: Australian inventors have boldly re-imagined communication across the spectrum of technologies: Graeme Clarks extraordinary Bionic Ear delivered deaf patients the sound of speech; John OSullivan and his CSIRO team created the worlds first high-speed WiFi that dramatically changed the communication landscape worldwide; Henry Suttons visionary Telephane was designed in Ballarat decades before the Television and post-master James Raymond established the worlds first Pre-Paid Postage system in Sydney in 1838 with his delightfully simple pre-paid envelope.

programme.title: The Buildings That Fought Hitler
programme.desc: Reigate Fort was re-purposed in preparation for a Nazi invasion of Britain; it was designed to block the Nazis from getting into London and was set to become the resistance headquarters.

programme.title: The UnXplained
programme.desc: Abandoned cities. Ancient cultures nearly erased by time. And colossal empires that simply vanished without a trace. How does a civilization become lost? What could cause once-thriving groups of people to just abandon their great cities, never to return? Can modern scientific knowledge help answer the unsolved questions surrounding these lost civilizations, or is there something more mysterious at work?

programme.title: Blood and Glory: The Civil War In Color
programme.desc: The Civil War, one of the most defining moments in American history, tore a nation apart, pitting North against South - brother against brother. Over the course of four years, more than 750,000 military and civilian lives were sacrificed to make the United States a more perfect union, where the human rights of every person are guaranteed. With unprecedented access to government and private archives and using state-of-the-art technology, over 500 rare and compelling black and white photographs have been painstakingly colourised to illustrate the story of the Civil War in breathtaking detail. This episode examines the cultural and political tensions that ultimately explode into the most storied and bloodied war ever to be fought on US soil.

programme.title: Living with Hitler
programme.desc: After the First World War Germany experiences dizzying changes. The Weimar republic is born and Berlin becomes a hub of culture in Europe. But the Great Depression provides fertile soil for fascism to take hold, and between 1933 and 1935 Hitlers grip on power becomes absolute. The Nazi flag flies everywhere, the Nazi salute is compulsory, the Nazification of German society is complete.

programme.title: The UnXplained
programme.desc: A house that narrowly dodges the path of a tornado. Rain that falls from the sky like blood. And lightning that follows you into your home. Our world is full of strange and mysterious weather phenomenon that we still have no explanation for. Is it a result of just simple scientific anomalies, or could there be a stranger, more spiritual force at work?

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: Alex bravely fights her way out of the welding gear, off the stripper pole, and onto the dance school floor.

programme.title: The Christmas Edition
programme.desc: Up-and-coming journalist Jackie seizes the opportunity to run a small-town newspaper in Alaska and uses a series of Christmas articles to help the struggling business.

programme.title: Bridget Joness Diary
programme.desc: Bridget Jones is a busy journalist and singleton lost amid a sea of smug-marrieds in London. After vowing to abandon her many vices, Bridget turns over a new page by channelling her opinions and insecurities in a journal that becomes a hilarious chronicle of her misadventures. Soon, Bridget finds herself stuck in the sights of not one, but two men: her dashing boss Daniel, who thrives on bad behaviour; and the brooding Mark, who she despises but somehow cant get away from.

programme.title: Suddenly 30
programme.desc: A hilarious flash-forward romance about a pre-teen girl who goes from geek to glamorous. With the help of some magic wishing dust, 13-year-old Jenna Rink becomes 30 and gorgeous overnight, with everything she ever wanted, except for her best friend Matt. Now, this grown woman must create some magic of her own to help the little girl inside find the true love she left behind.

programme.title: My Best Friends Wedding
programme.desc: Julianne is almost 28 and still single, but thats OK because on her 28th birthday, Michael is going to propose, thanks to a safety net pact they made in their youth. But when the phone call finally comes, her best friend has found someone else. With Michael unavailable, Julianne realises that she loves him and must stop his wedding!

programme.title: The Notebook
programme.desc: As teenagers, Allie and Noah begin to fall in love, but they are separated by her upper-class parents who insist that Noah isnt right for her. When they meet years later, their passion is rekindled. Their story is narrated from the present day by an elderly man, telling the tale to a fellow nursing home resident, who is Cassavetes mother.

programme.title: Julie and Julia
programme.desc: A culinary legend Julia Child provides a frustrated office worker with a new recipe for life - the true stories of how Childs life and cookbook inspired fledgling writer Julie Powell to whip up 524 recipes in 365 days and introduce a new generation to the magic of French cooking. A delicious comedy about joy, obsession and butter. Bon appetit!

programme.title: Christmas Lost and Found
programme.desc: After years of missing family gatherings, event planner Whitney is off to spend Christmas with Grandma Frances. But in an unfortunate turn of events, Whitney throws out a box of precious family ornaments.

programme.title: Duplicity
programme.desc: When two sexy spies-turned-corporate operatives in the midst of a clandestine love affair find themselves on either side of an all-out corporate war, theyll put everything on the line to remain one double-cross ahead in a high-stakes game of cat-and-mouse.

programme.title: The Five-Year Engagement
programme.desc: An engaged couple keep getting tripped up on their long walk down the aisle.

programme.title: Mickey Blue Eyes
programme.desc: He walks the wawk. He talks the tawk. Noo Yawk is about to encounter a most unlikely mobster. At the centre of this lively fish-out-of-water comedy romp is a dapper Manhattan art auctioneer named Michael Felgate. Eager to marry Gina, the lovely teacher hes been dating for three months, Michael feels its time he meet her family. What he meets is the family. Ginas father Frank is a gangster a "juicer" who extracts money for the mob. Now the squeeze is on Michael to use the auction house as a money-laundering scam for dubious artwork plunging fumbling, bumbling Michael into a world where he must pose as a notorious wise guy called Mickey Blue Eyes. Youll call him hilarious.

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: Will Lightman is a good-looking, smooth-talking bachelor whose primary goal in life is avoiding any kind of responsibility. But when he invents an imaginary son in order to meet attractive single mums, Will gets a hilarious lesson about life from a bright, but hopelessly geeky 12-year-old named Marcus. Now, as Will struggles to teach Marcus the art of being cool, Marcus teaches Will that youre never too old to grow up.

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: Anna Scott is the worlds most famous movie star. Her picture has been plastered on the cover of every magazine, and every time she makes a movie, the entire world knows about it. William Thacker owns a travel bookstore in the quaint neighbourhood of Notting Hill. His business is stagnant, he has the roommate from hell and his love life is completely non-existent. Then one day, their paths cross and the couple comes to face the ultimate question: can two people fall in love with the whole world watching?

programme.title: Postcards from the Edge
programme.desc: An actress struggles to rebuild her life after a stint in a drug rehabilitation clinic. This means moving back into her mothers home, an ageing movie star who epitomises old Hollywood.

programme.title: At Home in Mitford
programme.desc: Cynthia leaves Boston to spend time in her late uncles small town in hopes of alleviating writers block. She meets a man, and as the pair work together to help a boy, they find solace and romance.

programme.title: The Christmas Aunt
programme.desc: Two weeks before Christmas, Rebecca Miller returns home to Tennessee to take care of her niece and nephew and ends up reconnecting with her childhood best friend.

programme.title: Easy A
programme.desc: After a little white lie about losing her virginity gets out, a clean-cut high school girl sees her life paralleling Hester Prynnes in The Scarlet Letter, which she is currently studying in school - until she decides to use the rumour mill to advance her social and financial standing.

programme.title: Kate and Leopold
programme.desc: Kate McKay is a modern female executive in New York City whose drive to succeed in the cutthroat corporate world has left little time for romance. When her genius ex-boyfriend discovers a portal to travel through time, and brings back a 19th-century nobleman named Leopold to prove it, a sceptical Kate reluctantly takes responsibility for showing Leopold the 21st century.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Loves causing chaos all over London. Even the PM is smitten. Ten separate stories intertwine in a Christmas Eve climax.

programme.title: Serendipity
programme.desc: In the course of one magical evening, Jonathan and Sara meet unexpectedly, but part when she decides that fate must determine their future. Years later, they are both engaged to others, but cannot give up the dream that - despite the time, distance and obstacles that conspire to keep them apart - they will one day meet again.

programme.title: The Sweetest Heart
programme.desc: With help from a handsome banker, Maddie does everything she can to save her business. When her first love unexpectedly returns home, she must choose between a new romance and the man she never stopped loving.

programme.title: Angry Angel
programme.desc: Allison Pyke is a young angel whos trying to get her ticket into heaven. Complications arise when two important men in her life unexpectedly show up to form a love triangle.

programme.title: Youre Bacon Me Crazy
programme.desc: Cleo Morelli, an aspiring Portland chef, tries to win a food truck competition. When a handsome chef from a rival food truck parks across the street from her, Cleos goal to win takes a spicy turn.

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are?
programme.desc: Pundit, presenter and former world-class footballer Alex Scott delves into both sides of her family history in Who Do You Think You Are? Having known nothing of her Jewish ancestry on her mums side, Alex is proud to discover that her great grandad was at the Battle of Cable Street in Londons East End in 1936, facing down Fascist followers of Oswald Mosley.

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: The latest national and international news stories from the BBC News team from London, UK, in English.

programme.title: France 24 International News
programme.desc: International news and current affairs television from Paris, offering a French perspective on world events, in English.

programme.title: PBS News Weekend
programme.desc: Analysis of national and international news, as well as in-depth reporting on topics ranging from education and politics to technology and finance. Hosted by John Yang for the Public Broadcasting Service (PBS) in the United States.

programme.title: Al Jazeera News Hour
programme.desc: In-depth global news from Al Jazeera Satellite Network, Doha, Qatar, in English.

programme.title: Amazon The Lost World
programme.desc: Deep in the Amazon rainforest, archaeologists are discovering new evidence that reveals five centuries of exploitation by gold miners, loggers, and even slave traders. Was this the cause of a massive population crash that almost wiped out an entire Amazon civilisation? And can todays indigenous Amazonians preserve thousands of years of unbroken heritage, under a renewed onslaught of deforestation, gold fever, and urbanisation?

programme.title: Such Was Life
programme.desc: Laurel Cooper was taken to the Mount Margaret Mission by her mother at a time when Aboriginal children were routinely taken away from their families.

programme.title: The Cook Up with Adam Liaw
programme.desc: Its Christmas week, so two of Australias greatest performers, Courtney Act and Mitch Tambo, join Adam to celebrate the festive period with the perfect snacks.

programme.title: Westminster Abbey: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: In an ever-changing modern world, the Abbey remains the one constant. With the recent changes in the monarchy and parliament, how does the Abbey remain an evolving but reliable presence for the masses?

programme.title: Jeopardy!
programme.desc: Ken Jennings hosts Jeopardy! Where the answers are revealed and the contestants must guess the appropriate questions.

programme.title: Letters and Numbers
programme.desc: Two contestants pit their linguistic and numerical skills against each other and the clock in this entertaining quiz show. Join host Richard Morecroft along with maths whiz Lily Serna and wordsmith David Astle.

programme.title: Mastermind Australia
programme.desc: Tonights specialty subjects are: The Films of Steven Spielberg, August: Osage County, Green Day and the Zodiac Academy Book 1 to 3. Contenders: Luis Sanchez, Bianca Reynolds, Lachlan Willacy, Luisa Di Pompo.

programme.title: SBS World News
programme.desc: The latest reports and analysis of major national and international news of the day from Australias only world news service.

programme.title: Secrets of the Tasmanian Tiger
programme.desc: This episode explores a unique dig site in Australia that could help solve the mystery of how the Tasmanian tiger became extinct.

programme.title: Never Mind the Buzzcocks
programme.sub-title: Daisy May Cooper, Chris Ramsey, Ella Henderson, Jordan North
programme.desc: Get ready for festive chaos with the hour-long Never Mind the Buzzcocks Christmas Special! Daisy May Cooper returns as a festive treat, joining host Greg Davies, Noel Fielding, and Jamali Maddix for some wonderful and very rude Christmas cheer. Guests include comedian Chris Ramsey, DJ Jordan North, and singer Ella Henderson.

programme.title: I Literally Just Told You
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr presents a brand-new gameshow with a unique twist. Four contestants compete for up to 25,000 pounds, answering questions written live as the show films - covering everything from celebrity cameos to Jimmys own jokes. Memory skills are crucial in the nerve-wracking final showdown.

programme.title: The 2010s
programme.desc: Press play on a new era of ground-breaking television, ushering in new types of storytelling from new creators driven by a new type of competition: the streaming service wars.

programme.title: The Man Who Died
programme.desc: Jaakko finally finds the mole. Now he is on the trail of a killer, but time is running out.

programme.title: Culprits
programme.desc: Specialist is living her new life in a remote wilderness but is surprised by an unexpected visitor. Joes paranoia and fear grow. His conflict with Kyle takes a violent turn and Jules is horrified by Joes confession. Joe breaks protocol, contacts one of the other Culprits, and embarks on a mission to neutralize the looming threat.

programme.title: Culprits
programme.desc: In London, Joe, Specialist, and Officer are reunited and they try to figure out who is killing the crew and why. They agree to team up, but Specialist vanishes. Another murder rocks Joe and, they travel to France hoping to find fellow Culprits before the killer does.

programme.title: Pagan Peak
programme.desc: When the serial killer strikes closer to home, Ellie reunites with her old colleague Gedeon and returns to duty, ready to solve a murder.

programme.title: Pagan Peak
programme.desc: Ellie and Gedeon use force to gain access to important documents when a young woman is kidnapped. The trail leads to the influential building contractor family Gossen.

programme.title: Growing a Greener World
programme.sub-title: From Seed To Fork: Growing An Abundant And Beautiful Cold-Climate Garden (Minneapolis, Mn)
programme.desc: We all like our gardens to be as productive as possible for the time and energy we invest. But when it comes to getting the most out of what a garden can provide, Meg Cowden never misses an opportunity to push the limits. Despite the short growing season and challenging conditions of her cold western Twin Cities climate, shes obsessed with gardening and discovering new ways to grow more and do it better.

programme.title: NHK World English News Morning
programme.desc: English news from Japans Broadcasting Corporation, NHK, delivering the latest in business, technology, health, environmental and world news.

programme.title: ANC Philippines The World Tonight
programme.desc: Delivers the top stories of the day, covering political, economic, and social sectors on both local and global fronts.

programme.title: DW English News
programme.desc: News and analysis of the top international and European news and current affairs from Berlin, in English.

programme.title: Al Jazeera News
programme.desc: News via satellite from Al Jazeera Satellite Network, Qatar, in English.

programme.title: BBC 6 OClock News
programme.desc: The latest national and international news stories from the BBC News team from London, UK, in English.

programme.title: France 24 English News

programme.title: Paul OGrady: For the Love of Dogs
programme.desc: Paul OGrady returns to Battersea Dogs and Cats Home in a special Christmas episode. Determined to bring some much-needed festive cheer to the canine residents, Paul will again bring his unique blend of heartfelt warmth and humour to the waifs and strays of Battersea as he tries to give the dogs the best Christmas present possible: a new home.

programme.title: Inside Oxford Street
programme.desc: Only when the shops are closed and Oxford street is quiet, can the team from Thames Water come out at night to look for underground water leaks.

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are?
programme.desc: Comedian Josh Widdicombe embarks on a rollercoaster ride through his extraordinary family history. After a less than promising start with an ancestor who was cut out of the family fortune. Josh is delighted to discover a courtier with very personal access to King Charles I.

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: The latest national and international news stories from the BBC News team from London, UK, in English.

programme.title: France 24 International News
programme.desc: International news and current affairs television from Paris, offering a French perspective on world events, in English.

programme.title: PBS NewsHour
programme.desc: Reviews and analysis of the days news presented by Amna Nawaz and Geoff Bennett for the Public Broadcasting Service (PBS) in the United States.

programme.title: Darcey Bussells Royal Road Trip
programme.desc: Dame Darcy Bussell embarks on a road trip around Britain in celebration of places that meant so much to Queen Elizabeth II. Darcy begins her journey in the Scottish Highlands. The one event the Queen never missed on her summer holidays at Balmoral is the Highland Games, where Darcey tosses the caber and discovers what its like to have the Queen as a neighbour.

programme.title: Such Was Life
programme.desc: Charlie Webb ran a tiny pub in a small mining town and is immortalised in the Henry Lawsons poem, The Bulletin Hotel. Pubs, breweries and publicans flourished in the arid Goldfields at a time when beer was cheaper to drink than water. They became the centre of social life in their communities.

programme.title: The Cook Up with Adam Liaw
programme.desc: Samantha Harris and Karl Firla join Adam in the kitchen to give you some great ideas for dishes to make for a festive take-a-plate.

programme.title: Westminster Abbey: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: Christmas is the Abbeys most intense time of year, and the season kicks off with Advent. Relative newbie, Minor Canon Bob oversees this dramatic service, which involves multiple candles held aloft that represent the light of Christ coming into the world. Music is a vital part of the DNA of the Abbey. Under the close eye of Choir Master James ODonnell, the choristers rehearse for Christmas carol concerts to come.

programme.title: Jeopardy!
programme.desc: Ken Jennings hosts Jeopardy! Where the answers are revealed and the contestants must guess the appropriate questions.

programme.title: Letters and Numbers
programme.desc: Two contestants pit their linguistic and numerical skills against each other and the clock in this entertaining quiz show. Join host Richard Morecroft along with maths whiz Lily Serna and wordsmith David Astle.

programme.title: Mastermind Australia
programme.desc: Tonights specialty subjects are: Frank Sidebottom, The Involvement of Cambodia in the Vietnam war, The History of Insulin and Bobs Burgers, Seasons 4 to 7.

programme.title: SBS World News
programme.desc: The latest reports and analysis of major national and international news of the day from Australias only world news service.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: At the former Midlothian mining village of Newtongrange, Michael meets the son of a miner whose name loomed large in the disputes of the 1970s and 1980s: vice-president of the National Union of Mineworkers, Red Mick McGahey.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.sub-title: Dundee to Loch of The Lowes
programme.desc: Michaels rail journey through post-war Scotland takes him over the River Tay to Dundee, Scotlands fourth largest city. He is on the trail of Joseph McKenzie, the father of modern Scottish photography.

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are?
programme.desc: Popstar Olly Murs is a quarter Latvian on his dads side but knows nothing about his Latvian heritage. He travels to the capital Riga and discovers that his late granddad Eddie was born after an affair between his great grandparents who were both circus performers. During the Second World War Ollys great grandmother made the heart-breaking decision to send her son out of Latvia with his father and stepmother.

programme.title: Australia in Colour
programme.desc: Those in authority in Australia at the time of Federation envisage a prosperous and civilised nation of hardworking citizens. But modern Australia grew out of a drunken penal colony, and people remain under the thrall of alcohol and drugs and are fascinated by murder and mischief. But the public do rise up against capital punishment and it is abolished nation wide.

programme.title: The 2010s
programme.desc: Music in the 2010s underwent profound change, both technologically and sonically. The rise of streaming services like Spotify radically transformed the landscape, at once reviving a record industry that had been decimated by pirating services like Napster, while also introducing new economic incentives to artists that would change the way music itself was made.

programme.title: Families Like Ours
programme.sub-title: A Time To Get And A Time To Lose
programme.desc: Things are looking bleak. Elias is beaten within an inch of his life by uniformed men and abandoned on a Polish beach. Laura, waiting for Elias in vain, boards the last train to Bucharest. She is finally reunited with her surprised mother. For a moment, they feel like the luckiest people alive. Jacob and Amalie travel to the south of France on their last penny, hoping for the help of a hotel manager Amalie visited as a child.

programme.title: De Gaulle
programme.desc: As France plunges into turmoil, De Gaulle fails to grasp the true stakes at hand. Those surrounding Pompidou demand De Gaulles departure. With events refusing to subside, dissidents launch a general strike and ignite a student rebellion.

programme.title: De Gaulle
programme.desc: At the end of 1968, with Pompidou no longer serving as Prime Minister, Charles de Gaulle chooses to embark on a remarkable political endeavour: a referendum on Senate reform and regionalisation.

programme.title: Nordland 99
programme.desc: Lukas, Emma, and Kris are going back to the cabin, where they make an awful discovery. At the same time, Christian reviews the surveillance material from the gas station.

programme.title: Nordland 99
programme.desc: The whole town is in mourning, and the search for Alex takes a new turn. Christian is no longer on the case but makes a promise to an old friend.

programme.title: Nordland 99
programme.desc: Kris gives up being part of the search team for Alex, while Lukas and Emma end up in danger. Meanwhile, Christian gets an unexpected visit.

programme.title: Nordland 99
programme.desc: Neither Emma nor Christian can get hold of Lukas, and they must form an unexpected alliance to find him. At the same time, Lukas tries to find a way out of the darkness that surrounds him.

programme.title: Bamay
programme.desc: Bamay is back! See more stunning and diverse Australian locations from the Australian skies.

programme.title: NHK World English News Morning
programme.desc: English news from Japans Broadcasting Corporation, NHK, delivering the latest in business, technology, health, environmental and world news.

programme.title: ANC Philippines The World Tonight
programme.desc: Delivers the top stories of the day, covering political, economic, and social sectors on both local and global fronts.

programme.title: France 24 English News
programme.desc: International news and current affairs television from Paris, offering a French perspective on world events, in English.

programme.title: Paul OGrady: For the Love of Dogs
programme.desc: Top of Pauls Christmas list to help is Bauble, a heavily pregnant stray found wet and bedraggled on Hampstead Heath. This mysterious tiny Terrier arrived at Battersea scared and confused, and in desperate need of some love and attention, which Paul is only too happy to offer! But with the vets having no idea what breed of dog the father is, Baubles labour could be anything but straightforward.

programme.title: Inside Oxford Street
programme.desc: In this episode, we shadow a team of twenty night workers who close Oxford street to install the Christmas lights. Theyre challenged with fitting panels 30 feet in the air which get heavier each year, whilst navigating metres of wires tangled overhead.

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are?
programme.desc: Singer-songwriter and talent-show judge Pixie Lott hopes to confirm the family story that she has Italian ancestry from Verona but instead discovers ancestors battling poverty and hardship in London. On her dads side, Pixie learns of her great grandfathers harrowing and surprising experience in WWI.

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: The latest national and international news stories from the BBC News team from London, UK, in English.

programme.title: France 24 International News
programme.desc: International news and current affairs television from Paris, offering a French perspective on world events, in English.

programme.title: PBS NewsHour
programme.desc: Reviews and analysis of the days news presented by Amna Nawaz and Geoff Bennett for the Public Broadcasting Service (PBS) in the United States.

programme.title: Darcey Bussells Royal Road Trip
programme.desc: Darcey Bussells road trip continues in the heart of the Queens realm, London and the South-East. In Richmond Park, Darcey visits the hunting lodge where the Queen spent the first year of her life. Its also a trip down memory lane for Darcey because White Lodge was her childhood home too.

programme.title: Such Was Life
programme.desc: Teenage, Clara Saunders was the First woman to be married in Coolgardie. The event was so unique that hundreds of miners came to witness the occasion and the party lasted for two days. Her story, and a remarkable collection of brides and bridal parties from the 1890s through to WW2 held by the Eastern Goldfields Historical Society, provided the starting point for this look at the fashions and customs of the times.

programme.title: The Cook Up with Adam Liaw
programme.desc: Adam, food icon Maggie Beer and Baker Natalie Paull are in the kitchen making savoury dishes that can be the centre of your Christmas buffet.

programme.title: London Zoo at Christmas
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes at the iconic London Zoo, and witness a glimpse into what goes on as they prepare to celebrate the most wonderful time of the year. An exclusive look into the daily routine of the worlds oldest scientific zoo and discover how the keepers and staff make the holiday magic happen.

programme.title: Jeopardy!
programme.desc: Ken Jennings hosts Jeopardy! Where the answers are revealed and the contestants must guess the appropriate questions.

programme.title: Letters and Numbers
programme.desc: Two contestants pit their linguistic and numerical skills against each other and the clock in this entertaining quiz show. Join host Richard Morecroft along with maths whiz Lily Serna and wordsmith David Astle.

programme.title: Mastermind Australia
programme.desc: Tonights specialty subjects are: Persian Society During the Reign or Darius I, Pantera, The Life and Music of Miles Davis and Town Crying.

programme.title: SBS World News
programme.desc: The latest reports and analysis of major national and international news of the day from Australias only world news service.

programme.title: Big Fat Quiz of Everything
programme.desc: Who were Henry VIIIs Grooms of the Stool? What did the very first meme say? What do Cilla Black, Pete Tong and Nelson Mandela have in common? All these questions and more will be answered in The Big Fat Quiz of Everything. Question master Jimmy Carr is joined by Harry Hill, David Mitchell, Roisin Conaty, Sophie Willan, Josh Pugh and Fatiha El-Ghorri as they battle it out to see who knows the most about everything!

programme.title: Rock Legends
programme.desc: The stratospheric career of Elton John. The Rocket Man that made the piano player a rock star, this documentary follows a journey from budding songwriter, to his 70s peak as the one of the most prolific artists of his generation, his flamboyant costumes and classic songs and closing with being one of the very few musicians who can still top the charts 45 years into their career.

programme.title: Crime
programme.desc: Lennox is struggling emotionally following his confrontation with Confectioner but is forced to get his head back into his current case when the attacker floods the internet with their manifesto and declares there will be a third victim. The race is on for Lennox and his team to prevent another death. A new lead suggests the victims knew each other and puts disgraced politician and Lennoxs nemesis, Ritchie Gulliver, in the firing line as victim number three.

programme.title: The 2010s
programme.desc: It begins with President Barack Obama announcing to the world that Osama Bin Laden has been killed in a Special Operations raid in Pakistan. We examine why Obama is often called the "Consoler In Chief," revisiting moments when he responded to tragedy.

programme.title: Mirusia - Live In Concert
programme.desc: On a balmy summers evening in Mirusias hometown of Brisbane, a special musical event took place at the Redland Performing Arts Centre. Mirusia returned to the stage for her first concert of 2021 performing to a hometown crowd of music lovers. An intimate concert of songs joined by fine musicians and singers alike delivering what can only be described as a vocal tour de force by Australias songbird, Mirusia.

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: When Gemma discovers she is pregnant, she only has her hapless father for support. Malcolm, a sweet man in crisis must learn to rebuild his life and his relationship with Gemma.

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Gemma tries to reconnect with the girls from school after a chance encounter with Cherry. Malcolm is encouraged to find a normal friend after Derek introduces him to close up magic.

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: After receiving dodgy life-advice from those around her, Gemma enlists Cherry to help find a potential father for her unborn child. Meanwhile Malcolm finds love with a woman online.

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Gemma tries birthing classes, but resorts to asking her Aunt Jess for advice. Malcolm and Gemma get invited to Jess and Tyrones hot tub party but Malcolm is scared of hot tubs.

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Gemma bumps into an old flame and agrees to a date. Derek hatches a plan for Malcolm to retrieve his belongings from his old family house, so Malcolm invites Gemmas new man along.

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Malcolm throws Gemma a baby shower and Derek surprises Malcolm with birthday present. Xander discovers Gemma in labour, whilst Malcolm and Derek are locked in an escape room.

programme.title: Growing a Greener World
programme.desc: When it comes to year-round vegetable gardening, Niki Jabbour wrote the book. She easily earned the Year-round Badge of Honour by living in one of the most unlikely places: Halifax, Nova Scotia. There, the first frost of the year shows up about mid-October and frigid temperatures persist typically until mid-May.

programme.title: Growing a Greener World
programme.sub-title: A Day In The Life At The Gardenfarm
programme.desc: When Growing a Greener World creator and host Joe Lampl isnt on the road to capture the stories of other gardeners in their gardens, hes busy keeping up with his own large, organically maintained raised bed garden and 5-acre hobby farm.

programme.desc: English news from Japans Broadcasting Corporation, NHK, delivering the latest in business, technology, health, environmental and world news.
